18.18: meib Zauj taaib lxd meib naaiq teij myenb kunq zruj kunq Kruq Jyenq Fiag. kov Dovg naaiq Niaq se Jiaj Daavg meib Eei Qa'q. meib kanb Navq zruj maiq hivb lx'g.
18.8: mo-se kxvq zyruq weig i-saa-laa-en myenb zruj pun faa-lo Zauj i-yipq myenb Eei yetg zuvq sig pun ninb Eei ovb taa mwavj. ninb yaag kxvq ninb Bua yem Daamb Jauq pwavb zu'g Eei yetg zuvq Kruq naang,, yaag kxvq zyruq Navq haiq nx Fruj ninb Bua.
18.3: Zauj i taub txn mivb mo-se uaq. maaib taub txn, Buaj heug ke-som,  (weig zu'g mo-se kxvq, “yia se kanb fivj myenb taaib yem naaiq nxm teib puv.”)
18.21: mq paag meib xij zu'g yem pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj kinq maaib panb zeig Eei myenb, se kinq Taaib Tinb huvb Eei myenb, Hruq zivj Eei, maiq Eang Eaanb Mwavj Eei myenb. xij zu'g Paaiq ninb Bua zruj pyeiq zeiq. maaib teij kunq yetg Zin taub, maaib teij kunq yetg pc'q taub, maaib teij kunq Mmd zyepg taub, maaib teij kunq zyepg taub.
18.14: mo-se Eei ovb taa pwatg mo-se xij zu'g Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, ninb zyrug kxvq, “naaiq, meib Navq haiq nx zruj Tevj meib Eei pc'g fivj? naaiq teij myenb luvb Dxm sruq weib Jyenq meib Tauj Mwavj. zruj haiq Euvg meib kanb Navq zweid Jyenq Tevj ninb Bua Beng sig?”
18.23: sij kxvq meib Navq naaiq nx zruj, Tinb huvb yaag Navq naaiq nx Paaiq meib zruj, meib zyrug maiq navg Kruq a'q. naaiq teij pc'g fivj Rwrnj, ninb Bua yaag pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj ninb Bua yem Eei txvj.”
18.6: ye-To pun waag mivb Buaj mo-se, “meib Eei ovb taa, ye-To, txb meib Eei auq Zauj meib Eei i taub txn taaib lxd meib a'q.”
18.2: zinb Daavg mo-se fuvj ninb Eei auq, sipg-po-laa, Rwrnj. ninb Eei ovb taa, ye-To, zipq mig a'q. ib zang ye-To txb Jyenq mo-se Eei auq
18.20: xij zu'g Faauj pc'g fivj hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei leib latg Zauj leid. yaag xij zu'g Pxq mevb pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yem naaiq seij zavg Navq haiq nx yem, Navq haiq nx zruj.
18.24: mo-se mwavj ninb Eei ovb taa kxvq Eei waag yaag ziuj ninb kxvq Eei Euvb Euvg ei Jyenq zruj.
18.7: mo-se zyrug Zwrtq mivb zipq ninb Eei ovb taa, Do'q Fiag paaij yaag zom ninb. laanb Zauj laanb kxvq liud wig pwavb waag, ninb Bua pia'g Dopg liub mig a'q.
18.19: meib mwavj yia maa'b! yia xij Tevj meib taaq za'eij. Toq Tinb huvb Zauj meib yem. meib xij zu'g tiq pc'g fivj yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen, zx'q ninb Bua Eei sig Buaj ninb.
18.17: mo-se Eei ovb taa kxvq, “meib Navq naaiq nx zruj se maiq yaaug.
18.27: mo-se zyrug fuvj ninb Eei ovb taa Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj. ninb Eei ovb taa zyrug Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei teib puv.
18.11: ib zang yia hiuq tu'q zyruq kaub Lo Jiaj maang zyenb weig zu'g ninb Navq haiq nx zruj pun zruj mauj hxig i-saa-laa-en myenb uaq teij.”
18.5: mo-se Eei ovb taa, ye-To, txb mo-se Eei auq Zauj i taub txn mivb Tauj teib puvb Waav yem Tinb huvb Eei Bov, mo-se Zxv Dopg liub Eei txvj uaq.
18.9: ye-To haid liud zyruq Navq naaiq nx Tevj i-saa-laa-en myenb tu'q lovj, Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq, ninb kevb a'Neiq haig.
18.16: haiq taub maaib sig ninb Bua taaib lxd yia, yia Tevj ninb Bua Paaiq yaag pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei leib latg Zauj leid.”
18.4: maaib taub heug e-li-ye-se, (weig zu'g mo-se kxvq, “yia Eei tia Eei Tinb huvb Tevj yia. ninb Fruj yia leib Dutq faa-lo Eei Ru'g Daauq.”)
18.10: ninb kxvq, “Zev zyruq, tovb txb meib Bua Zwrtq faa-lo huvb Zauj i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq, yaag Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj maiq zu'g zruj i-yipq myenb Eei nrub.
18.22: xij zu'g pun ninb Bua zanb zang Tevj pc'g fivj Beng sig. maaib tomb sig pun ninb Bua taaib lxd meib. faib fiuq sig ninb Bua kanb Beng. Navq naaig meib Eei kov zyrug hev teij weig zu'g ninb Bua Tevj Jyenq Daam.
18.12: mo-se Eei ovb taa, ye-To, zyrug txb puaq ziag Eei Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq taaib ziag pun Tinb huvb. aa-lon Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib Zauj mo-se Eei ovb taa yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen Eang Naavj.
18.15: mo-se tau ninb Eei ovb taa, “yia Navq naaiq nx zruj weig zu'g pc'g fivj taaib lxd yia Toq naaig Tinb huvb.
18.13: ta'Eeig Nxi mo-se zweid Jyenq uaq Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj tunj sig. pc'g fivj sruq weib kxmj mo-se luvb Dxm Tauj luvb Mwavj.
18.1: mo-se Eei ovb taa, mi-Dyen teib puv Eei sai myenb, ye-To, haid kxvq Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx Tevj mo-se Zauj Tinb huvb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei yetg zuvq Jaub lrug, yaag haid kxvq zyruq Navq haiq nx txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
18.26: naaiq teij myenb zanb zang Tevj Beng sig. a'g tu'q tunj Eei sig ninb Bua txb mivb pun mo-se Beng. faib fiuq sig ninb Bua kanb Beng.
18.25: mo-se zyrug yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj kinq Zwrtq maaib panb zeig Eei myenb yaag xn ninb Bua zruj pyeiq zeiq. maaib teij kunq yetg Zin taub, maaib teij kunq yetg pc'q taub, maaib teij kunq Mmd zyepg taub, maaib teij kunq zyepg taub.

8.18: zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb xij lovg ninb Bua Eei faatq zruj kcvb Buv yaag zruj maiq Zwrtq. kcvb Buv taaib fyaau myenb Eei sin Zauj scvb Kuq Eei sin.
8.8: faa-lo huvb heug mo-se Zauj aa-lon taaib, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “Toq meib Bua tauj kauj Jrub zyruq pun kcvq pyauj Gxi yia Zauj yia Eei pc'g fivj. yia zyrug pun meib Eei pc'g fivj mivb ziag pun zyruq a'q.”
8.3: kcvq yaag xij pwavq Revg nai-aa Daaib. kcvq yaag xij faauj mivb pia'g meib Eei huvb ting, meib Eei ken, faauj meib Eei Zruj, yaag xij pia'g meib Eei Jyen Eei pyauq, faauj meib Eei pc'g fivj Eei sin, cvj pia'g zi'q Fuaq Eei Roj Zauj Zaij Fuaq Eei punb.
8.32: mq paag naaiq Rung faa-lo cvj vcvg Jyenq Hruq, maiq pun pc'g fivj mivb.
8.21: sij kxvq meib maiq puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb nx, yia xij pun muvd faanq, fyaau Eei fyaau, pyxmb Eei pyxmb meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj, yaag pia'g meib Bua Eei pyauq ka'Euad. i-yipq myenb Eei pyauq, lyemb ninb Bua yem Eei Dau, muvd xij pwavq Revg.
8.14: i-yipq myenb Raud kcvb taig taaib Dwib Dwi Eei. yetg nxm teib puv zweij Revg.
8.23: yia zyrug Genj Jyenq yia Eei pc'g fivj Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj. naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Fav Nxi Zwrtq a'q.”+’+”
8.6: aa-lon suv puad Jiaj i-yipq teib puv Eei uam kub vwaaig. kcvq zyrug Zwrtq taaib pwavq i-yipq teib puv mig a'q.
8.2: meib maiq Kavq puvj ninb Bua mivb nx, yia xij pun kcvq faanq pwavq Revg meib Eei teib puv.
8.20: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Fav Dxm Jiad sin Ryruq Eei zuaq Jyenq faa-lo huvb Fiag uaq Daaib Len zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “xij zu'g puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb, weig pun ninb Bua haib zavg yia.
8.24: zyruq zyrug Navq naaiq zruj. muvd faanq vomb vomb Eei pia'g faa-lo Eei huvb ting Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Eei pyauq. teib puv haiq Dau maaib muvd pwavq Revg. laaij naaiq teij muvd faanq, zyrug hxig teib puv waaig Revg mig a'q.
8.28: faa-lo kxvq, “yia pun meib Bua mivb teib puvb Waav uaq, pun meib Bua ziag pun zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, mq paag maiq tuvq mivb ko. yaag Toq weig yia tauj kauj.”
8.7: mq paag zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb lovg ninb Bua Eei faatq fib Navq Eei zruj, pun kcvq Zwrtq taaib yem i-yipq teib puv.
8.29: mo-se tau, “yia yem naaiq Zwrtq mivb zyrug Tevj meib tauj kauj Toq zyruq. Fav Nxi muvd zyrug pyauj meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj. mq paag naaiq Rung Navq haaij zuvq maiq tuvq Byenq Hruq cvj Twij waag, maiq pun pc'g fivj mivb ziag pun zyruq og.”
8.19: zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb kxvq Buaj faa-lo, “naaiq se Tinb huvb zruj Eei sig.” mq paag faa-lo huvb Eei Hruq vcvg haig, maiq Kavq mwavj ninb Bua Eei waag, Navq zyruq kxvq nx.
8.17: ninb Bua i taub ei Jyenq zruj. aa-lon yaamb Jiad pyaab Byaag Bx'q niab Buv. niab Buv zyrug penj kcvb Buv taaib pwavq myenb Eei sin Zauj scvb Kuq Eei sin. i-yipq teib puv Eei niab Buv penj kcvb Buv Revg.
8.31: zyruq yaag ei mo-se Toq Eei waag zruj. muvd pyauj Revg faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj. maiq zevg yetg nxm a'q.
8.30: mo-se zyrug mivb a'q, cvj tauj kauj Toq zyruq Tevj.
8.27: yia Bua xij zu'g mivb pua Nxi Eei Jaub tivb, yem uaq teib puvb Waav ziag pun zyruq yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Navq ninb Paaiq yia Bua zruj uaq nx.”
8.11: kcvq xij pyauj meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj, Zauj meib Bua Eei pyauq. Kuvj zevg yem uaq nai-aa Daaib uaq teij Navq.”
8.5: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Buaj aa-lon, ‘zx'q pyaab Byaag nanq Jyenq suv Jiaj Daaib, Do'q, Faavb kub vwaaig pun kcvq Zwrtq taaib pwavq i-yipq teib puv a'q.’+”
8.9: mo-se kxvq Buaj faa-lo huvb, “uaq Euvg, sweib meib tivg zyavb hog xij yia haiq zang Tevj meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj tauj kauj Toq zyruq pun kcvq pyauj, leib meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei pyauq, pun kcvq Kuvj yem uaq nai-aa Daaib Navq.”
8.16: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Buaj aa-lon ‘zx'q pyaab Byaag Bx'q niab Buv. niab Buv zyrug penj kcvb Buv pwavq i-yipq teib puv.’+”
8.4: kcvq yaag xij faauj meib Eei sin, Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj Zauj meib Eei zwavj Jyen Eei sin.”+’+”
8.10: faa-lo kxvq, “Fav Nxi Toq a'q.” mo-se tau, “yia ziuj meib kxvq Eei waag tauj kauj, meib zyrug hiuq tu'q maiq maaib haiq taub Navq zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
8.22: “+‘+“tovb uaq Nxi yia xij Genj Zwrtq ko-sen teib puv, yia Eei pc'g fivj yem Eei txvj, maiq pun maaib muvd. Navq naaiq meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, yem naaiq nxm teib puv.
8.12: mo-se Zauj aa-lon yem faa-lo uaq Zwrtq mivb mig a'q. mo-se weig Zwrtq taaib hxig faa-lo naaiq teij kcvq Qa'q tauj kauj Toq zyruq Tevj.
8.15: mq paag faa-lo huvb pwatg kcvq taig Revg, ninb Eei Hruq cvj vcvg a'q. ninb maiq Kavq mwavj mo-se Zauj aa-lon Eei waag, Navq zyruq kxvq nx.
8.13: zyruq zyrug ziuj mo-se Toq Eei waag zruj. yem pyauq, yem pyaub Len, yem Deig Eei kcvq taig Revg.
8.1: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib xij zu'g mivb Buaj faa-lo huvb, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj weig pun ninb Bua mivb zavg yia.
8.26: mo-se kxvq, “Navq naaiq zruj se maiq hxpg. yia Bua lovg ziag pun zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, uaq teij scvb Kuq, i-yipq myenb haid kamb Riaq Eei. sij kxvq yia Bua yem ninb Bua mavg tu'q pwatg Eei txvj lovg ninb Bua kamb Riaq Eei scvb Kuq ziag, ninb Bua maiq zeid xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig yia Bua fai?
8.25: faa-lo zyrug heug mo-se Zauj aa-lon taaib. ninb kxvq, “kunq yem naaiq nxm teib puv ziag pun meib Eei Tinb huvb a'q.”

33.18: mo-se zyrug kxvq, “Toq meib pun yia pwatg meib Eei Favb laavg maa'b!”
33.8: mo-se haiq zang mivb uaq nxm Dopg liub, zwavj myenb Jiad sin sruq Jyenq kx'g myenb kanb Eei kcvb Daavg mavg Tauj mo-se pia'g mivb.
33.3: xij zu'g mivb Tauj Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv. mq paag yia maiq Zauj meib Bua mivb, weig zu'g meib Bua Hruq vcvg. Riaj Daamb Jauq yia haib myetg Revg meib Bua mq pei.”
33.21: zyruq cvj kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yem yia Eei ka'Len maaib nxm txvj, meib mivb sruq Jyenq uaq nxm la'pyeiq kub vwaaig.
33.14: zyruq kxvq, “yia kanb xij Zauj meib mivb, pun meib tu'q hitq Kwrnj.”
33.23: Ga'haaq yia Lwrtq Gxi puad, meib zyrug tu'q pwatg yia Eei Ga'haaq Gaav, mq paag maiq tu'q pwatg yia Eei Myen.”
33.6: weig naaiq yem ho-lepq Bov, i-saa-laa-en myenb zx'q Zwrtq ninb Bua zxv Jyenq Eei syrub setq.
33.2: yia xij Paaiq taub finb myenb mivb Daavg meib Bua. yia yaag xij zung Zwrtq Kaa-naa-an myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb Zauj ye-Butg myenb.
33.20: zyruq cvj kxvq, “mq paag meib pwatg maiq tu'q yia Eei Myen, weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg liud yia Eei Myen Zxg maaib mcvg zyavb.”
33.7: i-saa-laa-en myenb haiq zang lyepg Zyavq, mo-se yaag Zxv nxm Dopg liub leib Dopg liub Zyavq ko teij Eei. naaiq nxm Dopg liub ninb heug “wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub.” haiq taub maaib haiq Euvg xij naaig zyruq, zyrug Zwrtq Zyavq mivb Tauj uaq nxm Dopg liub.
33.19: zyruq tau, “yia xij hing Zwrtq yia Eei yetg zuvq Favb laavg Eei en Jiaj meib Eei Ra'Myen. yia yaag xij yem meib Eei Ra'Myen kxvq Zwrtq yia Eei Buaj, tovb zyruq uaq nxm Buaj. yia xij Zeij en pun haiq taub, yia zyrug Zeij en pun uaq taub. yia xij Kxb lyenb haiq taub, yia zyrug Kxb lyenb uaq taub.”
33.17: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib Navq haiq nx Toq, yia xij ei Jyenq meib Eei waag zruj, weig zu'g meib hxpg yia Eei Hruq. yia yaag hiuq tu'q meib, zua'g meib.”
33.11: zyruq Zauj mo-se Myen txij Myen kxvq waag, Navq lob kcv txig Zauj lob kcv txig kxvq waag nx. kxvq liud, mo-se Rwrnj uaq Dopg liub Zyavq. mq paag maaib ninb Eei pxvb puad myenb, nun Eei txn uaq taub myenb lunj myenb, yo-su-waa, maiq Zwrtq wig pwavb Dopg liub.
33.5: weig zu'g zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, ‘meib Bua yetg zuvq se Hruq vcvg Eei myenb. sij kxvq yia kan meib Bua mivb Du'g tavb! Navq, yia zuvq myetg meib Bua a'q. ib zang zx'q Zwrtq meib Bua Eei syrub setq, yia zyrug tivg xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib Bua.’+”
33.9: mo-se pia'g Dopg liub mivb uaq zang, uaq nxm Bwrnb Dyrub Fiag taaib yem Jyenq Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg. zyruq yem uaq Bwrnb Dyrub ka'Euad Zauj mo-se kxvq waag.
33.16: haiq taub haib hiuq tu'q yia Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj hxpg meib Eei Hruq Zwrtq liud meib Zauj yia Bua mivb? Navq naaiq yia Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj kanb Euvg, maiq Navq luvb Diaq maang fivj myenb.”
33.4: pc'g fivj haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua za'kevb! Raub haig yaag Eyemq. maiq maaib haiq taub zxv syrub setq,
33.10: zwavj myenb pwatg Bwrnb Dyrub yem Jyenq Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg, kx'g myenb sruq Jyenq kx'g myenb Eei kcvb Daavg paaij.
33.22: yia Eei Favb laavg Jiaj Eei zyavb hog yia zyrug zx'q meib fapq Jyenq la'pyeib Qavj ka'Euad, lovg yia Eei puad pwav Jyenq meib, zuaq yia Jiaj mivb.
33.12: mo-se kxvq Buaj zyruq, “zyruq Paaiq yia, ‘txb naaiq teij pc'g fivj mivb uaq nxm teib puv,’ mq paag meib maiq kcvb pun yia hiuq tu'q meib Paaiq haiq taub Zauj yia mivb. Kuvj kxvq, ‘yia hiuq tu'q meib, zua'g meib, meib yaag hxpg yia Eei Hruq.’
33.15: mo-se cvj kxvq Buaj zyruq, “meib maiq Zauj yia Bua mivb nx, maiq tuvq heug yia Bua Zwrtq naaiq nxm txvj.
33.13: sij kxvq ziuj meib mavg, yia hxpg meib Eei Hruq nx, Toq pun yia hiuq tu'q meib Eei Jauq, pun yia haib hiuq tu'q meib yaag ziuj meib mavg, pwatg yia hxpg meib Eei Hruq. Toq meib Javj Jyenq naaiq fivj myenb se meib Eei pc'g fivj.”
33.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “xij zu'g leib Gxi naaiq nxm txvj mivb a'q. meib Zauj meib txb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq teij myenb xij zu'g mivb tovb yia Zauj apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq hruq Jyenq lcvd, ‘yia xij Jiu pun meib Eei zeib fun uaq nxm teib puv.’

3.18: “i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj zuvq xij mwavj meib Eei waag. meib Zauj naaiq teij myenb koj xij zu'g mivb i-yipq huvb uaq kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq, hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb, taaib lxd yia Bua. ib zang Toq pun yia Bua mivb uaq teib puvb Waav pua Nxi Eei Jaub tivb weig ziag pun zyruq yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’
3.8: yia zyrug Fiag taaib Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq, xij txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv pyauj mivb yem nxm lovj haig, Javq haig Eei teib puv, penj nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv. se maaib Kaa-naa-an myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb Zauj ye-Butg myenb yem Jyenq Eei teib puv.
3.3: mo-se yem Hruq Namq, “aa, yia mivb fatq teij mavg kaaj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig. trud weig haiq tiug maiq zia'g Dyavb txnb fomq?”
3.21: “yia yaag xij pun i-yipq myenb Taaib meib Bua. meib Bua Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog zyrug maiq zu'g Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei mivb.
3.14: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yia Eei Buaj heug, yetg liud zyavb Jyenq uaq taub.    meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘Buaj heug yetg liud zyavb Jyenq uaq taub  Paaiq yia taaib lxd meib Bua.’+”
3.6: yia zruj meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, se apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb.” mo-se zyrug pwav Jyenq Myen, kamb Riaj maiq mavg Tinb huvb.
3.2: yem uaq, zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq Navq kwaaj trud yem Dyavb txnb fomq ka'Euad. mo-se pwatg trud yem uaq Dyavb txnb fomq mq paag maiq puaq Qwi.
3.20: yia xij suv yia Eei puad Zwrtq yem i-yipq myenb Bu'Dovj zruj Zamb Euvg Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig. Ga'haaq huvb tiaj xij pun meib Bua mivb.
3.7: zyruq kxvq, “yia pwatg yia Eei pc'g fivj yem i-yipq teib puv syrug Eei Kruq naang. yia yaag haid ninb Bua heug laaij ninb Bua zu'g kovb prub pyeiq hxig ninb Bua. yia hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Eei Krub zivb Krub latg syem Eei.
3.19: mq paag yia hiuq tu'q i-yipq huvb maiq Kavq pun meib Bua mivb, Zwrtq liud maaib tomb Qa'q Eei puad aapq ninb.
3.17: yia lcvd txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, pyauj Dutq meib Bua Eei Krub zivb Krub latg. yia xij txb meib Bua mivb yem Kaa-naa-an myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb Zauj ye-Butg myenb Eei teib puv. penj Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv.”+’
3.11: mq paag mo-se kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, “yia penj haiq Euvg myenb Zivj haib mivb Tauj faa-lo huvb uaq, txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv?”
3.5: Tinb huvb Buaj ninb, “meib maiq tuvq taaib kaub fatq a'q. xij zu'g Tutq Gxi heb. meib ib zang sruq Jyenq naaiq teij txvj se Zivb Revg Eei Dau.
3.9: ib zang yia haid i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Qiaj Tauj yia Eei mnxmb mig a'q. yaag pwatg ninb Bua zu'g i-yipq myenb hxig tu'q Kruq haig.
3.16: “meib xij zu'g mivb Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib kapq zunq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq, meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, se apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb, hing Zwrtq taaib pun yia pwatg. ninb kxvq, “yia samj mavg meib Bua, yaag pwatg meib Bua yem i-yipq teib puv zu'g ninb Bua Navq haiq nx hxig meib Bua.
3.4: zyruq pwatg mo-se mivb mavg, Tinb huvb zyrug yem uaq Dyavb txnb fomq heug, “mo-se aa'b! mo-se!” mo-se tau, “oij! yia yem naaiq og.”
3.10: ib zang yia Paaiq meib mivb faa-lo huvb uaq, xij meib txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.”
3.22: taub taub msia'q txn xij zu'g Toq Jwavg laavd Jwavg pyauq Eei i-yipq myenb Eei Jyem syrub setq, Eaanb syrub setq, Zauj lwib hruj pun meib Bua Eei txn, meib Bua Eei sia'q zxv Jyenq. Navq naaig meib Bua zyrug zx'q i-yipq myenb Eei ka'naaiq kwaatq Jyenq mivb Revg a'q.”
3.12: Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia xij Zauj meib yem. naaiq zruj Javb hog pun Ziv yia Paaiq meib mivb. meib txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, meib Bua xij taaib naaiq nxm Bov zavg yia.”
3.15: Tinb huvb cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘zyruq, meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, se apg-laa-ham Eei Tinb huvb, i-sakg Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq yia taaib lxd meib Bua.’ zyruq se yia Eei Buaj weig yetg liud. xij zu'g Javj Jyenq Navq naaiq nx heug yetg txig zunb Jiaj yetg txig.
3.13: mo-se kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, “sij kxvq yia mivb Tauj i-saa-laa-en myenb uaq, yia kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb heug yia taaib lxd meib Bua,’ sij kxvq ninb Bua naaig kaaj yia, ‘ninb Eei Buaj heug haiq Euvg?’ yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau ninb Bua?”
3.1: mo-se Tevj ninb Eei ovb taa, mi-Dyen myenb Eei sai myenb, ye-To, kruj pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb. mo-se hxvb yuvb Jiaj teib puvb Waav mivb fai puv mcvj Tauj Tinb huvb Eei Bov, ho-lepq.

32.18: mo-se tau, “naaiq maiq zeid Bx'q Jaaj hivb Eei Qiaj, yaag maiq zeid Bx'q Jaaj swei Eei Qiaj, yia haid Eei se myenb paauj Ruv Eei Qiaj.”
32.8: ninb Bua faanq Hruq Dovg naaig syepq, kwavg yia hatg ninb Bua yavb Eei Jauq. ninb Bua lovg Jyem toj taub vovb kruq taaib kweig Fiag paaij. ib zang ninb Bua zuvq txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag aaq lo'b! ninb Bua yaag kxvq, ‘o i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! naaiq se meib Bua Eei zyenb, tovb txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub.’+”
32.33: zyruq tau mo-se, “haiq taub paamd zwid txvg yia, yia sxtq uaq taub Eei Buaj Zwrtq yia Eei srub taan.
32.3: zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Eei mnxmb Yun txb taaib pun aa-lon.
32.32: mq paag ib zang Toq kwavg Gxi ninb Bua Eei zwid. sij kxvq meib maiq kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid nx, yem meib fiaq Eei srub taan Toq meib sxtq Zwrtq yia Eei Buaj a'q.”
32.21: mo-se naaig kaaj aa-lon, “naaiq teij myenb Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib, meib Zivj taaib pun ninb Bua paamd zwid Dovg naaig Lo?”
32.35: zyruq zyrug pun uaq teij myenb putq tomb wrnb pcvg laaij ninb Bua aapq aa-lon zruj uaq taub vovb txn.
32.14: zyruq zyrug kxiq Hruq, maiq hxig ninb Eei pc'g fivj Navq ninb kxvq ninb xij zruj nx.
32.23: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj yia, ‘Toq zeij teij zyenb yend yia Bua Eei Jauq maa'b! txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub mo-se ov Jiaj haaij mig a'q, yia Bua maiq hiuq.’
32.6: ta'Eeig Dxm pc'g fivj Jiad sin Ryruq Eei, txb scvb Kuq taaib puaq ziag yaag fovg hxg ziag weig Jiu Tov. ziag liud, ninb Bua zweid Jyenq Eang, zweid Jyenq hopq, Jiad sin taaib yem uaq saanj.
32.34: meib ib zang mivb a'q. txb naaiq teij myenb mivb Tauj yia Buaj Jiaj meib uaq nxm txvj. yia Eei finb myenb xij yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj yend Jauq. mq paag Tauj zyavb hog tivg zwid yia zyrug tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid a'q.”
32.2: aa-lon Buaj ninb Bua, “zx'q meib Bua Eei auq, meib Bua Eei txn, meib Bua Eei sia'q tavb Jyenq Eei Jyemb mnxmb Yun taaib pun yia.”
32.20: ninb zx'q ninb Bua zruj taaib uaq taub vovb txn puaq yu'g, mxg penj Bwrnq taaib Yaamj Jyenq uam aapq i-saa-laa-en myenb hopq.
32.24: yia zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘haiq taub maaib Jyem zruj taaib Eei syrub setq, zx'q taaib pun yia.’ ninb Bua zyrug pun Jyem yia, yia zx'q taaib kwcvj pia'g trub Raug. naaiq taub vovb txn zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q.”
32.28: le-wi myenb zyrug ei Jyenq zruj. uaq Nxi zu'g taij taig Eei myenb maaib leib maiq ko pua Zin taub.
32.7: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “kaanq syepq Eei Fiag a'q. meib Eei pc'g fivj, tovb meib yem i-yipq teib puv txb Zwrtq uaq teij myenb, paamd zwid vcvg yia.
32.29: mo-se kxvq Buaj le-wi myenb, “ib Nxi meib Bua saaj kanb Zivb Revg weig fub suj zyruq, weig zu'g meib Bua taij meib Bua Eei txnb Jweiq kxb yrud. weig naaiq zyruq ib Nxi xij Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua.”
32.19: mo-se Tauj fatq teij Dopg liub Zyavq, pwatg uaq taub vovb txn yaag pwatg myenb Zavj heij, ninb zyrug Qiaj Jiad! haig. yem uaq Bovb Jua'q ninb zx'q ninb prub Jyenq uaq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq zov Fiag Dau zyrug huq Revg mig a'q.
32.17: yo-su-waa haid pc'g fivj heug Bwi Eei. ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yem uaq Dopg liub Zyavq yia haid maaib Qiaj Bwi Navq Bx'q tomb Jaaj nx.”
32.31: mo-se zyrug cvj Rwrnj mivb lxd zyruq. ninb kxvq, “zyruq aag, naaiq teij myenb paamd zwid Lo haig. ninb Bua lovg Jyem zruj zyenb Eei favj weig kanb paaij.
32.30: ta'Eeig Nxi mo-se kxvq Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj, “meib Bua za'kevb paamd zwid Lo haig, mq paag ib zang yia xij faauj Bov mivb zyruq uaq. Riaj haib Toq ninb kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.”
32.27: mo-se Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib Bua kx'g myenb xij zu'g pwij Jyenq Ru'g Daauq, yem naaiq puv Dopg liub Zyavq Eei kcvb Daavg Jiaj Tauj uaq puv kcvb Daavg taij meib Bua Eei kxb yrud, lob kcv txig Zauj laavd zavg myenb.’+”
32.11: mq paag mo-se Fiag Qa'q Toq zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb kxvq, “o zyruq aa'b! meib fuvg Navq naaiq nx Qiaj Jiad meib Eei pc'g fivj, tovb meib lovg tomb Qa'q Zauj henq haig Eei puad txb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv taaib Eei myenb?
32.5: aa-lon pwatg Navq naaiq nx ninb zyrug Zeij nxm ziab txvb yem Jyemb vovb txn Eei Ra'Myen mcvj yaag kxvq, “Fav Nxi Bua Jiaj nxm zipq hrug zyruq. ”
32.9: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yia pwatg naaiq teij myenb se Hruq vcvg Eei pc'g fivj.
32.16: naaiq teij la'pyeiq Tinb huvb kanb Eei puab taub zruj. Ravg yaag Tinb huvb kanb Divb taaib Eei Ravg.
32.4: aa-lon zx'q naaiq teij mnxmb Yun toj taub Jyemb vovb txn cvj lovg Jaab sig Divb zyavj. zwavj myenb zyrug kxvq, “o i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! txb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv Eei zyenb tovb naaiq a'q.”
32.10: sweib yia zruj a'q. yia Qiaj Jiad! haig ninb Bua, xij myetg Revg ninb Bua. yia zyrug pun meib Zauj meib Eei zeib fun zruj yetg fivj Lo Eei.”
32.22: aa-lon tau, “Toq yia Eei zyruq maiq tuvq Qiaj Jiad yia. meib kanb hiuq tu'q naaiq teij pc'g fivj haiq zang yaag Kuvj xij zruj waaig Navq.
32.12: meib Navq naaiq nx zruj, i-yipq myenb xij kxvq meib maiq zeid? ninb Bua xij kxvq meib taaq za'eij txb meib Eei myenb Zwrtq weig zruj waaig ninb Bua, txb ninb Bua mivb uaq Bov taij, xij myetg Revg ninb Bua. Toq meib kwavg Gxi, maiq tuvq Navq naaiq Qiaj Jiad maa'b! Toq meib kxiq Hruq maiq tuvq hxig meib Eei pc'g fivj.
32.15: mo-se yem uaq Bov Fiag taaib yaag nanq Jyenq uaq teij i Kwaaiq lcvd vcvg waag Eei la'pyeib penq Fiag. i puv zuvq fiaq Jyenq Ravg. naaiq puv yaag maaib, uaq puv yaag maaib.
32.13: Javj Jyenq meib Eei pru, apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj i-saa-laa-en. meib zyavq Jyenq meib kanb Zauj ninb Bua lcvd vcvg waag kxvq, ‘yia xij pun meib Bua Yaavj taaib maaib zeib fun Dovg Leij Zamq. yia yaag xij zx'q naaiq nxm teib puv yetg zuvq Jiu pun meib Bua Ripg yetg liud penj meib Bua Eei pwrng.’+”
32.1: pc'g fivj pwatg mo-se yem uaq Bov laub haig, maiq Fiag, ninb Bua zyrug kapq zunq kxvq Buaj aa-lon, “taaib maa'b! zeij taub zyenb Eei favj yend yia Bua Eei Jauq maa'b! txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub mo-se ov, yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Jiaj haaij mig a'q.”
32.26: mo-se zyrug sruq Jyenq Dopg liub Zyavq Eei kcvb Daavg heug, “haiq taub kwei zyruq, taaib yem yia naaiq.” zwavj le-wi myenb zyrug kapq zunq mo-se uaq.
32.25: mo-se pwatg pc'g fivj lung Revg weig zu'g aa-lon sweib ninb Bua lung, zyrug zu'g ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Jyetq ninb Bua.

21.18: “sij kxvq maaib myenb Rcv Jaaj, maaib taub zx'q la'pyeiq zov fai lovg puab Jwrnb Rwei, zu'g mun uaq taub yaag maiq taig mq paag pweij Jyenq Zruj,
21.8: sij kxvq maaid ninb taaib uaq taub zyruq xij lovg zruj kanb Eei auq, Ga'haaq haid maiq pwavq Hruq, ninb xij zu'g pun myenb zua'g sia'q Rwrnj. ninb maiq maaib leid maaig pun kanb fivj myenb weig zu'g ninb zruj maiq zyepg zua'q pun uaq taub sia'q mig a'q.
21.33: “haiq taub Kxi Gxi Kwrtq fai wetq Kwrtq taaib yaag maiq komq, vovb fai lxb zyrug Dxtq Kwrtq taig,
21.3: sij kxvq ninb taaib Eei zyavb hog taanb sin myenb, ninb Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog yaag pun ninb taanb sin Zwrtq. sij kxvq taaib Eei zyavb hog txb Jyenq auq taaib, Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog yaag xij zu'g pun auq kan Jyenq mivb.
21.32: sij kxvq vovb Zeuj myenb Eei nrub kauq fai nrub peid taig nx, vovb zyruq xij zu'g Zwrtq petq luvd  Eaanb pun nrub Eei zyruq yaag xij zu'g zx'q la'pyeiq zov uaq taub vovb kruq taig.
21.21: mq paag Bx'q liud i pua Nxi Zivj taaib taig, Bx'q ninb uaq taub maiq zu'g tivg zwid weig zu'g ninb zuvq Dxtq maaid nrub Eei Eaanb mig a'q.
21.35: “sij kxvq maaib taub myenb Eei vovb Zeuj kanb taub myenb Eei vovb taig, xij zu'g maaig navb uaq taub vovb taaib, zx'q Eaanb ziuj Jaab zinb pcvb pun Gxi. taig uaq taub vovb Eei xq yaag pun Gxi.
21.14: mq paag haiq taub Jiad Hruq paab paag taij myenb taig, maiq kunq ninb pyauj mivb zyrug ziab txvb, zuvq xij zu'g zx'q ninb Tx mivb tivg zwid taij taig.
21.23: sij kxvq uaq taub msia'q txn zu'g haiq Dau mun, xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx Beng. mcvg Jaauq mcvg,
21.6: ninb Eei zyruq xij zu'g txb ninb mivb txv Jyenq Beng sig myenb  zx'q nrub Eei mnxmb pavg kcvb fai kcvb zrug, lovg zwei zwei Tov mivb. ninb zyrug yetg seij Tevj uaq taub zyruq zruj nrub.
21.34: Kwrtq Eei zyruq xij zu'g Tipq scvb Kuq Eei Jaab zinb. taig uaq taub scvb Kuq yaag penj Kwrtg zyruq Eei mig a'q.
21.2: “sij kxvq meib maaid taub hipq-lu myenb zruj nrub, ninb xij zu'g Tevj meib zruj Ju'q Havj kov. Tauj ta'Zyetq Havj uaq Havj xij zu'g pun ninb Zwrtq. ninb yaag maiq zu'g Zwrtq Eaanb.
21.36: sij kxvq hiuq tu'q naaiq taub vovb Zeuj Jiaj myenb fai vovb, vovb zyruq yaag maiq wrnj, vovb zyruq xij zu'g Tipq vovb Jaauq vovb. taig uaq taub vovb penj ninb kanb Eei mig a'q.
21.20: “sij kxvq myenb lovg pyaaq Bx'q ninb Eei nrub kauq fai nrub peid, nrub zyrug lyemb zeib taig nx, uaq taub zyruq xij zu'g tivg zwid.
21.24: mziv Jaauq mziv, Eaab Jaauq Eaab, puad Jaauq puad, zauj Jaauq zauj,
21.28: “sij kxvq maaib taub vovb kruq Zeuj taub mJavg txn fai msia'q txn taig nx, xij zu'g lovg la'pyeiq zov uaq taub vovb taig, yaag maiq tuvq Eang vovb Eei xq. vovb zyruq yaag maiq funj maaib zwid a'q.
21.7: “sij kxvq myenb maaig kanb Eei sia'q Tevj myenb zruj nrub peid, uaq taub sia'q maiq tu'q puvj Gxi Navq zruj nrub kauq Eei myenb nx.
21.29: mq paag sij kxvq uaq taub vovb Zeuj Jiaj myenb, myenb Buaj Jiaj vovb zyruq, zyruq yaag maiq wrnj, uaq taub vovb cvj Zeuj mJavg txn fai msia'q txn taig nx, xij zu'g zx'q la'pyeiq zov uaq taub vovb taig. yaag xij zu'g tivg vovb zyruq Eei zwid zu'g taij taig.
21.19: sij kxvq Ga'haaq ninb Jiad sin Byaag Jyenq pyaaq Zwrtq ka'Eiag mcvj, Bx'q ninb uaq taub maiq zu'g tivg zwid. mq paag ninb xij zu'g Zwrtq tiaq mun zinb yaag zxg ninb lovj Navq lod uaq nx.
21.17: “haiq taub zyruj ninb Eei tia fai maa, xij zu'g zx'q ninb taij kwavg.
21.31: sij kxvq vovb Zeuj sia'q fai txn, xij zu'g ziuj naaiq teij leid Beng.
21.30: sij kxvq myenb heug Zwrtq zua'g mcvg Eaanb Bu'ziaj, xij zu'g ziuj tivg taaib Eei Zwrtq weig zua'g ninb Eei mcvg.
21.27: haiq taub Bx'q ninb Eei nrub kauq fai nrub peid Eei Eaab Dutq yetg nxm, yaag xij zu'g puvj uaq taub nrub Zwrtq zruj puvj Gxi Eei myenb weig Jaauq ninb Eei Eaab.
21.11: sij kxvq ninb ei maiq tu'q naaiq teij pua Euvg nx, ninb xij zu'g pun ninb Eei aub Lo zyav naaig Zwrtq. auq yaag maiq zu'g Zwrtq haiq Euvg Eaanb.
21.5: “mq paag sij kxvq uaq taub nrub kxvq, ‘yia Namq yia Eei zyruq Zauj yia Eei aub Jweiq. yia maiq xij Zwrtq zruj puvj Gxi Eei myenb,’
21.9: sij kxvq uaq taub zyruq kinq uaq taub sia'q pun kanb Eei txn lovg zruj auq, xij zu'g funj ninb zruj Navq kanb Eei sia'q nx.
21.16: “haiq taub nimg myenb taaib maaig fai nimg taaib Zxg yem ninb Eei puab Diaq maaib myenb pwatg, uaq taub xij zu'g tivg zwid taij taig a'q.
21.4: kxvq Navq ninb Eei zyruq lxd auq pun ninb lovg, naaiq taub auq yuvd tu'q txn fai sia'q, uaq taub auq Zauj ninb Eei fu'Jweiq penj ninb Eei zyruq Eei mig a'q. Kuvj uaq taub mJavg txn kanb tu'q Zwrtq Navq.
21.10: sij kxvq ninb cvj lovg aub txn, maiq tuvq Kwei Eang hopq fai lwib hruj, yaag maiq tuvq zaang ninb Eei aub Lo.
21.22: “sij kxvq maaib i taub myenb Bx'q Jaaj, Za'g prug Bx'q zu'g maaib Jyenq sin Eei msia'q txn zyrug hxig ninb waaig sin, mq paag msia'q txn kanb maiq penj haiq Euvg, xij zu'g paatg Bx'q Eei myenb ziuj uaq taub msia'q txn Eei Goj kxvq xij lovg Bu'ziaj yaag ziuj tunj sig myenb Paaiq Bu'ziaj.
21.12: “haiq taub Bx'q myenb yaag Bx'q taig, uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g tivg zwid taij taig.
21.15: “haiq taub Bx'q ninb Eei tia fai maa nx, uaq taub yaag xij zu'g tivg zwid taij taig.
21.13: haiq taub maiq zeid paab paag taij myenb, ninb Za'g prug taij, se Tinb huvb tivg pun myenb Navq naaiq nx zu'g taig, yia zyrug lyepg nxm txvj pun ninb pyauj mivb yem uaq.
21.1: “meib xij zu'g kxvq naaiq teij leid Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb.
21.26: “haiq taub Bx'q ninb Eei nrub kauq fai nrub peid Eei yetg puv mziv mcvb nx, xij zu'g puvj uaq taub nrub Zwrtq zruj puvj Gxi Eei myenb weig Jaauq ninb Eei mziv mcvb.
21.25: trud puaq cvj zx'q trud puaq Jaauq, hanb Jaauq hanb, Dopq faauj Ryaamq Jaauq Dopq faauj Ryaamq.

35.18: Bxv Dau Zxv Dopg liub Eei tovg Zauj Zxv laatg Eei tovg Zauj naaiq teij i Euvg Eei Laav,
35.8: puaq tav Eei ka'lanq yrub, Daav Eei laapg liug weig zruj xn myenb Eei yrub Zauj huv,
35.33: ninb haib kaatq la'pyeib Jaaij, Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq, haib zruj Dyavb zavg tiu pyavb tiu pyruq, se maaib puab taub lovj, haib zruj tu'q Euvb Euvg.
35.3: tivb kov Nxi, yem meib Bua Eei haiq nxm pyauq, lyemb maiq tuvq puaq trud.”
35.32: haib taaq Zwrtq za'eij lovg Jyem lovg Eaanb lovg tovb si'q zruj Euvb Euvg Rweig Eei ka'naaiq.
35.21: haiq taub Gxi fim Gxi eij, maaib Hruq Zwrtq fim fovg hxg, zyrug txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg pun zyruq weig zruj wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub, Zauj yem uaq Qyemj lovg weig fub suj zyruq Eei Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq Zauj zruj sai Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj.
35.35: zyruq pun ninb Bua maaib panb zeig haib zruj Euvb Euvg kov. ninb Bua maaib puab taub zruj zavg, haib Namq Zwrtq za'eij zruj Zamb Euvg, haib lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng Zovj pyavb Zovj pyruq yaag Datq Dia. ninb Bua maaib puab taub zruj Euvb Euvg kov yaag haib Namq Zwrtq za'eij zruj Euvb Euvg Eei mru.
35.14: tavb Jaaj weig ziuj Fav Zauj tav Eei Jaab sig, tavb zaanq Zauj tav Eei yrub,
35.23: haiq taub maaib pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, la'maab Diab mwrng, yuvb pyei, Eomg taaib si'q Eei yuvb kruq Dopq Zauj fua'q taaib lovj Eei scvb Kuq Dopq, ninb Bua zyrug txb taaib.
35.6: pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, la'maab Diab mwrng, yuvb pyei,
35.34: zyruq yaag pun Be-saa-len Zauj Daan fivj, aa-hi-saa-makq Eei txn, o-ho-li-apg, maaib panb zeig haib Faauj myenb.
35.2: lovg Ju'q Nxi zruj kov. siag Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g funj penj Zivb Revg Nxi, se tivb kov hitq Kwrnj Nxi fuvj pun zyruq. uaq nxm Nxi haiq taub zruj haiq Euvg kov, xij zu'g taij taig.
35.20: mo-se kxvq liud, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb pun Raanj Rwrnj Revg mig a'q.
35.24: haiq taub maaib Eaanb, maaib tovb si'q, zyrug txb taaib fovg hxg pun zyruq. haiq taub maaib ta'su'q Dyavj hxpg lovg zruj tu'q haiq Euvg zyrug txb taaib.
35.28: ninb Bua yaag txb laapg liug Zauj ka'lanq yrub weig puaq tav, weig xn myenb Eei yrub, yaag weig Peuj huv.
35.7: Eomg taaib si'q Eei yuvb kruq Dopq Zauj fua'q taaib lovj Eei scvb Kuq Dopq,  ta'su'q Dyavj,
35.29: i-saa-laa-en myenb mJavg msia'q, ta'faanb maaib Hruq fovg hxg Eei myenb, zyrug zx'q ninb Bua maaib Eei ka'naaiq txb taaib fovg hxg pun zyruq weig lovg zruj ziuj zyruq lovg mo-se Paaiq ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq kov.
35.19: Zauj yem sivj ting ka'Euad fub suj zu'q Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj, tovb aa-lon sai myenb Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua zu'q weig zruj sai myenb Eei kov Eei lwib hruj Rweig.”
35.17: weib Dopg liub Eei laatg Dia, laatg tovg Zauj tovg Eei Taapq, Bc'g laatg kcvb Eei Dia,
35.31: Tinb huvb pun Be-saa-len maaib sivj livb pwavq Revg, pun ninb maaib puab taub lovj, maaib panb zeig yaag maaib Zovb mevb zruj Euvb Euvg kov Eei zavg myenb,
35.30: mo-se kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “ zyruq kinq taub yu-Daa fivj Eei myenb, hu-aa Eei fun, u-li Eei txn, Be-saa-len.
35.27: zwavj pyeiq zeiq txb Euvg Rweig Eei, Jaaij Eei la'pyeib si'q Zauj ziaj Euvg la'pyeib Jaaij taaib weig nctq Jyenq sai myenb Eei e-fotq Zauj pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq.
35.11: xij zu'g zruj Dopg liub Zauj Dopg liub ka'Euad uaq yemg Zauj ka'Eiag uaq yemg, Dopg liub Eei vau, Qxv, kuvb kavg Dyavj, tovg Zauj tovg Eei Taapq,
35.5: xij zu'g yem meib Bua kanb maaib Eei ka'naaiq zx'q taaib fovg hxg pun zyruq. haiq taub Gxi fim Gxi eij, pun uaq taub txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg zyruq, se Jyem, Eaanb, tovb si'q,
35.9: yetg Euvg Jaaij haig Eei la'pyeib si'q Zauj ziaj Euvg la'pyeiq weig nctq Jyenq tomb sai myenb Eei e-fotq Zauj pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq.
35.16: puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb, Zauj ziab txvb Eei tovb si'q Pycv, kcv ziab txvb Eei Dyavj, Zauj ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, tovb si'q punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq,
35.4: mo-se kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx Paaib Pruj.
35.10: “xij zu'g heug yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, puab taub lovj Eei yetg zuvq zavg myenb ei Jyenq zyruq Paaib Pruj Eei waag zruj Euvb Euvg Jaab txvj.
35.22: haiq taub Gxi fim Gxi eij fovg hxg, maiq kunq mJavg msia'q zyrug taaib. kx'g myenb txb Euvb Euvg Jyemb syrub setq taaib fuvj pun zyruq, se Jyemb pyavb, mnxmb Yun, puab Do'g Rcv, Zauj ziaj Euvg Jyemb syrub setq.
35.12: lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj kcv faav Eei Dyavj, Zeij en Eei weig uaq nxm faavb Gaaij, Zauj Bc'g Txvq lcvd vcvg waag faav uaq Kwaaiq Dia,
35.15: puaq huv tiab Zauj kcv tiab Dyavj, xn myenb Eei yrub Zauj huv, pia'g Dopg liub Eei Bc'g kcvb Dia,
35.13: tiab Zauj kcv tiab Eei Dyavj Zauj tiab Eei Euvb Euvg Jaab sig, Zauj kevj Tinb huvb Eei Fuaq,
35.1: mo-se heug i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq myenb kapq zunq, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “naaiq se zyruq hatg Eei waag, heug meib Bua ei Jyenq zruj.
35.26: haiq taub msia'q txn maaib Hruq zruj yaag maaib puab taub lovj zyrug pcv yuvb pyei swij.
35.25: ta'faanb maaib puab taub lovj Eei msia'q txn, ninb Bua pcv pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, yaag pcv la'maab swib mwrng txb taaib fovg hxg.

40.18: Zxv Dopg liub uaq zang, mo-se zx'q Taapq an Jyenq, lyepg Qxv Topq Jyenq Taapq, Zunj Jyenq kuvb kavg Dyavj cvj zx'q tovg ton Jyenq.
40.8: Zxv laatg weib Jyenq pyei puv Dopg liub, cvj zx'q Dia Bc'g Jyenq laatg kcvb.
40.33: mo-se cvj weib kxmj Dopg liub Zauj ziab txvb, cvj zx'q Bc'g laatg kcvb Eei Dia Bc'g Jyenq. Navq naaig, mo-se zruj zyavj naaiq teij Euvb Euvg kov.
40.3: zx'q lcvd vcvg waag faav an Jyenq Dopg liub ka'Euad cvj zx'q Diab Bc'g Txvq Jyenq.
40.32: ninb Bua haiq zang pia'g wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub fai mivb uaq ziab txvb, ninb Bua Raauj Revg puab zauj Navq zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag nx.
40.21: txb faav an Jyenq Dopg liub ka'Euad, cvj zx'q uaq Kwaaiq Diab Bc'g Bc'g Jyenq Txvq lcvd vcvg waag faav, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag zruj.
40.35: mo-se maiq haib pia'g wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub weig zu'g Bwrnj om Jyenq, yaag maaib zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem pwavq.
40.14: txb aa-lon Eei txn Bua taaib pun ninb Bua zu'q Jyenq ka'Euad uaq yemg lwib Daauq.
40.23: cvj zx'q Fuaq ziuj yetg Eeig an uaq tiab kevj zyruq, ei zyruq kxvq Eei waag zruj.
40.6: “zx'q puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb ton Jyenq txij wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg.
40.34: uaq zang maaib Bwrnj om Jyenq wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub, zyruq Eei Favb laavg zyrug pwavq Revg Dopg liub.
40.2: “zib Laaj scvb yetq uaq Nxi, xij zu'g Zxv wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub.
40.36: om Dopg liub uaq txq Bwrnj haiq zang syru faauj, i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q.
40.20: ninb zx'q fiaq zyepg tiub leib latg uaq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeiq tapq Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav ka'Euad, zx'q kcv Eei Dyavj Zunj Jyenq i puv faav ka'Len Eei Kwiv, cvj zx'q Zeij en Eei weig Eei faavb Gaaij komq Jyenq,
40.24: ninb zx'q tavb Jaaj an Jyenq wig pwavb Dopg liub ka'Euad Eei naamb puv mcvj txij zyavj uaq nxm tiab,
40.28: ninb zyrug zx'q Bc'g Dopg liub Eei kcvb uaq Kwaaiq Dia Bc'g Jyenq.
40.7: zx'q punb ton Jyenq ziab txvb Zauj Dopg liub Bu'Dovj, cvj tapq Jyenq uam.
40.29: ninb zx'q puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb an Jyenq wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg, cvj txb puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g an Jyenq ziab txvb puaq ziag Navq zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag zruj uaq nx.
40.19: ninb zx'q Dopg liub ka'Euad uaq yemg Zxv Jyenq, cvj komq kub vwaaig Navq zyruq Paaiq mo-se uaq nx.
40.17: yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib ta'Eeig Havj, zib Laaj scvb yetq uaq Nxi, ninb Bua Zxv wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub a'q.
40.38: i-saa-laa-en myenb yem ninb Bua Eei Jaub taaub lrug mweid, luvb Nxi zang ninb Bua pwatg zyruq Eei Bwrnj yem Dopg liub kub vwaaig. luvb mwrnd zang pwatg trud yem Bwrnj ka'Euad.
40.31: mo-se Zauj aa-lon Eei txn Bua zyrug lovg naaiq nxm punb Eei uam Raauj puab zauj.
40.30: ninb zx'q punb an Jyenq wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Zauj ziab txvb Bu'Dovj, cvj tapq Jyenq uam lovg Raauj puab zauj.
40.27: cvj puaq Jyenq huv uaq nxm tiab kub vwaaig, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag.
40.11: punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq yaag xij zu'g zx'q yrub toj Jyenq saaj Zivb Revg fuvj pun yia, zyruq.
40.5: zx'q puaq huv Eei Jyemb tiab ton Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen mcvj, cvj zx'q Bc'g Dopg liub Eei kcvb uaq Kwaaiq Dia Bc'g Jyenq.
40.9: “zx'q xn myenb Eei yrub toj Dopg liub Zauj Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig fuvj pun zyruq. Euvb Euvg zyrug Zivb Revg mig a'q.
40.16: zyruq Navq haiq nx Paaiq mo-se zruj haiq Euvg, mo-se zyrug Navq uaq nx zruj Euvb Euvg.
40.37: kxvq Navq Bwrnj maiq syru faauj nx, ninb Bua maiq Zwrtq Jauq mivb. zuaq Tauj Bwrnj faauj Zivj taaib Zwrtq Jauq.
40.4: txb tiab pia'g taaib ton Jyenq yaag zx'q tiab Eei Jaab sig an Jyenq tiab kub vwaaig. txb tavb Jaaj pia'g taaib cvj zx'q tavb zaanq an Jyenq ninb Bua Eei txvj.
40.10: cvj lovg yrub toj ziab txvb, se puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb, Zauj ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, zyrug saaj ziab txvb Zivb Revg. ziab txvb zyrug kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj.
40.22: mo-se txb tiab mivb ton Jyenq wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub ka'Euad, pa'q puv mcvj, Bc'g kcvb Dia ka'Eiag mcvj,
40.12: “txb aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Tauj Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg, pun ninb Bua yem uaq lovg uam Raauj sin.
40.15: zx'q yrub toj ninb Bua Navq toj ninb Bua Eei tia nx, weig pun ninb Bua zruj sai myenb fub suj yia. Navq naaiq zruj sai txig Jiaj txig yetg liud Ripg Jyenq mivb.”
40.13: Tevj aa-lon zu'q Jyenq zruj sai Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj, cvj zx'q yrub toj Jyenq saaj ninb Zivb Revg fuvj pun yia, weig zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
40.26: mo-se zx'q puaq huv Eei Jyemb tiab an Jyenq wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub ka'Euad, Bc'g lcvd vcvg waag faav Eei Dia Ra'Myen mcvj,
40.25: cvj tyemq tav yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag zruj.

14.18: yia hivb faa-lo Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj keb maad pcv tu'q myenb Taaib yia uaq zang, i-yipq myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
14.8: zyruq pun i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb Hruq vcvg, faa-lo zyrug zung i-saa-laa-en myenb, tovb ninb Bua puvj laavg Eei Zwrtq i-yipq Eei zyavb hog.
14.3: faa-lo huvb zyrug laaig, ‘i-saa-laa-en myenb yem uaq teib puv yrub mivb yrub taaib Navq. yaag maaib teib puvb Waav Kwrnj Jyenq ninb Bua.’
14.21: mo-se suv puad Jiaj Kxiq kub vwaaig. zyruq pun tov puv mcvj Eei tomb Ryaauj pwrng yetg mwrnd, Kxiq zyrug Tiuq penj Daub Gaai. uam pun Gxi,
14.14: zyruq kanb xij weig meib Bua Bx'q Jaaj. meib Bua lyemb maiq zu'g zruj haiq Euvg.”
14.23: i-yipq myenb zung Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb. faa-lo Eei yetg zuvq maad, Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia, Zauj keb maad Eei pcv kan Jyenq Fiag Kxiq.
14.6: huvb tiaj zyrug heug myenb liug leid ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia yaag txb Jyenq ninb Eei pcvb kwanb mivb a'q.
14.2: “Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb taauj Gaav Rwrnj Zxv Dopg liub yem pi-haa-hi-lotq uaq Daavg mcvj, mikq-Don Zauj Kxiq Bu'Dovj. xij zu'g lyepg Zyavq yem Baa-an-se-fon txib vaang, nitq Kxib Len.
14.20: tavq Jyenq yem i-yipq pcv Zauj i-saa-laa-en pcv Bu'Dovj. Bwrnb Dyrub pun yetg puv Mwavj, yetg puv Fav. zyavb mwrnd i puv pcv maiq tu'q nitq fatq.
14.24: luvb aaq lamb teij Fav, zyruq yem uaq nxm trub Dyrub Bwrnb Dyrub mavg i-yipq Eei pcvb kwanb zyrug pun ninb Bua lung Revg.
14.28: uam kapq Jyenq yemj Revg maab Zia Zauj keb maad Eei pcv Zauj yetg zuvq kan i-saa-laa-en myenb Fiag Kxiq Eei pcv. maiq maaib yetg taub tu'q mcvg Zwrtq.
14.7: ninb txb kaub lovj Jiaj uaq teij lua'g pc'q nxm Bx'q Jaaj Zia Zauj yem i-yipq teib puv yetg zuvq Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia, cvj Zauj kunq maab Zia Eei pcvb pyeiq yetg zuvq kan Jyenq mivb.
14.29: mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb yavb Jaub Gaai Jiaj Kxiq. yem Byaaug mcvj zaaij mcvj, i puv uam Navq zivb laatg nx.
14.19: Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb, tovb yend i-saa-laa-en pcv Eei Jauq uaq taub, cvj Lwrtq Rwrnj Ga'haaq Gaav. yem uaq Daavg mcvj uaq nxm Bwrnb Dyrub yaag Lwrtq Rwrnj yem Ga'haaq Gaav,
14.17: yia xij pun i-yipq myenb Hruq vcvg, ninb Bua zyrug zung Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb. weig zu'g yia hivb faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei zwavj pcv Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj ninb Eei keb maad pcv, myenb zyrug Taaib yia.
14.31: i-saa-laa-en myenb pwatg zyruq lovg tomb Qa'q zruj pun i-yipq myenb Eei sig, ninb Bua zyrug Taaib zyruq yaag syenj ninb yaag syenj ninb Eei pru, mo-se.
14.30: tovb uaq Nxi zyruq Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj Dutq i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq. i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag pwatg i-yipq myenb taig uaq Kxib Len.
14.27: mo-se zyrug suv puad Jiaj Kxiq kub vwaaig. luvb Fav, Kxiq Eei uam zyrug kapq Jyenq Navq lod uaq nx. i-yipq myenb Fiag Qa'q pyauj mq paag zyruq zx'q ninb Bua kwaatq Fiag Kxiq mig a'q.
14.11: ninb Bua txv Jyenq mo-se kxvq, “yem i-yipq teib puv maiq maaib txvj pyopq Janb taig meib Zivj taaib txb yia Bua Zwrtq naaiq teib puvb Waav taig? meib fuvg Navq naaiq nx txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv?
14.5: maaib myenb kxvq Buaj i-yipq Eei faa-lo huvb, i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj mig a'q. ninb Zauj ninb Eei Jyen zyrug Namb Rwrnj. ninb Bua kxvq, “Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx zruj? Bua puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb Revg, maiq tu'q ninb Bua fub suj Bua a'q nyaa.”
14.9: i-yipq myenb Eei zwavj pcv zung Jyenq mivb. maaib faa-lo Eei yetg zuvq maad Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia, keb maad Eei pcv Zauj pcvb kwanb, yetg zuvq zung Jyenq ninb Bua mivb, zung zaaig i-saa-laa-en myenb Zxv Jyenq Dopg liub yem uaq Kxib si'q Len, nitq pi-haa-hi-lotq, txij zyavj Baa-an-se-fon.
14.16: suv meib Eei pyaab Byaag Jiaj Kxiq kub vwaaig, uam zyrug pun Gxi pun i-saa-laa-en myenb yavb Jaub Gaai Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq.
14.4: yia xij pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, ninb xij zung i-saa-laa-en myenb. mq paag yia xij hivb Jiaj faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei zwavj pcv. myenb zyrug Taaib yia. i-yipq myenb yaag xij hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ” i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag zruj.
14.10: faa-lo huvb zung aaq lamb zaaig uaq zang, i-saa-laa-en myenb Zau Myen pwatg i-yipq myenb zung Jyenq ninb Bua taaib. ninb Bua za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig, Fiag Qa'q Toq zyruq Tevj.
14.22: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug tu'q yavb Jaub Gaai Jiaj Kxiq. yem ninb Bua Eei zaaij mcvj, Byaaug mcvj, i puv uam Navq zivb laatg nx.
14.12: yem i-yipq uaq zang yia Bua mtaaib Buaj meib, ‘maiq tuvq la'Eauq yia Bua. sweib yia Bua zruj i-yipq myenb Eei nrub’ maiq zeid? zruj nrub Zxg kaub lovj taaib naaiq teib puvb Waav taig.”
14.15: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib weig haiq tiug heug Jyenq Toq yia? kunq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb huvj Jyenq uaq Daavg mivb a'q.
14.13: mo-se kxvq Buaj pc'g fivj, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. puvj tivg Hruq zuaq Jyenq. meib Bua zyrug pwatg ib Nxi zyruq xij Navq haiq nx Fruj meib Bua. tovb meib Bua ib Nxi pwatg naaiq teij i-yipq myenb, Ga'haaq hivq yetg liud maiq tu'q pwatg a'q.
14.26: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “cvj suv puad Jiaj Kxiq kub vwaaig pun Kxiq Eei uam cvj taaib kapq Jyenq yemj i-yipq myenb, lyemb ninb Bua Eei maab Zia Zauj keb maad Eei pcv.”
14.25: ninb zruj pun maab Zia Eei yenb zyetg, maiq haib mivb syepq. i-yipq myenb kxvq, “Bua xij zu'g kaanq pyauj i-saa-laa-en myenb. zyruq Tevj ninb Bua Bx'q yia Bua i-yipq myenb a'q.”

23.18: “meib Bua txb scvb Kuq ziag pun yia, Zinb maang maiq tuvq lovg an pivq Eei Fuaq Zauj Jyenq fovg hxg. “Jiaj zipq ziag pun yia Eei scvb Kuq Mei, maiq tuvq lyrub Tauj Fav Dxm.
23.8: “maiq tuvq Eang Eaanb Mwavj. Eaanb Mwavj haib pun mziv Fav Eei myenb Eei mziv mcvb, yaag Byenq Kuq myenb Eei waag.
23.33: maiq tuvq pun uaq teij myenb yem meib Bua Eei teib puv. Riaj ninb Bua haib Duaq meib Bua paamd zwid txvg yia. sij kxvq meib Bua zavg ninb Bua Eei zyenb, meib Bua Dovg haaij zuvq zcv Laav Lopq meib Bua kanb a'q.”
23.3: “myenb Jomg myenb txvg sig yaag maiq tuvq prug ninb Eei leid.
23.32: maiq tuvq Zauj ninb Bua fai Zauj ninb Bua Eei zyenb lyepg haiq Euvg vcvg waag.
23.21: xij zu'g lovg Hruq mwavj, ei Jyenq ninb Eei waag. maiq tuvq vcvg. meib Bua vcvg maiq mwavj ninb Eei waag nx, ninb maiq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid, weig zu'g ninb tevq yia Eei Buaj taaib.
23.14: “yetg Havj xij zu'g weig yia Jiaj pua nxm zipq.
23.23: yia Eei finb myenb xij mivb Daavg, txb meib Bua pia'g aa-mo-lai myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, Kaa-naa-an myenb, hi-wai myenb, ye-Butg myenb yem Eei teib puv. yia yaag xij myetg Revg ninb Bua.
23.6: “meib Bua Eei myenb Jomg myenb maaib sig nx, maiq tuvq wcvg. xij zu'g pun ninb Bua tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid.
23.2: “maiq tuvq kan myenb Zamq zruj waaig sig. kxvq sig Eei zyavb hog maiq tuvq kan myenb Zamq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj pun pcvb fim Eei leid Pyen.
23.20: “mavg maa'b! yia Paaiq taub finb myenb mivb Daavg weig yem Jauq zavg peu Jyenq yaag txb meib Bua mivb Tauj yia liug leid zyavj Eei txvj.
23.24: maiq tuvq kweig Fiag paaij ninb Bua Eei zyenb yaag maiq tuvq zavg. maiq tuvq zwrtg ninb Bua Eei Euvg zeiq zruj. xij zu'g myetg Revg ninb Bua Eei miub favj, Bx'q huq ninb Bua zavg zyenb Eei la'pyeib tovg.
23.28: yia yaag xij pun kwanb mweib Feiq mivb Daavg meib Bua, weig zung hi-wai myenb, Kaa-naa-an myenb, hitq-Tai myenb pyauj Zwrtq meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj.
23.7: maiq tuvq koj Jaaq sig yaag maiq tuvq taij maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb fai Hruq zivj Eei myenb, weig zu'g yia zuvq maiq kwavg zruj naaiq Euvg waaig sig myenb Eei zwid.
23.29: mq paag yia maiq zeid yetg Havj ka'Euad zung ninb Bua Zwrtq Revg. Riaj teib puv haib penj teib puvb Waav, Yiab zxib zyrug Yaavj taaib hxig meib Bua.
23.19: “yem meib Bua Eei livb teig Zwrtq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei taaub Txvj Zunb kcv xij zu'g txb mivb zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. “maiq tuvq lovg yuvb maa Eei Exj zruq yuvb txn.
23.17: “meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq mJavg txn xij zu'g taaib yem yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, Eei Ra'Myen, yetg Havj pua Rung.
23.31: “yia xij tivg meib Bua Eei kapg Jaaij yem Kxib si'q mivb Tauj me-Di-te-le-nyen Kxiq, cvj yem teib puvb Waav mivb Tauj yu-fe-titg Daaib. yia xij zx'q naaiq nxm teib puv Eei myenb Jiu pun yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq, pun meib Bua zung ninb Bua pyauj Zwrtq meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Revg.
23.30: yia manb mang zung ninb Bua Zwrtq meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj, zuaq meib Bua Yaavj taaib haib tu'q uaq nxm teib puv penj meib Bua Eei pwrng.
23.27: “ta'faanb meib Bua mivb Tauj haaij, yia xij pun yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Eei myenb kamb Riaj haig yaag lung Revg. yia yaag xij pun meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq winb wavq taauj sin pyauj.
23.11: mq paag Tauj siag Havj uaq Havj xij zu'g pun Dau henb, maiq tuvq zwavj ka'naaiq. sweib yem meib Bua ka'Euad Eei myenb Jomg myenb mivb syru yem Deig Eei ka'naaib lrud. zevg Fiag uaq teij sweib Yiab zxib Eang. meib Bua Eei a'vung Wivj Zauj ka'lanq Wivj yaag xij zu'g fib Navq Eei zruj.
23.5: sij kxvq pwatg Rxv meib uaq taub myenb Eei lxb Dxpg mivb, Tx Eei ka'naaiq vatq Jyenq ninb, meib xij zu'g Tevj lxb zyruq lyepg Jiad sin taaib. maiq tuvq zruj Navq maiq kwen maiq sig Eei.
23.9: “maiq tuvq zruj to'g hxig kanb fivj myenb. meib Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua haid Navq haiq nx weig zu'g zinb Daavg meib Bua yem i-yipq teib puv yaag zruj Jiaj kanb fivj myenb.
23.16: “xij zu'g Jiaj syru syavb Byaub Eei zipq, se syru yem lyavb Deig Dxtq Qa'q zwavj Eei taaub Txvj Zunb kcv. “Havb tweiq meib Bua syru Revg meib Bua Eei kcvb zwavj ka'naaiq, xij zu'g Jiaj syru kcvb zwavj Eei zipq.
23.4: “sij kxvq pwatg meib Eei winb Jaa Eei vovb fai lxb Dutq pyauj mivb, xij zu'g txb Rwrnj pun ninb.
23.10: “Ju'q Havj ka'Euad, xij zu'g zruj lyavb Deig zwavj ka'naaiq, syru kcvb zwavj.
23.22: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb mwavj ninb Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq, yia zyrug Zauj meib Bua Eei winb wavq zruj winb wavq, yaag Zauj meib Bua Eei winb Jaa zruj winb Jaa.
23.12: “lovg Ju'q Nxi zruj meib Bua Eei kov. siag Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g tivb kov weig pun meib Bua Eei vovb, meib Bua Eei lxb hitq Kwrnj. meib Bua Eei nrub cvj Zauj meib Bua yem Eei kanb fivj myenb yaag hitq Kwrnj, tu'q Kub yem teij.
23.15: “xij zu'g Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq. siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Navq yia hatg meib Bua nx. xij zu'g ziuj tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog yem aa-Bipg Laaj Jiaj zipq, weig zu'g uaq nxm Laaj meib Bua yem i-yipq teib puv pyauj Zwrtq taaib. “maiq tuvq pun haiq taub Kuvb puad pc'g zauj taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen.
23.13: “yia, zyruq, Buaj meib Bua naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag, meib Bua xij zu'g lovb lovj Eei kan. yaag maiq tuvq heug kanb taub zyenb Eei Buaj, lyemb maiq tuvq kxvq Zwrtq naaiq teij zyenb Eei Buaj.
23.1: “maiq tuvq txb Jaaq waag mivb zunb Buaj myenb. maiq tuvq Zauj myenb waaig myenb tovb Hruq zruj zxvb zevj hxig myenb.
23.26: yem meib Bua Eei teib puv zyrug maiq maaib haiq taub waaig kub vwaad, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub maiq haib maaib kub vwaad. yia yaag xij pun meib Bua Eei syrug Ewrnb Daauq.
23.25: xij zu'g fub suj yia, zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia zyrug Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua maaib laavb zi'g maaib uam, yaag pun yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei Euvb Euvg pcvg Twij.

6.18: Ko-haatq maaib pyei taub txn, Buaj heug am-laam, itg-haa, he-Bo-lon, utg-si-en. Ko-haatq Eei Havb Jeiq zyavb tu'q yetg pc'q faab zyepg faam Havj.
6.8: yia xij txb meib Bua mivb Tauj yia Zauj apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, Zauj yaa-Kopq hruq Jyenq lcvd pun ninb Bua uaq nxm teib puv. yia xij zx'q uaq nxm teib puv Jiu pun meib Bua, penj meib Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. yia se zyruq ’+”
6.3: yia hing Zwrtq taaib pun apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, Zauj yaa-Kopq pwatg, pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia se nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb. mq paag tovb yia heug zyruq uaq nxm Buaj, yia maiq laaug yaavb pun ninb Bua hiuq.
6.21: itg-haa maaib pua taub txn, Buaj heug Ko-laa, ne-fekq Zauj sikg-li.
6.14: naaiq se i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq Eei Buaj. yaa-Kopq Eei txnb Lo, lu-Ben, maaib pyei taub txn, Buaj heug haa-nokq, pan-lu, hetq-lon, Zauj Kaan-mi. naaiq teij se lu-Ben Eei puvb pwrng.
6.23: aa-lon lovg am-mi-naa-Dapg Eei sia'q, naa-son Eei muag, e-li-Qe-Baa. e-li-Qe-Baa yuvd tu'q naa-Dapg, aa-Bi-hu, e-le-aa-saa Zauj i-Taa-maa.
6.6: “weig naaiq meib xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘yia se zyruq yaag xij txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq, pyauj Dutq zu'g zruj nrub Eei Kruq naang. yia xij suv Zwrtq yia henq haig Eei puad Jiad taaib Niab Niaq Eei tivg i-yipq myenb Eei zwid yaag zua'g meib Bua.
6.2: Tinb huvb cvj Buaj mo-se. “yia se zyruq
6.20: am-laam lovg ninb Eei tia Eei muag, yo-Ke-Betg. yo-Ke-Betg yuvd tu'q aa-lon Zauj mo-se pun am-laam. am-laam Eei Havb Jeiq zyavb tu'q yetg pc'q faab zyepg Zyetq Havj.
6.24: Ko-laa maaib pua taub txn, Buaj heug atg-sij, en-Kaa-naa, Zauj aa-Bi-yaa-saapg. naaiq teij zruj Ko-laa Eei puvb pwrng.
6.28: mo-se yem i-yipq teib puv uaq zang zyruq Buaj ninb,
6.7: yia xij pun meib Bua zruj yia kanb Eei pc'g fivj yaag xij zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia zruj zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, tovb txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq myenb hxig meib Bua Eei Kruq naang.
6.29: “yia se zyruq. yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag meib xij zu'g trug mivb Buaj i-yipq huvb, faa-lo.”
6.19: me-laa-li maaib i taub txn, Buaj heug maa-li Zauj mu-si. naaiq se le-wi Eei puvb pwrng ei Jyenq ninb Bua Eei trub zov.
6.17: ke-son Eei txn ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng heug lipq-ni Zauj si-me-i.
6.30: mq paag mo-se tau, “yia kxvq waag maiq Byaavg. huvb tiaj fuvg xij mwavj yia?”
6.27: mivb Buaj i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq se tovb naaiq teij i taub, mo-se Zauj aa-lon.
6.11: “mivb Buaj i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq ninb Eei teib puv a'q.”
6.5: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g i-yipq myenb hxig zruj nrub Kruq, Funb Eei Qiaj yia yaag haid mig a'q. yia cvj Javj zu'g yia lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag.
6.9: mo-se zyav naaiq teij waag Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj, weig zu'g ninb Bua pa'la'g Raub haig, zu'g tiaq zruj nrub Kruq Zuv mivb.
6.16: naaiq se le-wi Eei txn yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig Eei Buaj. le-wi maaib pua taub txn, Buaj heug ke-son, Ko-haatq Zauj me-laa-li. le-wi Eei Havb Jeiq zyavb tu'q yetg pc'q faab zyepg Zyetq Havj.
6.4: yia yaag Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Jiad vcvg waag, lcvd zx'q Kaa-naa-an teib puv Jiu pun ninb Bua, tovb zinb Daavg ninb Bua zruj Kc'q myenb yem uaq nxm teib puv.
6.22: utg-si-en yaag maaib pua taub txn, Buaj heug mi-saa-en, en-saa-faan Zauj sitg-li.
6.12: mq paag mo-se tau zyruq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb zuvq maiq xij mwavj yia Eei waag. faa-lo huvb fuvg xij mwavj? weig zu'g yia kxvq waag maiq Byaavg.”
6.15: si-me-on maaib Ju'q taub txn, Buaj heug ye-mu-en, yaa-min, o-haatg, yaa-Kin, soj-haaj, saa-un. saa-un se ninb Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb auq yuvd Eei txn. naaiq teij zruj si-me-on Eei puvb pwrng.
6.13: zyruq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon, “xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb, zyruq Paaiq meib Bua i taub txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.”
6.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “ib zang meib xij tu'q pwatg yia Navq haiq nx zruj pun faa-lo huvb. yia xij lovg yia Eei tomb Qa'q aapq ninb puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj Zwrtq. laaij yia Eei puad Eei tomb Qa'q, ninb zuvq xij zung i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq ninb Eei teib puv.”
6.26: aa-lon Zauj mo-se, tovb naaiq teij i taub a'q, zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “xij zu'g txb fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg kwanb yetg kwanb Eei Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.”
6.25: aa-lon Eei txn, e-le-aa-saa, lovg taub pu-Ti-en Eei sia'q. uaq taub sia'q yuvd tu'q taub txn, Buaj heug fi-ne-hatg, pun ninb. naaiq se le-wi myenb Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq.

34.18: “xij zu'g Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq. siag Nxi ka'Euad meib Bua xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq, Navq yia hatg Jiaj meib Bua uaq nx. aa-Bipg Laaj, meib Bua xij zu'g Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq weig zu'g uaq nxm Laaj meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
34.8: mo-se lyemb zeib kweig Fiag Dau paaij.
34.33: mo-se Zauj ninb Bua kxvq liud waag, ninb zx'q Kwaaiq Dia pwav Jyenq Myen.
34.3: maiq tuvq pun haiq taub kan meib taaib. Bov Eei haiq nxm txvj yaag maiq tuvq pun haiq taub yem. lyemb maiq tuvq pun yuvb kwanb, pa'ki yuvb kwanb, vovb kwanb, yem Bovb Jua'q Eang miaq.”
34.32: Ga'haaq i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb taaib fatq teij, mo-se zyrug zx'q yem si-naai Bov, zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb uaq teij yetg zuvq leib latg Buaj ninb Bua.
34.21: “lovg Ju'q Nxi zruj kov, mq paag siag Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g hitq Kwrnj. maiq kunq laib livb fai syru kcvb zwavj Eei zyavb hog, xij zu'g hitq Kwrnj.
34.35: i-saa-laa-en myenb pwatg ninb Eei Myen cvq Zwrtq Fav. kxvq liud waag, mo-se cvj zx'q Dia pwav Jyenq Myen, zuaq Tauj pia'g mivb Zauj zyruq kxvq waag Zivj zx'q Gxi.
34.14: maiq tuvq zavg kanb taub zyenb, weig zu'g yia, zyruq, tovb maaib Buaj heug Rcv  uaq taub Tinb huvb, Rcv Jyenq meib Bua.
34.23: meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq mJavg txn yetg Havj xij zu'g taaib zavg pua Rung yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb.
34.6: zyruq Jiaj mo-se Eei Ra'Myen cvj kxvq, “zyruq,  zyruq, Kxb lyenb myenb, Zeij en pun myenb Eei Tinb huvb. yia maiq Qiaj Jiad syepq, za'kevb Namq haig myenb, yaag zyepg zua'q Eei.
34.34: mq paag mo-se haiq zang pia'g wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, Zauj zyruq kxvq waag, ninb zx'q Gxi pwav Myen uaq Kwaaiq Dia, zuaq Tauj ninb Zwrtq taaib. ninb Zwrtq taaib kxvq zyruq hatg Eei waag pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mwavj uaq zang,
34.2: Fav Nxi Dxm Beng zyavj zyrug faauj si-naai Bov, yem uaq Bovb nivq kub vwaaig pwavb yia.
34.20: taaub Txi lxb txn xij zu'g lovg pa'ki yuvb txn zua'g. maiq zua'g nx, xij zu'g Bx'q ninb Eei Jaav nauq. yaag xij zu'g zua'g meib Bua Eei taaub taub txnb la'kauq. “maiq tuvq pun haiq taub Kuvb puad pc'g zauj taaib lxd yia.
34.24: yia xij zung fivb fivj myenb yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Zwrtq mivb, pun meib Bua Eei teib Jaaij Javq Zwrtq. meib Bua yetg Havj mivb zavg zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb pua Rung, maiq maaib haiq taub Rcv meib Bua Eei Dau a'q.
34.28: mo-se Zauj zyruq yem uaq feij zyepg Nxi feij zyepg mwrnd. ninb maiq Eang Naavj yaag maiq hopq uam. ninb zx'q naaiq teij vcvg waag, se zyepg tiub leib latg, fiaq Jyenq i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq.
34.7: yia zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb Tauj Zinb Zin txig myenb. yia kwavg zruj waaig zruj x'q Zauj paamd zwid Eei sig. mq paag yia maiq pun maaib zwid Eei myenb maiq zu'g tivg zwid, zuvq pun tia zu'g tivg Eei zwid linb Jyenq Fiag Tauj pua pyei txig zeib fun.”
34.29: mo-se yem si-naai Bov prub Jyenq fiaq lcvd vcvg waag uaq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq Fiag. ninb maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Zauj zyruq kxvq liud waag, ninb Eei Myen cvq Zwrtq Fav.
34.19: “maiq kunq vovb kwanb, yuvb kwanb, pa'ki yuvb kwanb, ta'faanb scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn, kruq uaq teij, penj yia Eei pwrng.
34.17: “maiq tuvq toj haiq Euvg miub favj taaib weig kanb zavg.
34.31: mq paag mo-se heug ninb Bua. aa-lon Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq zyrug taaib Tauj ninb uaq. mo-se zyrug Zauj ninb Bua kxvq waag.
34.30: aa-lon Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb pwatg mo-se Eei Myen cvq Zwrtq Fav, ninb Bua kamb Riaj maiq mivb fatq.
34.27: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “zx'q naaiq teij waag fiaq Jyenq weig zu'g yia Zauj meib Bua Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb ziuj naaiq teij waag lyepg Jiad vcvg waag.”
34.11: xij zu'g ei Jyenq yia ib Nxi hatg meib naaiq teij waag zruj, yia zyrug zung aa-mo-lai myenb, Kaa-naa-an myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb, ye-Butg myenb yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Twij Zwrtq.
34.5: zyruq yem txq Bwrnj Fiag taaib Zauj mo-se sruq Jyenq uaq, kxvq Zwrtq ninb Eei Buaj, tovb zyruq uaq nxm Buaj.
34.9: ninb kxvq, “o zyruq aag, sij kxvq ziuj meib pwatg, yia za'kevb hxpg meib Eei Hruq nx, Toq zyruq Zauj Jyenq yia Bua mivb. maiq kunq naaiq teij myenb Hruq vcvg, Toq meib kwavg yia Bua zruj txvg Eei zwid, zipq yia Bua zruj meib Eei pc'g fivj.”
34.16: Riaj meib Bua mivb lxd ninb Bua Eei sia'q taaib zruj meib Bua Eei txn Eei auq, ninb Bua Eei sia'q yaag Navq maaib Yiab Hruq Eei myenb, mivb zavg ninb Bua Eei zyenb zyrug yua'g meib Bua Eei txn fib Navq Eei maaib Yiab Hruq mivb zavg ninb Bua Eei zyenb.
34.4: mo-se zyrug zu'g zyavj i Kwaaiq la'pyeiq Navq zinb Daavg uaq teij i Kwaaiq nx. ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei ninb ziuj zyruq Eei waag txb Jyenq faauj si-naai Bov.
34.10: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yia lyepg vcvg waag, xij yem meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei Ra'Myen, zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, se yem naaiq luvb Diaq maang fivj myenb maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg Jiaj Eei sig. yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei fivb fivj myenb xij pwatg yia, zyruq, weig meib Bua zruj Bua'g hxvb, kamb Riaj haig Eei tomb sig.
34.22: “meib Bua Jiad kxn kaatq Byaub witq Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g Jiaj syru syavb Byaub Eei zipq. Tauj Havb tweiq syru setq mweid uaq teij kcvb zwavj yaag xij zu'g Jiaj syru kcvb zwavj Eei zipq.
34.12: xij zu'g faij fim, maiq tuvq Zauj meib Bua xij mivb uaq nxm teib puv Eei myenb lyepg vcvg waag. Riaj haib Navq zcv Laav Lopq meib Bua nx.
34.15: “meib Bua maiq tuvq Zauj uaq nxm teib puv Eei myenb lyepg vcvg waag weig zu'g ninb Bua Navq maaib Yiab Hruq Eei myenb nx, zavg ninb Bua Eei zyenb yaag txb ka'naaiq mivb ziag. Riaj ninb Bua haib Zivq meib Bua mivb Zauj Jyenq Eang ninb Bua ziag zyenb Eei ka'naaiq.
34.13: xij zu'g Zc'q ninb Bua Eei ziab txvb, Bx'q mwrng ninb Bua zavg zyenb Eei la'pyeib tovg, yaag kxij ninb Bua Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj.
34.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “zu'g i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq Navq zinb Daavg uaq teij i Kwaaiq. yia cvj fiaq Jyenq waag Navq zinb Daavg meib Bx'q huq uaq teij Eei waag nx.
34.26: “yem Deig Zwrtq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei Zunb kcv xij zu'g txb mivb zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei pyauq. “maiq tuvq lovg yuvb maa Eei Exj zruq yuvb txn.”
34.25: “haiq zang lovg scvb Kuq Eei Ryaamq ziag yia, Zinb maang maiq tuvq lovg an pivq Eei Fuaq Zauj Jyenq fovg hxg. Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq lovg ziag Eei scvb Kuq maiq tuvq lyrub Tauj luvb Dxm.

2.18: uaq teij sia'q Rwrnj Tauj ninb Bua Eei tia, le-u-en uaq, ninb Bua Eei tia naaig kaaj, “ib Nxi meib Bua fuvg Rwrnj Dovg naaig Ryruq?”
2.8: huvb sia'q tau, “xij Eei. kunq mivb lxd maa'b!” uaq taub sia'q zyrug mivb lxd kub vwaad Eei maa taaib.
2.3: pivj kau, ninb pivj maiq Bweid a'q, zyrug lovg nxm lua'g ti'g nxmb zia'q taaib Eei Daan, zx'q i Euvg Daub Diaq Eei zuv naig Jyenq, Lxpq kub vwaad tapq Jyenq Daan ka'Euad, txb mivb an uaq Daaib Len lua'g ti'g lomg.
2.21: mo-se pwavq Hruq Zauj uaq taub myenb yem mi-Dyen teib puv. le-u-en zyrug pun taub ninb Eei sia'q, Buaj heug sipg-po-laa, mo-se lovg zruj auq.
2.14: uaq taub tau, “haiq taub xn meib taaib zruj yia Bua Eei syemq zwid Jyen kunq yia Bua? meib xij taij yia Navq meib taij uaq taub i-yipq myenb nxb?” mo-se zyrug kamb Riaj haig, yem Hruq Namq, “yia zruj Eei sig Dovg haaij zuvq myenb hiuq mig a'q.”
2.23: Jiaj liud Zamb Havj, i-yipq teib puv Eei huvb tiaj kwei seij mig a'q. uaq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb Raub haig, Funb Jyenq yem, laaij ninb Bua zu'g zruj nrub Kruq haig. ninb Bua Eyemq Jyenq heug Tinb huvb Tevj ninb Bua. Tinb huvb yaag haid mig a'q.
2.6: huvb sia'q Kxi mavg pwatg taub kub vwaab txn. kub vwaad yaag Eyemq a'q. huvb sia'q Kxb lyenb haig, ninb kxvq, “aa, naaiq hipq-lu myenb Eei kub vwaad nyaa.”
2.2: ninb Eei auq zyrug maaib sin, yuvd tu'q taub txn. pwatg ninb Eei txn zyavb tu'q Rweig haig, ninb zx'q ninb Eei txn pivj Jyenq txb pua Laaj Eia'g.
2.20: le-u-en naaig ninb Eei sia'q Bua, “ninb yem haaij? zruj haiq Euvg kwavg Jyenq ninb yem uaq? xij zu'g mivb heug ninb taaib Eang Naavj.”
2.24: Tinb huvb haid ninb Bua Funb yaag Javj zu'g ninb Zauj apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag.
2.7: kub vwaad Eei txg zyrug taaib naaig kaaj huvb sia'q, “meib xij yia mivb lxd taub maaib Exj pun kub vwaad hopq Eei hipq-lu msia'q txn taaib Tevj meib txb kub vwaad Eei fai?”
2.19: ninb Bua tau, “maaib taub i-yipq myenb Tevj yia Bua pyauj Dutq uaq teij mavg yuvb Eei myenb. ninb yaag Tevj yia Bua Zia uam pun yuvb hopq.”
2.17: cvj maaib kwanb mavg yuvb Eei myenb taaib zung naaiq teij siag muab sia'q pyauj. mo-se zyrug Jiad sin Tevj naaiq teij sia'q yaag Tevj ninb Bua Zia uam pun ninb Bua Eei yuvb hopq.
2.11: mo-se Lo taaib a'q. maaib Nxi nx, ninb Zwrtq mivb mavg Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj Eei myenb, pwatg ninb Bua zu'g myenb hxig zruj kov Kruq haig. ninb pwatg taub i-yipq myenb Bx'q taub hipq-lu myenb, tovb Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj Eei myenb.
2.5: faa-lo huvb Eei sia'q mivb uaq nai-aa Daaib Raauj sin. Byend ninb uaq teij msia'q pru yem uaq Daaib Len saau a'Ryaaug. huvb sia'q pwatg uaq nxm Daan yem uaq lua'g ti'g lomg zyrug heug ninb Eei nrub peid mivb zx'q taaib.
2.9: faa-lo huvb Eei sia'q kxvq Buaj kub vwaad Eei maa, “Tevj yia txb naaiq taub kub vwaad og. yia pun kovb zinb meib Eei.”
2.16: mi-Dyen teib puv maaib taub sai myenb maaib siag taub sia'q. uaq teij siag muab sia'q taaib Zia uam toj pwavq zob pun ninb Bua Eei tia Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb Zauj yuvb kwanb hopq.
2.4: kub vwaad Eei txg yem ko teij Eei, sruq Jyenq uaq mavg kaaj naaiq taub kub vwaad Navq haiq nx.
2.10: kub vwaad Eei maa zyrug Lxpq kub vwaad mivb txb. kub vwaad Lo teij, ninb Eei maa fuvj mivb pun huvb sia'q zyrug penj huvb sia'q Eei txn mig a'q. huvb sia'q Tevj naaiq taub txn Zwrtq Buaj heug mo-se. huvb sia'q kxvq, “weig zu'g yia yem uam zx'q ninb Zwrtq taaib.”
2.22: sipg-po-laa yuvd tu'q taub txn. mo-se kxvq, “yia se kanb fivj myenb taaib yem naaiq nxm teib puv.” ninb zyrug Tevj ninb Eei txn Zwrtq Buaj heug ke-som.
2.12: mo-se zyrug mavg naaiq mavg uaq, pwatg maiq maaib myenb. ninb zyrug zx'q uaq taub i-yipq myenb taij taig pyopq Jyenq saab zyru Dwi pivj Jyenq.
2.15: faa-lo huvb haid naaiq teij sig ninb xij taij mo-se, mq paag mo-se pyauj faa-lo, mivb yem mi-Dyen teib puv. Tauj uaq ninb zweid Jyenq uamb Kwrtq ka'Len.
2.13: ta'Eeig Nxi mo-se cvj Zwrtq mivb mavg pwatg i taub hipq-lu myenb Bx'q Jaaj. ninb naaig kaaj zruj txvg uaq taub, “meib zruj haiq Euvg Bx'q Zauj meib Jwavg fivj Eei hipq-lu myenb?”
2.1: zruj kau, maaib taub le-wi fivj Eei txn lovg taub le-wi fivj Eei sia'q zruj auq.
2.25: Tinb huvb mavg i-saa-laa-en myenb, hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Eei Krub zivb yaag Kxb lyenb Eei.

36.18: ninb Bua lovg tovb si'q zruj Mmd zyepg nxm ka'naaib Kauj, Kauj Jyenq uaq teij i Kwaaiq tomb Dia Eei nekq zyrug penj yetg Kwaaiq mig a'q.
36.8: yem zwavj kovb myenb Bu'Dovj, maaib puab taub kaub lovj Jiaj uaq teij zavg myenb, zruj Dopg liub. ninb Bua lovg la'maab swib mwrng zxpg Jyenq pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Datq zyepg Kwaaiq Dia cvj Zovj Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj.
36.33: Bu'Dovj uaq wrng kuvb kavg Dyavj penj yetg tiub Dyavj yem naaiq puv mivb txv uaq puv.
36.3: zavg myenb yetg zuvq mivb mo-se uaq zipq i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq fim fovg hxg zruj sivj ting uaq teij ka'naaiq. i-saa-laa-en myenb Dxmb Dxm Zxg txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg pun mo-se.
36.32: uaq puv Qxv yaag maaib pyaa tiub. Dopg liub Ga'haaq mcvj, fai puv uaq puv, cvj maaib pyaa tiub.
36.21: nxmb nxm Qxv Lav zyepg Dx'g, Javq Dx'g pyenj.
36.35: ninb Bua lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg zxpg Jyenq la'maab swib mwrng Datq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia. puab taub lovj Eei myenb cvj Zovj Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj.
36.14: ninb Bua cvj lovg yuvb pyei Datq zyepg yetq Kwaaiq taaib komq Dopg liub ka'Eiag uaq yemg.
36.23: naamb puv mcvj ninb Bua zruj Eig zyepg nxm Qxv.
36.6: mo-se zyrug Buaj myenb zunb kxmj Dopg liub Zyavq, Buaj pc'g fivj, “haiq taub mJavg msia'q maiq zu'g txb haiq Euvg fovg hxg weig zruj sivj ting a'q.” zwavj myenb zyrug tivb Fiag, maiq txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg.
36.34: naaiq teij Qxv yetg zuvq pwav Jyenq Jyem cvj tivj Jyenq Jyemb Kwiv Zunj kuvb kavg Dyavj. kuvb kavg Dyavj yetg zuvq yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem.
36.2: mo-se heug Be-saa-len, o-ho-li-apg Zauj taub taub maaib panb zeig Eei myenb, se zyruq Zeij pun maaib panb zeig haib zruj yaag maaib Hruq zruj Eei myenb, taaib zruj kov.
36.36: ninb Bua lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj pyei nxm tovg yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem, tivj Jyenq Jyemb vau Kwavj Bc'g kcvb Dia. ninb Bua yaag zruj pyei nxm Eaanb Taapq Topq uaq teij tovg.
36.20: ninb Bua lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj Dopg liub Eei Qxv, lyepg za'g.
36.24: cvj lovg Eaanb zruj feij zyepg nxm Taapq Topq Qxv Eei zauj. yetg nxm Qxv maaib i nxm Taapq.
36.28: cvj kanb zruj i nxm Qxv weig Ga'haaq mcvj Eei kx'q.
36.7: syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq zuvq kaub Zamq Qyemj zu'g lovg zruj Euvb Euvg kov.
36.29: kx'q Eei i nxm Qxv yem ka'Diaq hxpg Tauj kub vwaaig yaag Jwavg nxm Kru Kru Jyenq. i nxm kx'q zuvq fib Navq Eei zruj.
36.19: ninb Bua cvj lovg Eomg taaib si'q Eei yuvb kruq Dopq komq yemg. cvj lovg fua'q taaib lovj Eei scvb Kuq Dopq komq yemg.
36.17: yem naaiq teij i Kwaaiq tomb Dia Eei Diab Len, yetg Kwaaiq ninb Bua tivj Mmd zyepg nxm nekq.
36.38: ninb Bua yaag zruj pyaa nxm tovg Zauj tivj tovg Eei vau. tovg tweib mweid pwav Jyenq Jyem. pyaaq yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem. ninb Bua yaag zruj pyaa nxm tovb si'q Taapq Topq tovg.
36.31: ninb Bua lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj kuvb kavg Eei Dyavj. yetg puv Dopg liub Eei Qxv maaib pyaa tiub.
36.30: Navq naaig, yetg zuvq maaib Yetg nxm Qxv yaag maaib zyepg lua'g nxm Eaanb Taapq. yetg nxm Qxv Topq i nxm Taapq.
36.27: weig Dopg liub Gaav, fai puv uaq puv, ninb Bua zruj Ju'q nxm Qxv.
36.11: ninb Bua lovg Diab Buaq zruj nekq tivj Jyenq uaq teij i Kwaaiq tomb Dia Eei Diab Len.
36.5: Buaj mo-se, “myenb txb ka'naaiq taaib Zamq Jiaj Daavg Qyemj zu'g lovg weig zruj zyruq Paaiq zruj Eei kov.”
36.9: Kwaaib Kwaaiq fib Fyetq fib Daau. Daauq Eig zyepg petq Dx'g, Javq pyei Dx'g.
36.16: ninb Bua zx'q pyaa Kwaaiq kapq Jyenq lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq. cvj zx'q Ju'q Kwaaiq fib Navq Eei lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq.
36.37: Bc'g Dopg liub Eei kcvb uaq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia, ninb Bua lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, zxpg Jyenq la'maab swib mwrng Datq taaib yaag maaib puab taub Zovj Zovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Zovj.
36.4: ta'faanb maaib puab taub lovj zruj sivj ting Eei zavg myenb, kx'g myenb zyrug kwavg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei kov mivb
36.10: ninb Bua zx'q pyaa Kwaaiq kapq Jyenq lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq, cvj zx'q uaq teij pyaa Kwaaiq lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq.
36.22: nxmb nxm Qxv, i puv Qxvb zauj ninb Bua Pai ka'Eiag mcvj pun ninb Zitq teij, yetg nxm Qxv Eei zauj zyrug Zauj ta'Eeig nxm Qxv Eei zauj kapq Jyenq. Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq Qxv ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj.
36.12: yetg Kwaaiq tivj Mmd zyepg nxm nekq. naaiq Kwaaiq Eei nekq Zauj uaq Kwaaiq Eei nekq txij zyavj.
36.15: naaiq teij Kwaaib Kwaaiq fib Fyetq fib Daau, Daauq faab zyepg Dx'g, Javq pyei Dx'g.
36.13: ninb Bua cvj lovg Jyem zruj Mmd zyepg nxm ka'naaib Kauj, zx'q naaiq Kwaaiq Eei nekq pavg uaq Kwaaiq Eei nekq Kauj Jyenq penj yetg nxm Dopg liub mig a'q.
36.1: Be-saa-len, o-ho-li-apg Zauj yetg zuvq maaib panb zeig Eei myenb, tovb zyruq pun maaib puab taub lovj, maaib Zovb mevb hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx zruj sivj ting Eei Euvb Euvg zyrug ziuj zyruq Paaib Pruj Eei yetg zuvq waag zruj.”
36.26: cvj zruj feij zyepg nxm Eaanb Taapq Topq Qxv Eei zauj. yetg nxm Qxv maaib i nxm Taapq.
36.25: weig pa'q puv mcvj ninb Bua cvj zruj Eig zyepg nxm Qxv.

20.18: zwavj pc'g fivj haid Ba'ov Bwi, pwatg pxvd Ba'livg, haid Ratg Eei Qiaj, yaag pwatg trub syruj yem Bov Zutg Zutq Eei Zwrtq, ninb Bua kevb! kamb Riaj haig, sin zinj Revg. pc'g fivj sruq kob ko Eei,
20.8: “xij zu'g Javj Jyenq lovg tivb kov Nxi penj nxm Zivb Revg Nxi.
20.3: “Zwrtq liud yia, maiq tuvq zavg kanb taub zyenb.
20.21: pc'g fivj sruq Jyenq uaq ko Eei. Kuvj mo-se mivb fatq Tinb huvb yem uaq nxm mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei txvj Navq.
20.23: meib Bua maiq tuvq lovg Jyem fai Eaanb zruj haiq Euvg zyenb Eei favj taaib Zauj Jyenq yia zavg.
20.6: mq paag haiq taub Namq yia, ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg zruj, yia zyrug Namq ninb Jiaj mivb Tauj yetg Zin txig.
20.2: “yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, tovb txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, zu'g zruj nrub Eei teib puv uaq taub.
20.20: mo-se kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj maa'b! Tinb huvb taaib seij meib Bua, pun meib Bua zanb zang kamb Riaj ninb, Taaib ninb, zyrug maiq paamd zwid.”
20.24: “+‘xij zu'g lovg nia weig yia Zeij ziab txvb, yaag lovg meib Bua Eei vovb fai pa'ki yuvb fai yuvb zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq. ta'faanb yem haiq nxm txvj yia pun myenb Javj yia Eei Buaj, yia zyrug mivb uaq nxm txvj Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua.
20.7: “maiq tuvq la'kwaib lovg zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei Buaj. haiq taub la'kwaib lovg zyruq Eei Buaj, zyruq xij tivg uaq taub Eei zwid.
20.19: cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Toq meib kanb trug waag pun yia Bua maa'b! yia Bua zyrug mwavj. maiq tuvq pun Tinb huvb Zauj yia Bua kxvq waag. Riaj yia Bua zu'g taig.”
20.17: “maiq tuvq mauq myenb Eei pyauq. maiq tuvq mweig Jia'q myenb Eei auq, myenb Eei nrub kauq nrub peid, myenb Eei vovb fai lxb fai ninb maaib Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq.”
20.11: weig zu'g zyruq lovg Ju'q Nxi zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq Zauj yem naaiq teij ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq. mq paag siag Nxi uaq Nxi Tinb huvb tivb kov a'q. weig naaiq zyruq Zeij fu'q uaq nxm Nxi penj ninb Eei Zivb Revg Nxi.
20.5: maiq tuvq kweig Fiag paaij naaiq teij miub favj yaag maiq tuvq zavg, weig zu'g yia, zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Rcv Jyenq meib Bua. yia xij tivg Rxv yia uaq teij myenb Eei zwid, tivg Tauj ninb Bua Eei pua pyei txig zeib fun.
20.9: maaib Ju'q Nxi zruj meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq kov.
20.16: “maiq tuvq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj hxig myenb.
20.4: “maiq tuvq weig kanb zruj haiq Euvg miub favj. maiq kunq yem kub vwaaig luvb, yem ka'Diaq Dau, fai yem Daub Diaq Eei uam ka'Euad haiq Euvg Eei favj.
20.10: mq paag ta'Zyetq Nxi uaq Nxi se tivb kov Nxi weig fuvj pun zyruq.   uaq Nxi maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg kov. meib Bua kanb Zauj meib Bua Eei naamb Erud, meib Bua Eei nrub kauq nrub peid, meib Bua Eei scvb Kuq, fai yem meib Bua Eei zivb Eei kanb fivj myenb yaag maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg kov.
20.22: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘meib Bua kanb pwatg yia yem kub vwaaig luvb Zauj meib Bua kxvq waag.
20.12: “xij zu'g Tovj nimg meib Bua Eei tiaj maag, meib Bua Zivj taaib zyavb tu'q syrug Ewrnb Daauq yem zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Jiu pun meib Bua Eei teib puv.
20.1: Tinb huvb kxvq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag.
20.26: yaag maiq tuvq Jaaj Tei faauj yia Eei ziab txvb. Riaj pivb Zyruq haib Zwrtq.’
20.25: sij kxvq lovg la'pyeiq weig yia Zeij ziab txvb, maiq tuvq lovg zu'g taaib Eei fai Divb taaib Eei la'pyeiq. sij kxvq lovg zu'g taaib fai Divb taaib Eei la'pyeiq nx, naaiq teij la'pyeiq maaib wij a'q.

24.18: mo-se zyrug faauj Bov pia'g Bwrnj ka'Euad yaag yem uaq Bov feij zyepg Nxi feij zyepg mwrnd.
24.3: mo-se txb zyruq Eei waag Zauj yetg zuvq leid mivb Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj. zwavj myenb tovb Jruj waag tau, “zyruq kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag yia Bua xij ei Jyenq zruj.”
24.8: mo-se zyrug zx'q zaavb Jyenq punb Eei Ryaamq fu'q zwavj myenb. ninb kxvq, “naaiq teij Ryaamq se weig lyepg Jiad vcvg waag, se zyruq ziuj naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Zauj meib Bua lyepg Eei vcvg waag.”
24.9: mo-se, aa-lon, naa-Dapg, aa-Bi-hu Zauj Zyetq zyepg taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb koj zyrug faauj Bov,
24.7: ninb zyrug zx'q lcvd vcvg waag sru to'g pun zwavj pc'g fivj mwavj. zwavj myenb kxvq, “zyruq kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag yia Bua xij mwavj yaag ei Jyenq zruj.”
24.5: ninb yaag Paaiq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb lunj myenb mivb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, yaag fovg hxg vovb zruj ziag pun zyruq weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq.
24.16: zyruq Eei Favb laavg Fiag taaib yem si-naai Bov. Bwrnj om Jyenq Bov Ju'q Nxi. siag Nxi uaq Nxi ninb yem uaq Bwrnj heug mo-se.
24.17: (i-saa-laa-en myenb pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg Navq trud zia'g Jyenq uaq Bovb nivq nx.)
24.14: ninb kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb koj, “meib Bua yem naaiq zuaq yia Bua Rwrnj. aa-lon Zauj hu-aa Zauj meib Bua yem naaiq. haiq taub maaib haiq Euvg sig lxd ninb Bua Tevj Beng tu'q Eei.”
24.4: mo-se zyrug fiaq Jyenq zyruq kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag. ta'Eeig Dxm mo-se Jiad sin taaib Ryruq Eei, yem uaq Bovb Jua'q Zeij nxm ziab txvb cvj lyepg zyepg Eeig nxm la'pyeib tovg ziuj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zyepg Eeig fivj.
24.2: Kuvj mo-se kanb Du'g taub haib taaib nitq fatq yia, zyruq, Navq. uaq teij maiq tuvq taaib fatq. yaag maiq tuvq pun pc'g fivj Zauj Jyenq faauj naaiq.”
24.6: mo-se syru yetg pwrng scvb Kuq Eei Ryaamq zaavb Jyenq punb lyrub Jyenq, cvj zx'q yetg pwrng Pyetq ziab txvb.
24.13: mo-se Zauj ninb Eei pxvb puad myenb, yo-su-waa, zyrug Zwrtq Jauq faauj Tinb huvb Eei Bov mig a'q.
24.12: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “faauj Bov taaib Zauj yia yem maa'b! yia xij zx'q la'pyeib penq, tovb yia fiaq Jyenq leib latg Zauj hatg Eei waag pun meib Bua lyrub Jyenq Faauj pc'g fivj.”
24.15: mo-se faauj Bov mivb, zyrug maaib Bwrnj om Jyenq Bov a'q.
24.11: Tinb huvb yaag maiq hxig naaiq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq. ninb Bua tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb yaag tu'q Eang tu'q hopq.
24.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib Zauj aa-lon, naa-Dapg, aa-Bi-hu, cvj Zauj Zyetq zyepg taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb koj xij zu'g faauj yia naaiq taaib mq paag yem ko Eei paaij yia.
24.10: yaag tu'q pwatg i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb Eei zaub Zaaiq Navq Jaaij haig Eei la'pyeiq, setq zeiq Buaq Eei, Navq luvb nx kwevj Rav Eei.

28.18: ta'Eeig lyrud maaib nxm Dyemb mcv, Rav Eei, maaib nxm Banq Buaq, Rav Eei, maaib nxm pc'g Eei, Feib Feiq uaq.
28.8: sai e-fotq uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia zruj Eei za'eij Zauj lovg Eei ka'naaiq yaag xij zu'g fib Navq Eei. xij zu'g lovg Jyem, lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Zauj la'maab swib mwrng.
28.33: lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg zruj zi'g lyrub pyruq tivj kxmj lwib Jua'q, cvj tivj Jyenq Jyemb livb Genj Jyenq.
28.3: xij zu'g Buaj maaib puab taub lovj Eei myenb, tovb yia pun maaib Zovb mevb, maaib panb zeig Eei zavg myenb, zruj naaiq teij lwib hruj pun aa-lon zu'q Jyenq xn ninb zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
28.32: lyrub nxm Kwrtq yem Dia Bu'Dovj zruj lwib Jaav. lwib Jaav xij zu'g lovg Datq taaib Eei Dia hxng Jyenq pun lwib Jaav maiq haib Baaij.
28.21: yetg zuvq maaib zyepg Eeig nxm la'pyeiq. yetg nxm la'pyeiq tiu Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg taub txn Eei Buaj Navq yenj nx, piuj mevb fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb.
28.35: aa-lon fub suj zyruq Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g zu'q naaiq teij lwi. haiq zang pia'g Zivb Revg Eei txvj yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen fai Zwrtq taaib Eei zyavb hog haid livb Bwi nx, zyrug maiq zu'g taig.
28.43: aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua haiq zang pia'g wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub fai mivb Tauj ziab txvb cvj pia'g Zivb Revg Eei txvj fub suj, ninb Bua xij zu'g zu'q Jyenq weig pun pivb Zyruq maiq Zwrtq, zyrug maiq txvg zyruq, maiq zu'g taig. “naaiq se aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun xij zu'g yetg liud kan Eei leid.
28.40: yaag xij zu'g weig aa-lon Eei txn Bua zruj lwi, sai Jaaiq Dia, Zauj muag pun ninb Bua zxv Jyenq maaib Favb laavg yaag Rweig Eei.
28.14: yaag lovg Jyem kitq i tiub Bind nyruq penj Laavb syetq taaib Kauj Jyenq uaq teij i nxm la'pyeib lx'g.
28.23: zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq kub vwaaig i puv kx'q.
28.6: “pun puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb lovg Jyem Zauj pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Zauj la'maab Diab mwrng zruj e-fotq.
28.34: tivj nxm Jyemb livb cvj tivj nxm zi'g lyrub pyruq Genj yetg Euvg yetg nxm Wiv kxmj lwib Jua'q.
28.2: xij zu'g weig meib Eei kxj, aa-lon, lunb zruj sai Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj pun ninb zu'q Jyenq Favb laavg Eei, Rweig Eei.
28.36: “lovg Jyem taaq Kwaaiq Jyemb paaib taaib Divb Jyenq Ravg Navq yenj nx, kxvq, “Zivb Revg weig zyruq. ”
28.20: ta'feij lyrud maaib nxm yavb pc'g, maaib nxm setq zeiq pc'g Jia'q, cvj maaib nxm mcvb koj. naaiq teij la'pyeiq xij zu'g lovg Jyem Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq.
28.24: zx'q uaq teij i tiub Jyemb limg Kauj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq Eei Kwiv.
28.28: cvj zx'q Laavb Buaq Zunj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq ka'Diaq Eei Kwiv pavg tivj e-fotq Eei Kwiv Eatq Jyenq pun pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq yem tivg.
28.7: xij zu'g zruj i tiub kxv pavg e-fotq Eei i puv kx'q tivj Jyenq Paanj Ba'taub.
28.29: “aa-lon haiq zang pia'g Zivb Revg Eei txvj, ninb xij zu'g zx'q lovg weig tunj sig uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq pwav Jyenq la'Kwrtq, tovb tiu Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei txn Eei Buaj weig yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen zanb zang zruj Javb hog.
28.19: ta'faam lyrud maaib nxm Buab mcv, maaib nxm pc'g Jia'q, pen Eei, maaib nxm lua'g, Rav Eei.
28.17: tivj Jyenq pyei lyrud la'pyeib Jaaij. ta'yetq lyrud maaib nxm si'q Eei, Rav Eei, maaib nxm yavb uvq, maaib nxm mcvb Byaan.
