28.38: naaiq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq xij zu'g yem aa-lon Eei pyxvb. i-saa-laa-en myenb txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg zyruq, maiq kunq txb haiq Euvg, sij kxvq zruj haiq Euvg txvg leid, aa-lon xij zu'g Daamb txv. aa-lon xij zu'g zanb zang tavb Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq, zyruq zyrug hxpg Hruq myenb fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq.
28.31: “cvj lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq Datq lwib Daauq zu'q e-fotq ka'Euad mcvj.
28.30: zx'q u-lim Zauj Tum-mim, tapq Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq ka'Euad. aa-lon haiq zang yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Tevj i-saa-laa-en myenb tunj sig, maaib naaiq teij ka'naaiq yem ninb Eei la'Kwrtq.
28.27: cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq e-fotq Paanj Ba'taub uaq tiub kxv ka'Diaq, sai Jiaj Jaaiq Eei txvj kub vwaaig ti'q tyen, tivj Jyenq e-fotq Eei vutq.
28.11: pun tiu la'pyeib Jaaij Eei zavg myenb tiu Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei txn Eei Buaj yem naaiq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib Jaaij. cvj lovg Jyemb finj Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq.
28.5: zavg myenb xij zu'g lovg Jyem Zauj pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Zauj la'maab Diab mwrng.
28.9: “xij zu'g lovg i Kwaaiq la'pyeib Jaaij si'q Eei, tiu Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei txn Eei Buaj,
28.16: Ripq Jyenq penj i yemg, yetg naamj feib puv.
28.41: xij zu'g zx'q naaiq teij zruj sai Eei lwib hruj pun meib Eei kxj, aa-lon, Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua zu'q Jyenq, cvj zx'q yrub Yetq Jyenq saaj ninb Bua Zivb Revg, xn ninb Bua zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
28.37: cvj lovg Laavb Buaq Eatq Jyenq naaiq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq, Eatq Jyenq mGxvb peu Ra'Myen mcvj.
28.39: “cvj lovg la'maab swib mwrng Datq ka'Euad uaq yemg lwib Daauq pun aa-lon zu'q. yaag lovg la'maab Diab mwrng zruj mGxvb peu. cvj lovg puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb Zovj tiub sai Jaaiq Dia.
28.4: ninb Bua xij zu'g zruj Eei zxvb zu'q se pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq, e-fotq, lwib Daauq, Datq taaib Eei lwib Gc'q, mGxvb peu Zauj sai Jaaiq Dia. xij zu'g zruj naaiq teij zruj sai Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj pun meib Eei kxj, aa-lon, Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua zxv Jyenq zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
28.10: yem txnb Lo mivb Tauj txnb faij. yetg nxm la'pyeiq tiu Jyenq Ju'q taub Eei Buaj.
28.22: “xij zu'g weig pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq lovg Jyem kitq Bind taaib zruj limg Navq Laav nx.
28.12: yaag xij zu'g zx'q naaiq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeiq tivj Jyenq e-fotq Eei i puv Ba'taub zruj Javb hog. Navq naaig, aa-lon zanb zang Daam Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei txn Eei Buaj yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen weig pun zyruq Javj ninb Bua.
28.42: “xij zu'g lovg la'maab Dia zruj hruj Txvq Jyenq sin yem Jaaiq Fiag Tauj Zamb zwib.
28.15: “pun puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb zruj Kwaaiq pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq pun sai myenb weig tunj sig. xij zu'g Zauj e-fotq fib Navq Eei zruj. lovg Jyem, pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Zauj la'maab swib mwrng.
28.13: lovg Jyemb finj Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq la'pyeiq,
28.1: “xij zu'g heug meib Eei kxj, aa-lon, Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua, naa-Dapg, aa-Bi-hu, e-le-aa-saa Zauj i-Taa-maa taaib meib naaiq, yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib weig zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
28.26: cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq ka'Diaq uaq teij i nxm kx'q, yem e-fotq Eei ka'Euad mcvj.
28.25: limg tweib mweid pavg Ba'taub uaq teij i nxm la'pyeib lx'g Eatq Jyenq. Navq naaiq nx pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq nctq Jyenq e-fotq Eei kxv Ra'Myen mcvj.

7.18: yem Daaib Eei Byaud zu'g taig. Daaib yaag zweij Revg. i-yipq myenb zuvq hopq maiq tu'q Daaib Eei uam.”+’+”
7.8: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon,
7.3: mq paag yia xij pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg. maiq kunq yia yem i-yipq teib puv zruj Bu'ziaj Rung Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig Zauj Javb hog,
7.21: yem Daaib Eei Byaud taig. uam yaag zweij haig, i-yipq myenb zuvq hopq maiq tu'q. i-yipq teib puv haiq Dau yaag maaib Ryaamq Revg.
7.14: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “faa-lo huvb Eei Hruq vcvg haig, maiq Kavq puvj pc'g fivj mivb.
7.23: faa-lo huvb maiq kwen maiq sig Eei Rwrnj mivb pia'g ninb Eei huvb ting mig a'q.
7.6: mo-se Zauj aa-lon ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq ninb Bua Eei waag zruj.
7.2: ta'faanb yia Paaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq waag, meib xij zu'g Buaj meib Eei kxj, aa-lon. aa-lon zyrug Buaj faa-lo huvb puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq ninb Eei teib puv.
7.20: mo-se Zauj aa-lon zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj Revg. txv Jyenq faa-lo huvb Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Eei Ra'Myen, aa-lon yaamb ninb Eei pyaab Byaag Jiaj nai-aa Daaib kub vwaaig Bx'q uam. naaiq teij uam yetg zuvq zyrug penj Ryaamq Revg.
7.24: i-yipq teib puv Eei zwavj myenb wetq uaq nai-aa Daaib Len lxd uam hopq, weig zu'g Daaib Eei uam maiq penj hopq.
7.7: ninb Bua i taub mivb Zauj huvb tiaj kxvq uaq zang, mo-se Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q petq zyepg Havj. aa-lon tu'q petq zyepg faam.
7.19: zyruq Buaj mo-se, “meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj aa-lon, ‘lovg meib Eei pyaab Byaag suv Jiaj i-yipq teib puv Eei uam kub vwaaig, se Daaib, Do'q, Faavb, haiq Dau maaib uam Eei txvj.’ uam zyrug penj Ryaamq Revg mig a'q. yem i-yipq teib puv haiq Dau, lyemb Dyavb zob Zauj la'pyeib ovj Eei uam, penj Ryaamq Revg.”
7.17: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib mavg yia zruj Eei sig zyrug zia'q tu'q yia tovb haiq taub a'q. mavg og. yia lovg yia Eei pyaab Byaag Bx'q Daaib, Daaib zyrug penj Ryaamq a'q.
7.11: faa-lo zyrug heug ninb Eei kwaib kx'q finb scv Zauj zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb taaib. naaiq teij zruj faatq Eei i-yipq myenb yaag lovg ninb Bua Eei faatq fib Navq Eei zruj.
7.5: yia suv puad tivg i-yipq myenb Eei zwid yaag txb i-saa-laa-en myenb yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, i-yipq myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
7.9: “faa-lo haiq zang kxvq, ‘zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig pun Ziv meib Bua zruj Eei Jauq maa'b!’ xij zu'g Buaj aa-lon, ‘zx'q meib Eei pyaab Byaag kwcvj Fiag faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen.’ pyaab Byaag zyrug penj tiub naav mig a'q.”
7.16: meib yaag xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq, hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq yia taaib Buaj meib “puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb uaq teib puvb Waav zavg yia. mq paag Tauj ib zang meib yaag maiq mwavj.”
7.4: ninb yaag maiq mwavj meib Bua. yia zyrug suv yia Eei puad Jiad taaib Niab Niaq Eei tivg i-yipq myenb Eei zwid, yaag txb kwanb kwanb yia Eei fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq taaib.
7.10: mo-se Zauj aa-lon zyrug mivb faa-lo huvb uaq, ei Jyenq zyruq kxvq Eei waag zruj. aa-lon zx'q ninb Eei pyaab Byaag kwcvj Fiag huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Eei Ra'Myen. pyaab Byaag zyrug penj tiub naav mig a'q.
7.22: mq paag i-yipq Eei Waab Eind myenb lovg ninb Bua Eei faatq fib Navq Eei zruj. faa-lo huvb Eei Hruq zyrug fib Navq Eei vcvg. ninb maiq Kavq mwavj mo-se Zauj aa-lon Eei waag Navq zyruq kxvq nx.
7.12: kx'g myenb zx'q kx'g myenb Eei pyaab Byaag kwcvj Fiag Dau, pyaab Byaag yaag penj naav a'q. mq paag aa-lon Eei pyaab Byaag na'q Revg ninb Bua Eei mig a'q.
7.15: Fav Dxm faa-lo mivb nai-aa Daaib uaq zang, meib xij zu'g mivb uaq pwavb ninb. cvj nanq Jyenq haib penj naav uaq tiub pyaab Byaag mivb yem uaq Daaib Len zuaq ninb.
7.13: maiq kunq Navq naaig, faa-lo huvb Eei Hruq Zxg vcvg, maiq mwavj ninb Bua Eei waag, Navq zyruq kxvq nx.
7.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun meib txv Jyenq faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen zruj Navq Tinb huvb. meib Eei kxj, aa-lon, yaag xij zu'g zruj meib Eei trug waag myenb.
7.25: zyruq Bx'q liud nai-aa Daaib, Ga'haaq Jiaj liud siag Nxi.

29.18: zyavb taub pa'ki yuvb xij zu'g an Jyenq ziab txvb puaq. naaiq se puaq ziag pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq, weib Daav Eei Qiaj hxpg zyruq Eei Hruq. se lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq.
29.45: yia xij yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
29.3: zx'q naaiq teij Fuaq tapq Jyenq Daan. txb vovb kruq Zauj i taub pa'ki yuvb kruq taaib fovg hxg pun yia uaq zang, lyemb naaiq teij Fuaq txb taaib fovg hxg pun yia.
29.43: yia yaag xij yem uaq nxm txvj pwavb i-saa-laa-en myenb. yia Eei Favb laavg zyrug pun naaiq nxm txvj Zivb Revg.
29.14: mq paag vovb Eei Dopq, xq, Zauj Jaavb xij zu'g txb Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g Dopg liub Zyavq puaq kwavg. naaiq se ziag weig fi'q zwid Eei vovb.
29.34: xn myenb zruj sai uaq teij xq Zauj Fuaq, uaq mwrnd Eang maiq Revg nx, luvb Dxm xij zu'g puaq kwavg a'q. maiq tuvq Eang, weig zu'g naaiq teij ka'naaiq se Zivb Revg.
29.2: xij zu'g zruj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq, Zauj zxpg Jyenq ka'lanq yrub maiq maaib pivq Eei Fuaq, Zauj Raatq Jyenq ka'lanq yrub Eei Fuab pia'g. xij zu'g lovg Byaub witq Bwrnb mwrng zruj naaiq teij Fuaq.
29.36: Nxib Nxi xij zu'g lovg taub vovb kruq fovg hxg ziag weig fi'q zwid, yaag weig saaj ziab txvb Zivb Revg. xij zu'g lovg ka'lanq yrub toj ziab txvb weig pun ziab txvb Zivb Revg.
29.35: “meib xij zu'g ziuj yia Paaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq waag xn aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn zruj sai myenb. xij zu'g lovg siag Nxi xn ninb Bua.
29.24: zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Zunq kiv fovg hxg.
29.7: zx'q xn myenb Eei yrub toj Jyenq ninb Eei mGxvq.
29.17: xij zu'g Va'q pa'ki yuvb penj yetg Ganj yetg Ganj. Raauj Revg ka'Euad Hruq Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zwib zyrug txb taaib Zauj mGxvq Zauj xq an Jyenq.
29.11: xij zu'g yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg, taij naaiq taub vovb kruq.
29.33: txb taaib fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq Zauj xn zruj sai myenb fuvj pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq Kuvj sai myenb Eang tu'q Navq. ka'Eiag Eei myenb Eang maiq tu'q weig zu'g naaiq teij ka'naaiq se Zivb Revg Eei.
29.16: xij zu'g taij naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb kruq taaib, txb Ryaamq mivb Pyetq ziab txvb pyei puv.
29.40: luvb Dxm ziag uaq taub xij zu'g lovg i mx'q Bwrnb mwrng zxpg Jyenq yetg kxvg ka'lanq yrub. cvj fovg hxg yetg kxvg a'vung tiuq weig Ziaq ziag.
29.37: xij zu'g linb Jyenq siag Nxi, Nxib Nxi saaj ziab txvb Zivb Revg. ziag txvb zyrug Zivb Revg haig. haiq Euvg Kwatq zu'g ziab txvb nx, uaq Euvg zyrug Zivb Revg mig a'q.
29.4: txb aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua taaib Tauj wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg lovg uam Raauj ninb Bua Eei sin.
29.12: lovg meib Eei puab Do'q Zo'q vovb Eei Ryaamq zaij Jyenq ziab txvb Eei Jxv. zevg uaq teij Ryaamq toj Jyenq ziab txvb Eei kxn.
29.46: ninb Bua zuvq xij hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, tovb txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv weig yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj. yia se zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
29.13: zx'q ka'Euad Hruq Eei yetg zuvq Mei, Zauj pwav Lan Eei Meib Byxvd, i nxm Eutg zeiq Zauj nctq Eutg zeiq Eei Mei, an ziab txvb puaq.
29.26: cvj zx'q xn aa-lon zruj sai naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb kruq Eei lx'g Ywav xq yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Zunq kiv fovg hxg, weig zruj Zunq kiv fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq. naaiq teij xq zyrug penj meib Bua Eei pwrng a'q.
29.28: naaiq se i-saa-laa-en myenb xij zu'g pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua yetg liud tu'q Eei pwrng. se i-saa-laa-en myenb fovg hxg ziag weig Jiu Tov fuvj pun zyruq tu'q Eei pwrng.
29.8: txb aa-lon Eei txn Bua taaib yaag Tevj ninb Bua zu'q Jyenq lwib Daauq.
29.9: zx'q Dia Byxvd Jyenq ninb Bua Eei mGxvq. pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn sai Jyenq sai Jaaiq Dia. ninb Bua zyrug maaib leid yetg liud zruj sai myenb. meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx xn aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua zruj sai myenb.
29.32: aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua xij zu'g yem wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg Eang naaiq taub yuvb Eei xq Zauj Daan ka'Euad Eei Fuaq.
29.21: cvj zx'q teij yem ziab txvb Eei Ryaamq Zauj teij xn myenb Eei yrub fu'q aa-lon Zauj aa-lon Eei lwib hruj. cvj fu'q aa-lon Eei txn Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj. Navq naaiq zruj, aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj zyrug Zivb Revg, fuvj pun zyruq mig a'q.
29.23: cvj zx'q yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen maiq an pivq uaq Daan Fuaq. zx'q nxm maiq zxpg ka'lanq yrub Eei Fuaq, zx'q nxm zxpg ka'lanq yrub, cvj zx'q nxm Fuab pia'g.
29.6: zx'q mGxvb peu peu Jyenq ninb Eei mGxvq. cvj zx'q Zivb Revg uaq Kwaaiq Jyemb paaib Eatq Jyenq mGxvb peu.
29.44: “yia xij saaj wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Zauj ziab txvb Zivb Revg, yaag saaj aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua Zivb Revg, weig pun ninb Bua zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
29.20: taij naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb taaib, zx'q teij Ryaamq Raatq aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua Eei Byaaug mcvj mnxmb pyruq Zauj ninb Bua Eei Byaaug Jia'q puab Do'g Eeid Zauj Byaaug Jia'q zaub Do'g Eeid. zevg Fiag Eei Ryaamq Pyetq ziab txvb pyei puv.
29.5: zx'q aa-lon Eei zruj sai lwi pun ninb zu'q Jyenq. zx'q ka'Euad uaq yemg lwib Daauq Zauj e-fotq Eei lwi pun ninb zu'q Jyenq, yaag zx'q e-fotq kanb Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq. cvj zx'q pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq pwav Jyenq la'Kwrtq. zx'q puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb Datq taaib lovj Eei sai Jaaiq Dia, lyemb e-fotq sai Jyenq.
29.19: “cvj zx'q ta'Eeig taub pa'ki yuvb kruq taaib pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua maan Jyenq pa'ki yuvb Eei mGxvq.
29.38: “naaiq se meib Nxib Nxi xij zu'g txb taaib fovg hxg an ziab txvb ziag Eei ka'naaiq. se i taub txij Havj Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, yaag maiq tuvq Gc'q yetg Nxi.
29.31: “xn myenb zruj sai myenb uaq taub pa'ki yuvb kruq Eei xq xij zu'g yem nxm Zivb Revg Eei txvj zruq.
29.27: “xn myenb zruj sai myenb uaq taub pa'ki yuvb kruq Eei lx'g Ywav xq Zauj zwib Zunq kiv fovg hxg liud zyrug penj aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua Eei mig a'q.
29.41: Ryemb yaavb ziag uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn yaag fib Navq Eei. zx'q fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g Zauj Ziaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq yetg Fiag puaq. naaiq se lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq, weib Daav Eei Qiaj hxpg zyruq Eei Hruq.
29.1: “meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj weig saaj aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua Zivb Revg taaib zruj sai myenb fub suj yia. xij zu'g zx'q taub vovb kruq Zaan Zauj i taub pa'ki yuvb kruq, yetg zuvq maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei.
29.39: luvb Dxm ziag taub, Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog ziag taub.
29.10: “txb vovb kruq taaib wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Ra'Myen mcvj. aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua xij zu'g txb puad maan Jyenq vovb Eei mGxvq.
29.25: xij zu'g zipq yem ninb Bua Eei puad naaiq teij ka'naaiq taaib an Jyenq ziab txvb Zauj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq yetg Fiag puaq, weib Daav Eei Qiaj hxpg zyruq Eei Hruq. se lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq.
29.22: “meib xij zu'g zx'q naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb kruq Eei Mei Zauj Jung Eei tweiq, ka'Euad Hruq Eei Mei Zauj pwav Lan Eei xb Byxvd, i nxm Eutg zeiq Zauj nctq Eutg zeiq Eei Mei Zauj Byaaug puv zaub zwib. (naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb se weig xn myenb zruj sai myenb.)
29.42: “txig Jiaj txig xij zu'g yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg, zanb zang lovg naaiq teij ka'naaiq puaq ziag. yia yaag xij yem uaq pwavb meib, Zauj meib kxvq waag.
29.15: “cvj txb taub uaq teij pa'ki yuvb kruq taaib pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua maan Jyenq pa'ki yuvb Eei mGxvq.
29.29: “aa-lon zruj sai myenb Eei zxvb zu'q xij zu'g pun ninb Eei txnb Jweiq funb fa'q Ripg Jyenq yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig. haiq zang toj yrub xn ninb Bua zruj sai myenb, ninb Bua xij zu'g zu'q Jyenq.
29.30: Ripg Jyenq aa-lon zruj sai myenb uaq taub txn pia'g wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub, Zivb Revg Eei txvj, fub suj zyruq, xij zu'g zu'q naaiq teij zruj sai Eei lwib hruj pwavq siag Nxi.

19.18: trub syruj om Jyenq si-naai Bov weig zu'g zyruq yem trud ka'Euad Fiag Bov. trub syruj Zutg Zutq Eei faauj Navq puaq tomb trub Raug nx. zyavb nxm Bov yaag tovd tu'q seij haig.
19.8: zwavj myenb lomb Rxib tau, “zyruq kxvq Eei waag yia Bua yaag xij ei Jyenq zruj Revg.” mo-se cvj trug pc'g fivj Eei waag Buaj zyruq
19.3: mo-se zyrug faauj Tauj Tinb huvb uaq. zyruq yaag yem uaq Bov heug mo-se. meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, naaiq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb,
19.21: zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib xij zu'g Fiag mivb hatg pc'g fivj maiq tuvq Jiaj Daavg Bovb Genj taaib mavg yia. Riaj haib maaib myenb Zamq Eei zu'g taig.
19.14: mo-se yem Bov Fiag taaib Buaj pc'g fivj pun kanb Zivb Revg, Roj Revg lwib hruj.
19.23: mo-se kxvq Buaj zyruq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq haib faauj si-naai Bov weig zu'g meib kanb hatg yia Bua, ‘xij zu'g tivg zyavj Bovb Genj kxmj naaiq nxm Bov, funj naaiq nxm Bov zruj Zivb Revg Bov.’+”
19.6: meib Bua xij zruj yetg fivj sai myenb fub suj yia, yaag penj yia Eei Zivb Revg fivj.’ naaiq teij waag meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb.”
19.2: ninb Bua Zwrtq le-fi-Dim teig swiq mivb Tauj si-naai teib puvb Waav, lyepg Zyavq yem si-naai Bov Ra'Myen mcvj.
19.20: zyruq Fiag Tauj si-naai Bovb nivq cvj heug mo-se faauj uaq Bovb nivq. mo-se zyrug faauj a'q.
19.24: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Fiag mivb txb aa-lon Zauj meib faauj naaiq taaib. mq paag maiq tuvq pun sai myenb Zauj pc'g fivj Jiaj Bovb Genj faauj yia naaiq. maiq zei c'q, yia xij tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.”
19.7: mo-se zyrug Rwrnj mivb heug i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib zunq, zyav zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb Eei yetg zuvq waag Buaj ninb Bua.
19.19: Ratg Eei Qiaj yaag kunq zruj kunq Bwi. mo-se Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq waag, Tinb huvb yaag tau mo-se Navq Ba'ov Bwi nx.
19.17: mo-se txb pc'g fivj Zwrtq Dopg liub Zyavq mivb pwavb Tinb huvb. ninb Bua zyrug mivb sruq Jyenq Bovb Jua'q.
19.11: Tauj ta'faam Nxi uaq Nxi, xij zu'g liug leid zyavj, weig zu'g ta'faam Nxi zyruq xij Fiag si-naai Bov pun zwavj pc'g fivj pwatg.
19.5: sij kxvq meib Bua mwavj yia Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq yia Eei vcvg waag zruj, meib Bua zyrug penj yia yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj kinq taaib Eei myenb, weig zu'g naaiq luvb Diaq yetg zuvq se yia Eei.
19.9: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yia xij yem Bwrnj hod Eei taaib lxd meib, weig pun pc'g fivj mwavj tu'q haid yia Zauj meib kxvq waag zyrug yetg liud syenj meib.” mo-se cvj trug pc'g fivj Eei waag Buaj zyruq.
19.16: ta'faam Nxi uaq Dxm pxvd Ba'livg, Ba'ov Bwi. maaib Bwrnj hod Eei taaib om Jyenq Bov. cvj maaib Ratg Eei Qiaj Bwi. yem Zyavq Eei myenb yetg zuvq kamb Riaj haig, sin zinj Revg.
19.4: ‘meib Bua kanb pwatg yia Navq haiq nx zruj pun i-yipq myenb. yaag hiuq tu'q yia Navq haiq nx txb meib Bua taaib Tauj yia naaiq, se Navq tomb Jaavq zx'q txn an Jyenq Daatq kub vwaaig Daij nx.
19.10: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib xij zu'g Buaj pc'g fivj, ib Nxi Zauj Fav Nxi xij zu'g pun kanb Zivb Revg, yaag Roj Revg lwib hruj.
19.22: lyemb taaib fatq yia, zyruq, uaq teij sai myenb xij zu'g saaj kanb Zivb Revg. maiq zei c'q, yia xij tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.”
19.12: xij zu'g tivg zyavj Bovb Genj Wiv kxmj Bov cvj Buaj myenb, ‘xij zu'g faij fim, maiq tuvq faauj Bov yaag maiq tuvq Kwatq zu'g Bovb Jua'q. haiq taub Kwatq zu'g zuvq xij zu'g taij taig.
19.15: ninb cvj Buaj ninb Bua, “Tauj ta'faam Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g liug leid zyavj. yaag xij zu'g keg, maiq tuvq Zauj msia'q txn pweij.”
19.13: yaag maiq tuvq lovg puad mua'q ninb. xij zu'g zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig fai lovg Jwavb zinj pwrnq taig. maiq kunq myenb fai scvb Kuq, maiq tuvq lyrub ninb Eei mcvg.’ Tauj haid pyomq Ratg Eei Qiaj Daauq Eei zyavb hog Zivj taaib haib mivb nitq fatq Bov.”
19.1: i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, Ga'haaq pwavq pua Laaj Eia'g uaq Nxi, ninb Bua mivb Tauj si-naai teib puvb Waav.
19.25: mo-se zyrug Fiag mivb zyav naaiq teij waag Buaj pc'g fivj.

17.3: mq paag zwavj myenb Jaav Gaatq tu'q Kruq haig, zyrug vopq mo-se. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib weig haiq tiug txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv? xij pun yia Bua Zauj yia Bua Eei fu'Jweiq Zauj yia Bua Eei scvb Kuq vxg uam taig?”
17.8: aa-maa-lekq myenb taaib Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj yem le-fi-Dim teig.
17.9: mo-se Buaj yo-su-waa, “kinq teij Bua Eei myenb Zwrtq mivb Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb Bx'q Jaaj. Fav Nxi yia nanq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei pyaab Byaag sruq Jyenq Bovb nivq kub vwaaig.”
17.7: uaq nxm txvj mo-se Zwrtq Buaj heug matq-saaj Zauj me-li-Baa weig zu'g tovb uaq nxm txvj i-saa-laa-en myenb vopq yaag xij seij zyruq. ninb Bua seij mavg kaaj, “zyruq za'kevb Zauj Bua yem fai maiq yem?”
17.5: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “txb i ziaj taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb koj Jiaj pc'g fivj Eei uaq Daavg mcvj mivb. yaag txb Jyenq meib lovg Bx'q nai-aa Daaib uaq tiub pyaab Byaag mivb.
17.16: ninb kxvq, “maaib puad suv Jyenq zyruq Eei weig  zyruq hruq Jyenq waag xij txig Jiaj txig Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb Bx'q Jaaj.”
17.14: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “naaiq teij sig xij zu'g fiaq Jyenq srub Fung weig pun myenb Javj, yaag xij zu'g Buaj yo-su-waa, yia xij zruj pun aa-maa-lekq myenb zutg Revg. yem naaiq luvb Diaq lyemb maiq maaib haiq taub Javj tu'q ninb Bua.”
17.4: mo-se Qa'q tauj kauj Toq zyruq, “yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx txb naaiq teij myenb? ninb Bua zuvq xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig yia a'q.”
17.2: ninb Bua zyrug vopq mo-se. ninb Bua kxvq, “lxd uam pun yia Bua hopq maa'b!” mo-se tau, “meib Bua vopq yia zruj haiq Euvg? meib Bua weig haiq tiug seij zyruq. ”
17.6: yem si-naai Bov yia xij yem meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen sruq Jyenq la'pyeib zxv kub vwaaig. meib Bx'q la'pyeiq, la'pyeiq zyrug Zwrtq uam pun pc'g fivj hopq.” mo-se zyrug txv Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei myenb koj Navq naaiq nx zruj.
17.13: yo-su-waa zyrug lovg Ru'g Daauq Bx'q hivb aa-maa-lekq myenb.
17.12: mo-se suv kau puad, puad Ewij haig. aa-lon Zauj hu-aa zyrug lxd nxm la'pyeiq pun ninb zweid Jyenq, yetg taub yem puv, paaq Jyenq mo-se Eei puad. ninb Eei puad zyrug suv Jyenq Tauj Ba'Nxi mwrtq.
17.15: mo-se Zeij nxm ziab txvb Zwrtq Buaj heug, “zyruq se yia Eei keb.”
17.11: ta'faanb mo-se suv Jyenq puad, i-saa-laa-en myenb hivb. mo-se puvj puad Fiag nx, aa-maa-lekq myenb Jiad kxn hivb a'q.
17.1: zwavj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq sinj teib puvb Waav, ei zyruq kxvq Eei waag yetg Kav swiq Jiaj yetg Kav. swiq Jyenq mivb zyrug lyepg Zyavq yem le-fi-Dim. uaq nxm txvj yaag maiq maaib uam pun pc'g fivj hopq.
17.10: yo-su-waa zyrug ei Jyenq mo-se Eei waag zruj, Zwrtq mivb Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb Bx'q Jaaj. mo-se, aa-lon Zauj hu-aa faauj uaq Jiaj Bovb nivq.

38.18: Bc'g laatg kcvb Eei Dia ninb Bua lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg zxpg Jyenq la'maab swib mwrng Datq taaib, yaag maaib puab taub Zovj Zovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Zovj. Bc'g kcvb Dia Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g, yaag Navq weib laatg Eei Dia, Lav pyaa Dx'g.
38.8: ninb lovg tovb si'q zruj punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq. se lovg yem wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg fub suj zyruq uaq teij msia'q txn Eei tovb si'q kivj zruj.
38.3: ninb zruj ziab txvb Eei Jaab txvj. maaib Zcv, ka'naaib Zenq, punb, tomb pa'kenb Eaapq, syru trud Eei Jei, yetg zuvq lovg tovb si'q zruj.
38.21: naaiq se Dopg liub lovg Eei ka'naaiq Eei sruj mrug, se lcvd vcvg waag Eei Dopg liub, ziuj mo-se Paaiq le-wi myenb fiaq Fiag srub taan. yaag yem aa-lon sai myenb Eei txn, i-Taa-maa, Eei puab Diaq.
38.14: Bc'g yetg puv kcvb Len Dia, Daauq zyepg Mmd Dx'g, maaib pua nxm tovg, pua nxm Taapq Topq pua nxm tovg.
38.23: cvj maaib Daan fivj, aa-hi-saa-makq Eei txn, o-ho-li-apg, Tevj ninb zruj kov. ninb maaib puab taub zruj zavg, haib Namq Zwrtq za'eij zruj Zamb Euvg, yaag haib lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng Zovj Zovj.
38.6: ninb lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj kcv ziab txvb Eei Dyavj, yaag lovg tovb si'q pwav Jyenq.
38.2: ziab txvb Eei pyei nxm kx'q zruj Jyenq Jxv Zauj ziab txvb Eei Dyavj zyavb Jyenq. cvj lovg tovb si'q pwav Jyenq ziab txvb.
38.20: Bxv Dau Zxv Dopg liub Eei tovg Zauj Bxv Dau Zxv weib kxmj Dopg liub Eei laatg yetg zuvq yaag lovg tovb si'q zruj.
38.24: myenb fovg hxg weig zruj sivj ting Eei yetg zuvq kov maaib Jyem lua'g pc'q Eig zyepg feij Jxib ziuj sivj ting tivg taaib Eei Niab taaub.
38.28: zevg uaq teij zyepg Eeig Jxib pyenj Eaanb lovg zruj tovg Eei vau, pwav tovg tweib mweid yaag zruj tovg Eei pyaaq.
38.7: ninb zx'q kcv Eei Dyavj Zunj Jyenq ziab txvb i puv ka'Len Eei Kwiv weig kcv ziab txvb. ziab txvb lovg Dyavb penq kapq taaib, ka'Euad Fovd Eei.
38.29: myenb fovg hxg Eei tovb si'q maaib yetg Zin feij pc'q petq zyepg lua'g Jxib.
38.19: maaib pyei nxm tovg Zauj Topq tovg Eei pyei nxm tovb si'q Taapq. tovg Eei vau Zauj pyaaq lovg Eaanb zruj. tovg tweib mweid yaag pwav Jyenq Eaanb.
38.17: tovg Eei Taapq lovg tovb si'q zruj. tovg Eei vau Zauj pyaaq lovg Eaanb zruj. tovg Eei tweib mweid yaag pwav Jyenq Eaanb. nxmb nxm tovg maaib Eaanb pyaaq px'q Jyenq mivb.
38.31: cvj lovg tovb si'q zruj laatg tovg Eei Taapq Zauj pia'g laatg kcvb Daavg uaq teij tovg Eei Taapq, Zauj Bxv Dau Zxv Dopg liub, Zxv weib kxmj Eei laatg tovg.
38.30: naaiq teij tovb si'q ninb Bua lovg zruj wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei kcvb Eei tovg Eei Taapq, yaag zruj tovb si'q ziab txvb, zruj ziab txvb Eei tovb si'q Pycv, yaag zruj ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig.
38.27: ninb Bua lovg i Zin yetg pc'q Jxib Eaanb zruj sivj ting Eei yetg pc'q nxm Taapq Zauj Bc'g kcvb Dia Eei tovg Eei Taapq. yetg nxm Taapq lovg Eig zyepg yetq Jxib Eaanb zruj.
38.11: pa'q puv laatg yaag fib Navq Eei zruj Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, maaib Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q tovg Topq Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q Taapq. tovg yaag maaib Eaanb vau Eaanb pyaaq tivj Jyenq.
38.5: ninb cvj lovg tovb si'q toj pyei nxm Kwiv tivj Jyenq Pycv Eei pyei nxm kx'q, weig Zunj Dyavj kcv.
38.9: Ga'haaq ninb Bua zruj laatg weib Jyenq Dopg liub. laatg Eei naamb puv ninb Bua zruj Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, lovg la'maab Diab mwrng Bc'g Jyenq.
38.16: weib pyei puv laatg Eei Dia yetg zuvq lovg la'maab Diab mwrng zruj.
38.4: ninb cvj lovg tovb si'q weig ziab txvb zruj Pycv nctq Jyenq ziab txvb Eei pyenb ka'Diaq mcvj, yem Daamb ziab txvb Fiag.
38.10: maaib Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q tovg Topq Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q Taapq. tovg yaag maaib Eaanb vau Eaanb pyaaq tivj Jyenq.
38.22: yu-Daa fivj, hu-aa Eei fun, u-li Eei txn, Be-saa-len, zruj Euvb Euvg ziuj zyruq Paaib Pruj mo-se.
38.12: fai puv mcvj Eei laatg Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, maaib zyepg nxm tovg zyepg nxm Taapq. tovg yaag tivj Jyenq Eaanb vau Eaanb pyaaq.
38.15: uaq puv kcvb Len yaag maaib Dia Daauq zyepg Mmd Dx'g Bc'g Jyenq, yaag maaib pua nxm tovg, pua nxm Taapq.
38.13: tov puv mcvj yaag fib Navq Eei, Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g.
38.1: ninb cvj lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb, Daauq pyaa Dx'g, Javq pyaa Dx'g feib puv, Lav pua Dx'g.
38.26: yetg taub Zwrtq yetg zinb faamb pwrn ziuj sivj ting tivg taaib Eei Niab taaub. ta'faanb faauj Buaj Eei myenb, Eig zyepg Havj faauj mcvj Eei mJavg txn maaib Ju'q sinj pua Zin Mmd pc'q Mmd zyepg taub.
38.25: faauj Buaj saauq Eei myenb Zwrtq Eei Eaanb maaib i Zin yetg pc'q zyepg lua'g Jxib ziuj sivj ting tivg taaib Eei Niab taaub.

31.18: zyruq yem si-naai Bov Zauj mo-se kxvq liud waag, ninb zx'q fiaq Jyenq lcvd Eei vcvg waag uaq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq Jiu pun mo-se, se Tinb huvb lovg puab Do'q fiaq Eei la'pyeib penq.
31.3: yia pun ninb maaib Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb pwavq Revg, pun ninb maaib puab taub lovj, maaib panb zeig yaag maaib Zovb mevb zruj zavg, haib zruj Euvb Euvg kov.
31.8: tiab Zauj tiab Eei Jaab sig, Jyemb tav Zauj Jyemb tav Eei Jaab sig, puaq huv tiab,
31.9: puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb Zauj ziab txvb Eei Jaab sig, tovb si'q punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq,
31.7: yia pun ninb Bua haib zruj wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub, zruj lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj Zeij en Eei weig, zruj Dopg liub Eei Euvb Euvg Jaab txvj,
31.5: haib kaatq la'pyeib Jaaij, Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq, haib zruj Dyavb zavg tiu pyavb tiu pyruq, yaag haib zruj maang mwrtg lovg puab taub zruj Rweig Eei kov.
31.16: i-saa-laa-en myenb txig Jiaj txig xij zu'g syru tivb kov Nxi zruj yetg liud lyepg Eei vcvg waag.
31.17: naaiq se yia Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg liud zruj Eei Javb hog, weig zu'g yia, zyruq, lovg Ju'q Nxi zeij luvb zeij Dau. siag Nxi uaq Nxi yia tivb kov hitq Kwrnj.’+”
31.14: “+‘xij zu'g syru tivb kov Nxi, se weig meib Bua penj Zivb Revg Nxi. haiq taub paamd naaiq nxm Nxi, zuvq xij zu'g taij kwavg. haiq taub lovg naaiq nxm Nxi zruj kov, uaq taub yem ninb Eei myenb Bu'Dovj xij zu'g Pai kwavg.
31.4: haib taaq Zwrtq za'eij lovg Jyem, lovg Eaanb, lovg tovb si'q zruj Euvb Euvg Jaab sig,
31.2: “mavg maa'b! yia kinq taub yu-Daa fivj Eei myenb, hu-aa Eei fun, u-li Eei txn, Be-saa-len.
31.6: yia yaag Paaiq Daan fivj, aa-hi-saa-makq Eei txn, o-ho-li-apg, Tevj Jyenq Be-saa-len. yia yaag pun taub taub puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb maaib panb zeig zruj Euvb Euvg Navq yia Paaiq meib zruj uaq nx.
31.13: “xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, ‘meib Bua xij zu'g syru yia Eei tivb kov Nxi weig zu'g naaiq nxm Nxi yem yia Zauj meib Bua Bu'Dovj txig Jiaj txig zruj Javb hog, weig pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, tovb pun meib Bua Zivb Revg uaq taub.
31.15: meib Bua lovg Ju'q Nxi zruj kov, mq paag siag Nxi uaq Nxi se tivb kov Nxi, xij zu'g hitq Kwrnj, se Zivb Revg Nxi fuvj pun zyruq. haiq taub lovg uaq nxm Nxi zruj kov, xij zu'g taij taig.
31.11: xn myenb Eei yrub Zauj yem Zivb Revg uaq Qovj puaq Eei huv. ninb Bua xij zu'g ziuj yia Paaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq zruj Revg.”
31.10: zruj taaib Rweig Eei lwib hruj, se aa-lon zruj sai Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj Zauj ninb Eei txn zruj sai myenb Eei kov Eei zyavb hog zu'q Eei lwib hruj,

30.18: “meib xij zu'g lovg tovb si'q zruj nxm Raauj puab zauj punb, cvj lovg tovb si'q zruj nxm Taapq weig Taapq punb. txb mivb ton Jyenq wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Zauj ziab txvb Bu'Dovj, zaavb Jyenq uam.
30.8: Ryemb yaavb puaq tav Eei zyavb hog, ninb xij zu'g cvj puaq huv. xij zu'g txig Jiaj txig yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen zanb zang puaq huv.
30.33: haiq taub Peuj naaiq Euvg yrub taaib lovg fai la'kwaib toj maiq zeid zruj sai Eei myenb, uaq taub yem ninb Eei myenb Bu'Dovj zuvq zu'g Pai kwavg.’+”
30.3: xij zu'g lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq tiab kub vwaaig mcvj, pyei puv tiab Len Zauj Jxv. cvj lovg Jyem zruj pin hxmb kxmj tiab Len.
30.32: naaiq Euvg yrub maiq tuvq la'kwaib toj maiq zeid zruj sai myenb Eei myenb. yaag maiq tuvq lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij Peuj taaib weig kanb Euvg Jauq lovg. naaiq teij yrub se Zivb Revg. xij zu'g Javj Jyenq za'kevb Zivb Revg.
30.21: yaag xij zu'g Raauj puab zauj Zivj taaib maiq taig. naaiq se aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun txig Jiaj txig, yetg liud xij zu'g kan Eei leid.”
30.35: pun taub Peuj ka'naaib Daav Eei zavg myenb Peuj naaiq teij ka'naaiq zruj huv. cvj zxpg teij Rauq pun huv Zivb Revg, maiq maaib wij.
30.14: ta'faanb faauj Buaj saauq Eei myenb, yem Eig zyepg Havj faauj mcvj, xij zu'g Zwrtq naaiq teij zua'g mcvg Eaanb fovg hxg pun zyruq.
30.23: “zx'q naaiq teij Daav Eei laapg liug, mu-yxg uam pua Jxib Zauj Eig zyepg Juaq luvd, Jiab lrub Dyavb Dopq yetg Jxib faab zyepg petq luvd, zaab Gaan yetg Jxib faab zyepg petq luvd,
30.6: naaiq nxm puaq huv tiab xij zu'g an Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen, Bc'g kcvb Dia ka'Eiag, se yem lcvd vcvg waag faav Eei faavb Gaaij uaq nxm Zeij en Eei weig Ra'Myen mcvj. se yia xij pwavb meib Eei txvj.
30.34: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “zx'q naaiq teij Daav Eei laapg liug taaib Euvb Euvg fib Bua'g. maaib Euvg Dyavb zuvb Daav, Zauj Qa'motq Zauj x-weij cvj Zauj kanb Euvg Dyavb zuv heug faan-ken-sen.
30.2: naaiq nxm tiab xij zu'g yetg Dx'g feib puv, yetg Dx'g Daauq, yetg Dx'g Javq, i Dx'g Lav. pyei puv kx'q Eei Jxv Zauj tiab zyavb Jyenq yetg Dovb Dyavj.
30.36: zx'q teij huv mxg penj Bwrnq txb mivb wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub ka'Euad an Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen mcvj, tovb yia xij pwavb meib Eei txvj. meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq naaiq teij huv za'kevb Zivb Revg Jiaj Eei huv.
30.20: ninb Bua haiq zang pia'g wig pwavb Dopq liub, ninb Bua xij zu'g Raauj puab zauj Zivj taaib maiq taig. haiq zang mivb fatq ziab txvb weig fub suj, se txb ka'naaiq lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg pun zyruq,
30.24: kaan-Bun pua Jxib Eig zyepg Juaq luvd. (naaiq teij yetg zuvq xij zu'g ziuj sivj ting tivg taaib Eei Niab taaub.) cvj zxpg pyei kxvg ka'lanq yrub.
30.28: toj puaq ziag ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb Zauj ziab txvb Eei Jaab sig, lyemb punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq.
30.7: “aa-lon Dxmb Dxm taaib liug leid tav Eei zyavb hog, ninb xij zu'g yem uaq puaq huv tiab puaq huv.
30.29: xij zu'g saaj Revg naaiq teij ka'naaiq, yetg zuvq zyrug penj kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq. ta'faanb haiq Euvg Kwatq zu'g naaiq teij ka'naaiq, uaq Euvg zyrug Zivb Revg a'q.
30.19: aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua xij zu'g lovg Raauj puab zauj.
30.38: haiq taub Peuj naaiq Euvg huv taaib weig kanb lovg zruj Daav Eei Qiaj, uaq taub yem ninb Eei myenb Bu'Dovj zuvq zu'g Pai kwavg.”
30.31: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘naaiq se yia Eei Zivb Revg yrub weig txig Jiaj txig yetg liud lovg.
30.30: “cvj zx'q naaiq teij yrub toj aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua saaj ninb Bua Zivb Revg weig zruj sai myenb fub suj yia.
30.27: tiab Zauj tiab Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, toj tav Zauj tav Eei Jaab sig, toj puaq huv tiab,
30.5: kcv tiab Dyavj yaag xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj pwav Jyenq Jyem.
30.9: maiq tuvq txb maiq maaib leid lovg Eei huv an naaiq nxm tiab puaq. yaag maiq tuvq txb puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai ziag Eei laavb zi'g fai Ziaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq an naaiq nxm tiab fovg hxg.
30.16: meib syru i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq naaiq teij zua'g mcvg Eei Eaanb, xij zu'g lovg weig wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq, weig yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen pun zyruq Javj i-saa-laa-en myenb, weig zua'g meib Bua Eei mcvg.”
30.37: maiq tuvq lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij Peuj taaib weig kanb lovg. xij zu'g Javj Jyenq naaiq teij huv se Zivb Revg, fuvj pun zyruq.
30.4: cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq i puv tiab ka'Len, pin ka'Diaq mcvj, weig Zunj Dyavj kcv tiab.
30.10: yetg Havj yetg Rung aa-lon xij zu'g saaj Rung puaq huv tiab Eei wij. txig Jiaj txig, Havb Havj xij zu'g lovg ziag fi'q zwid uaq taub scvb Kuq Eei Ryaamq zaij tiab Jxv. naaiq nxm tiab zyrug kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj fuvj pun zyruq. ”
30.12: “meib faauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb hrud uaq zang, taub taub myenb xij zu'g Zwrtq Eaanb pun zyruq, weig zua'g kanb Eei mcvg. Navq naaig, meib saauq ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog Zivj taaib maiq pwavb zu'g haiq Euvg ze'g naang.
30.15: meib Bua txb weig zua'g mcvg Eei yetg zinb faamb pwrn Eaanb fovg hxg pun zyruq, myenb maaib myenb yaag maiq Zwrtq kaub Zamq. myenb Jomg myenb yaag maiq Zwrtq kaub zo'g.
30.13: ta'faanb saauq pia'g myenb hrud taan Eei mrud taub myenb xij zu'g Zwrtq yetg zinb faamb pwrn Eaanb ziuj sivj ting tivg taaib Eei Niab taaub. naaiq teij yetg zinb faamb pwrn Eaanb se weig fovg hxg pun zyruq.
30.1: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm puaq huv tiab.
30.26: lovg naaiq teij yrub toj wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Zauj lcvd vcvg waag faav,
30.25: pun taub Peuj ka'naaib Daav Eei zavg myenb zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq Peuj taaib Daav Eei, zruj penj xn myenb Eei Zivb Revg yrub.

27.18: Dopg liub Eei laatg xij zu'g Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, Javq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, Lav pyaa Dx'g yaag lovg la'maab Diab mwrng Bc'g Jyenq. laatg tovg Eei Taapq yetg zuvq lovg tovb si'q zruj taaib.
27.3: xij zu'g zruj syru saaiq Eei Jei, ka'naaib Zenq, punb, tomb pa'kenb Eaapq, Zauj syru trud Eei Jei. ziab txvb Eei Jaab txvj yetg zuvq xij zu'g lovg tovb si'q zruj.
27.8: xij zu'g lovg Dyavb penq zruj ziab txvb, zruj taaib ka'Euad Fovd Eei, ziuj yem Bov yia Buaj Jiaj meib Eei Euvg zeiq.
27.19: Dopg liub Eei Jaab txvj yetg zuvq lovg tovb si'q zruj taaib. Bxv Dau Zxv Dopg liub Eei tovg Zauj Bxv Dau Zxv laatg Eei tovg yetg zuvq yaag lovg tovb si'q zruj.
27.9: “meib xij zu'g zruj Dopg liub Eei laatg. laatg Eei naamb puv xij zu'g Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, lovg la'maab Diab mwrng Bc'g Jyenq.
27.7: naaiq teij kcv Eei Dyavj xij zu'g Zunj Jyenq ziab txvb i puv ka'Len Eei Kwiv weig kcv ziab txvb.
27.5: Pycv xij zu'g nctq Jyenq ziab txvb Eei pyenb ka'Diaq mcvj, yem Daamb ziab txvb Fiag.
27.16: Bc'g laatg kcvb Eei Dia, Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g. lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng Datq taaib yaag maaib puab taub Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Zovj. yaag maaib pyei nxm tovg Topq pyei nxm Taapq.
27.20: “Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb txb zaaj taaib kaub lovj Jiaj Eei ka'lanq yrub taaib tinb tav weig pun tav zanb zang zia'g Jyenq.
27.17: weib Dopg liub Eei laatg xij zu'g maaib Eaanb pyaaq Zxv Jyenq tovg weig pun ninb wrnq. tovg cvj tivj Jyenq Eaanb vau. Topq tovg Eei Taapq yaag lovg tovb si'q zruj.
27.14: Bc'g yetg puv kcvb Len Dia xij zu'g Daauq zyepg Mmd Dx'g, maaib pua nxm tovg, pua nxm Taapq Topq pua nxm tovg.
27.4: lovg tovb si'q weig ziab txvb zruj Kwaaiq Pycv. Pycv Eei pyei nxm kx'q, yetg nxm kx'q maaib yetg nxm tovb si'q Kwiv.
27.21: yem wig pwavb Dopq liub ka'Euad, Bc'g lcvd vcvg waag faav uaq Kwaaiq Dia ka'Eiag mcvj, aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua xij zu'g liug leid tav yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen zanb zang zia'g Jyenq luvb maanb Mwavj Tauj luvb Dxm. naaiq se i-saa-laa-en myenb xij zu'g yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig, yetg liud Ripg Eei leid.
27.2: ziab txvb Eei pyei nxm kx'q xij zu'g zruj Jyenq Jxv, Zauj ziab txvb Eei Dyavj zyavb Jyenq, cvj lovg tovb si'q pwav Jyenq ziab txvb.
27.6: kcv ziab txvb Eei Dyavj xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj, yaag lovg tovb si'q pwav Jyenq.
27.13: tov puv mcvj Eei laatg Javq Mmd zyepg Dx'g.
27.12: “fai puv mcvj Eei laatg Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, yaag Bc'g Jyenq Dia. maaib zyepg nxm laatg tovg Zauj zyepg nxm Topq tovg Eei Taapq.
27.15: uaq puv kcvb Len yaag maaib Dia Daauq zyepg Mmd Dx'g Bc'g Jyenq, yaag maaib pua nxm tovg, pua nxm Taapq.
27.11: pa'q puv mcvj Eei laatg yaag maaib Dia Bc'g Jyenq fib Navq Eei, Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g. maaib Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q tovg Topq Jyenq Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q Taapq. uaq teij tovg yaag maaib Eaanb vau Eaanb pyaaq.
27.1: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm ziab txvb, Daauq pyaa Dx'g, Javq pyaa Dx'g feib puv, Lav pua Dx'g.
27.10: xij zu'g maaib Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q tovg Topq Jyenq Eig zyepg nxm tovb si'q Taapq. uaq teij tovg xij zu'g maaib Eaanb vau Eaanb pyaaq.

11.3: (zyruq pun i-yipq myenb Gxi fim Gxi eij i-saa-laa-en myenb. maiq taan Bua'g naaiq, yem i-yipq teib puv, faa-lo huvb Eei Jyen Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj Taaib mo-se zruj Lo.)
11.8: setq mweid mo-se kxvq, “meib Eei Jyenb fruq zuvq xij taaib kweig Fiag yia Eei Ra'Myen Qa'q Toq yia, ‘kaanq mivb a'q, meib Zauj kan meib Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj.’ Ga'haaq yia Bua zyrug mivb.” mo-se Qiaj Jiad! haig, Myen Matq Jia'q Eei yem faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen mivb mig a'q.
11.4: mo-se zyrug kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘Tauj Daamq mwrnd Eei zyavb hog yia xij mivb kxmj i-yipq teib puv.
11.2: meib xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb mJavg msia'q mivb Tevj laavd zavg myenb Toq lovg Jyem lovg Eaanb zruj taaib Eei syrub setq.”
11.6: yetg nxm i-yipq teib puv Eei myenb xij Byrub Byrub Eei Eyemq Revg. zinb Daavg maiq maaib Jiaj Navq naaig. Ga'haaq hivq yaag maiq maaib a'q.
11.9: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “faa-lo maiq Kavq mwavj meib Eei waag weig pun yia yem i-yipq teib puv zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zamq Jyenq faauj.”
11.5: yem i-yipq teib puv yuvd Eei mrud taub txnb la'kauq xij zu'g taig a'q. lyemb ib zang zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub faa-lo Eei taaub taub txn, lyemb mxg Bwrnq uaq taub nrub peid Eei txnb la'kauq, lyemb scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn xij zu'g taig Revg.
11.7: mq paag yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj, maiq kunq myenb fai scvb Kuq lyemb Juq yaag maiq Fuvj, weig pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q zyruq zruj pun i-yipq myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq fib Navq.’+”
11.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “yia cvj xij pun faa-lo Zauj i-yipq myenb zu'g yetg Euvg tomb ze'g naang. Ga'haaq faa-lo zyrug puvj meib Bua mivb a'q. maiq zeid puvj meib Bua mivb Navq, zuvq zung meib Bua Zwrtq Revg mivb.
11.10: mo-se Zauj aa-lon yem faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen zruj Zwrtq naaiq teij yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb Eei sig. mq paag zyruq pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, Zxg maiq Kavq puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq ninb Eei teib puv.

5.18: kaanq mivb zruj kov a'q. ninb Bua maiq pun Byaub Gaauq meib Bua, mq paag meib Bua Zxg xij zu'g zruj Tauj tu'q kauj tivg taaib Eei sruj mrug.”
5.8: mq paag xij zu'g aapq ninb Bua zruj Tauj Bua'g ta'Navq Nxi Eei sruj mrug. maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua zo'g yetg nxm. ninb Bua lweig haig Zivj taaib Zeuq, ‘pun yia Bua mivb ziag yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb maa'b!’
5.3: mo-se Zauj aa-lon cvj kxvq, “hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb Fiag taaib lxd yia Bua. ib zang Toq meib pun yia Bua Eei zwavj myenb mivb uaq teib puvb Waav pua Nxi Eei Jaub tivb weig ziag pun zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. maiq zei c'q, Riaj ninb xij pun yia Bua putq tomb wrnb pcvg fai zu'g Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig hxig yia Bua Eei mcvg.”
5.21: kovb prub pyeiq kxvq, “Toq zyruq samj mavg meib Bua zruj Eei sig, yaag syemq meib Bua Eei zwid. meib Bua zruj pun faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei zwavj Jyen Rxv yia Bua, Navq zx'q Ru'g Daauq pun ninb Bua nanq Jyenq taij yia Bua nx.”
5.14: faa-lo Eei kunq nrub myenb Qa'q Bx'q ninb Bua Paaiq zruj kovb prub pyeiq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag naaig ninb Bua, “a'Nxi Zauj ib Nxi meib Bua fuvg zruj maiq tu'q ziuj tivg taaib Eei sruj mrug Navq zinb Daavg nx?”
5.23: yem yia mivb faa-lo huvb uaq tevq meib Eei Buaj kxvq waag, ninb Kuvj zruj to'g naaiq teij myenb Navq. meib yaag maiq Fruj yetg teij meib Eei myenb.”
5.6: tovb uaq Nxi faa-lo hatg kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei kunq nrub myenb Zauj kovb prub pyeiq,
5.2: faa-lo kxvq, “zyruq tovb haiq taub lcb? yia zruj haiq Euvg xij zu'g mwavj ninb Eei waag, puvj i-saa- laa-en myenb mivb? yia maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq. yia zuvq maiq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb.”
5.20: ninb Bua mivb faa-lo uaq Zwrtq taaib, ninb Bua pwatg mo-se Zauj aa-lon zuaq Jyenq ninb Bua.
5.7: “yem naaiq mivb maiq tuvq pun Byaub Gaauq naaiq teij myenb zruj niab zun. heug ninb Bua kanb mivb lxd.
5.19: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei kovb prub pyeiq haid huvb tiaj kxvq, “meib Bua xij zu'g Nxib Nxi zruj niab zun kauj tivg taaib Eei sruj mrug,” ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Bua za'kevb! zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.17: faa-lo kxvq, “meib Bua lweig haig, za'kevb! lweig haig. weig naaiq meib Bua Zivj taaib kxvq, ‘pun yia Bua mivb ziag pun zyruq maa'b!’
5.11: mivb haaij lxd, sweib meib Bua kanb mivb lxd. mq paag meib Bua zruj Eei kov maiq pun zo'g Fiag yetg teij.’+”
5.5: faa-lo cvj kxvq, “mavg maa'b! naaiq nxm teib puv Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb za'kevb Zamq haig. meib Bua i taub Kuvj Duaq ninb Bua kwavg kov Navq.”
5.9: xij zu'g hxig ninb Bua zruj kov kaub Kruq zinb Daavg uaq. pun ninb Bua maiq tivb maiq hitq Eei zruj Jyenq kov mivb, ninb Bua Zivj taaib maiq maaib Qavj mwavj myenb kxvb pc'g Eei waag.”
5.16: kunq nrub myenb maiq pun yetg teij Byaub Gaauq meib Eei pru mq paag ninb Bua Zxg kxvq ‘zruj niab zun a'q maa'b!’ yia Bua, meib Eei pru, zu'g ninb Bua Bx'q mq paag se meib kanb Eei myenb zruj txvg.”
5.4: i-yipq teib puv Eei huvb kxvq, “mo-se Zauj aa-lon aa'b! meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij Duaq naaiq teij myenb kwavg ninb Bua Eei kov? Rwrnj mivb zruj meib Bua Eei kov a'q maa'b!”
5.10: uaq teij kunq nrub myenb Zauj kovb prub pyeiq zyrug Zwrtq mivb Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “faa-lo huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yem naaiq mivb yia maiq pun Byaub Gaauq meib Bua a'q.
5.22: mo-se cvj Rwrnj mivb Buaj zyruq, “zyruq aa'b! meib weig haiq tiug pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj zu'g hxig Dovg naaig Kruq? meib weig haiq tiug Paaiq yia taaib?
5.12: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug Raanj mivb kxmj i-yipq teib puv, kaatq Byaub Gaauq kxn taaib lovg tiq Byaub Gaauq.
5.15: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei kovb prub pyeiq zyrug mivb lxd faa-lo huvb. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx zruj pun meib Eei pru?
5.13: kunq nrub myenb pe'q ninb Bua, “meib Bua yetg Nxi xij zu'g zruj Tauj tu'q Bua'g zinb Daavg meib Bua maaib Byaub Gaauq uaq.”
5.1: Ga'haaq mo-se Zauj aa-lon mivb Tauj faa-lo huvb uaq kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘puvj yia Eei myenb mivb a'q, weig pun ninb Bua mivb uaq teib puvb Waav zruj nxm yinb hrug yia.’+”

9.18: mwavj Jyenq og. Fav Nxi Tauj naaiq nxm zyavb hog xij twib tomb px'g. yem lyepg Jiad i-yipq teib puv Tauj ib zang, maiq kcvb twib Jiaj px'g Dovg naaiq Rung Lo.
9.8: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon, “zx'q i ziaj Eau trub Raug Eei saaiq mivb txv Jyenq faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen pun mo-se faatq faauj luvb.
9.33: mo-se zyrug leib Gxi faa-lo huvb cvj Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb mivb Zau Jiad puad tauj kauj Toq zyruq. Ba'ov zyrug tivb, px'g Zauj Byuvg yaag Lxvj.
9.3: zyruq   xij pun meib Bua Eei scvb Kuq Zyavq Eei yetg zuvq lxb maad, lxb Txb, vovb, pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb putq tomb wrn.
9.32: maaib i Euvg Byaub witq maiq waaig Navq, weig zu'g naaiq teij i Euvg twib liud px'g Zivj taaib Zwrtq.)
9.21: mq paag maiq mwavj zyruq Eei waag uaq teij, sweib ninb Bua Eei nrub Zauj scvb Kuq yem uaq Deig.
9.35: faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, maiq puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb, Navq zyruq lovg mo-se kxvq Jiaj Eei nx.
9.14: maiq zei c'q, naaiq Rung yia xij pun meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj zu'g yetg zuvq ze'g naang, weig pun meib hiuq tu'q yem naaiq luvb Diaq maiq maaib haiq taub Navq yia.
9.23: mo-se zyrug lovg pyaab Byaag zyavq Jyenq luvb, zyruq zyrug pun pxvd Ba'ov, twib px'g, pxvd Ba'livg Fapg Fapg Eei Fiag Tauj Dau. zyruq zyrug pun luvb twib px'g Fiag i-yipq teib puv.
9.6: ta'Eeig Nxi zyruq za'kevb ei Jyenq ninb Eei waag zruj. i-yipq myenb Eei scvb Kuq taig Revg mig a'q. mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei maiq taig yetg taub.
9.34: faa-lo pwatg Byuvg Zauj px'g Lxvj, Ba'ov yaag maiq Bwi, ninb cvj paamd zwid a'q. ninb Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Hruq cvj vcvg a'q.
9.2: sij kxvq meib maiq puvj ninb Bua mivb, Zxg Kavb Jyenq ninb Bua nx,
9.20: faa-lo Eei Jyen, tovb kamb Riaj zyruq Eei waag uaq teij, kaanq Jyenq txb ninb Bua Eei nrub Zauj scvb Kuq Rwrnj taaib pivj.
9.24: px'g twib Jyenq Fiag, Ba'livg Fapg Fapg Eei. yem lyepg Jiad i-yipq teib puv Tauj ib zang, maiq kcvb maaib yetg Rung twib px'g Dovg naaiq Rung Lo.
9.28: Tevj tauj kauj Toq zyruq, weig zu'g pxvd Ba'ov, twib px'g kauj haig a'q. yia zyrug puvj meib Bua mivb. meib Bua maiq zu'g cvj yem naaiq a'q.”
9.7: faa-lo Paaiq myenb mivb mavg zyrug hiuq tu'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei scvb Kuq maiq taig yetg taub. mq paag faa-lo Eei Hruq Zxg vcvg Eei, maiq Kavq puvj pc'g fivj mivb.
9.29: mo-se tau, “yia Zwrtq zi'g zivb yia zyrug Zau Jiad puad Tevj meib Bua tauj kauj. Ba'ov zyrug tivb, px'g yaag maiq twib a'q. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q luvb Diaq yetg zuvq se zyruq Eei.
9.19: ib zang xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb txb yem livb teig Eei scvb Kuq Zauj maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq Rwrnj taaib pivj Jyenq. maiq kunq myenb fai scvb Kuq, maiq txb Rwrnj taaib pivj nx, zuvq zu'g px'g Bx'q taig Revg a'q.”+’+”
9.17: meib Zxg vcvg Jyenq yia Eei pc'g fivj, maiq Kavq puvj ninb Bua mivb.
9.31: (twib px'g uaq zang, la'maab Zauj Byaub Baa-li zu'g px'g Bx'q waaig Revg, weig zu'g Byaub Baa-li pau, la'maab yaag Gxi pyavb.
9.30: mq paag yia hiuq tu'q meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zxg maiq kamb Riaj zyruq Tinb huvb.”
9.27: faa-lo zyrug pun myenb mivb heug mo-se Zauj aa-lon taaib. ninb kxvq, “naaiq Rung yia za'kevb paamd zwid a'q. zyruq zruj tu'q hxpg. yia kanb Zauj yia Eei pc'g fivj zruj txvg.
9.11: zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb lyemb maiq haib mivb sruq Jyenq mo-se Eei Ra'Myen, weig zu'g ninb Bua Navq i-yipq teib puv Eei zwavj myenb nx, zyavb zweib pwavq Revg zyavb sin.
9.5: zyruq tivg zyavj zyavb hog yaag kxvq, “Fav Nxi zyruq xij yem naaiq nxm teib puv Navq naaiq nx zruj.”
9.9: saaiq zyrug Navq niab Buvb mwrng Buv mivb pwavq i-yipq teib puv. lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq zyrug zyavb zweib kunj novg yaag faanq kxmj teib puv.”
9.16: mq paag yia lyrub meib Bua weig pun meib Bua pwatg yia Eei tomb Qa'q yaag haib maaib myenb zunb yia Eei mevb pwavq luvb Diaq.
9.4: mq paag zyruq xij pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei scvb Kuq Zauj i-yipq myenb Eei scvb Kuq maiq fib Navq. i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei scvb Kuq maiq zu'g taig yetg taub.’+”
9.10: mo-se Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq trub Raug Eei saaiq mivb Tauj faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen, yaag faatq saaiq faauj. lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq zyrug zyavb zweib Revg. zweib yaag huq Jyenq yem.
9.22: zyruq Buaj mo-se, “suv meib Eei puad zyavq Jyenq luvb. luvb zyrug twib px'g Fiag kxmj i-yipq teib puv, Bx'q yem livb teig Eei myenb Zauj scvb Kuq Zauj yetg zuvq laib miaq.”
9.12: mq paag zyruq pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq mwavj mo-se Zauj aa-lon Eei waag Navq zyruq Buaj Jiaj mo-se nx.
9.15: sij kxvq yia xij zruj nx, yia zuvq pun meib Bua putq tomb wrnb pcvg taig Revg, maiq tu'q yem naaiq luvb Diaq.
9.13: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “Fav Dxm Jiad sin Ryruq Eei mivb txv Jyenq faa-lo kxvq, ‘zyruq, hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj weig pun ninb Bua mivb zavg yia.
9.1: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “mivb Buaj faa-lo, ‘zyruq, hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb a'q, weig pun ninb Bua haib zavg yia.”
9.26: Kuvj ko-sen teig, i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Eei txvj, maiq twib px'g Navq.
9.25: i-yipq teib puv nxmb nxm txvj, ta'faanb yem Deig Eei myenb Zauj scvb Kuq, zu'g px'g Bx'q Revg. lyemb ka'naaib zwavj Zauj yetg zuvq Dyavj Bx'q waaig Revg.

16.18: syru taaib Laau mavg, syru tu'q Zamq Eei yaag maiq maaib zevg. syru tu'q zo'g Eei yaag maiq Zaa. kx'g myenb ziuj kx'g myenb Qyemj zu'g Eei syru.
16.8: mo-se cvj kxvq, “luvb maanb Mwavj, zyruq xij pun xq meib Bua Eang. luvb Dxm xij pun meib Bua tu'q laavb zi'g Eang peuq, weig zu'g ninb haid meib Bua vopq ninb Eei waag. meib Bua vopq yia Bua se maiq zeid vopq zu'g yia Bua. meib Bua vopq zu'g zyruq. ”
16.33: mo-se Buaj aa-lon, “zx'q i mx'q maa-naa tapq Jyenq ovj, ton Jyenq zyruq Eei Ra'Myen lyrub Jyenq yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig.”
16.3: ninb Bua kxvq, “feij tu'q yem i-yipq teib puv zyruq kanb taij Revg yia Bua. yem uaq yia Bua zweid Jyenq xb Zcv Len, haiq zang yaag tu'q Eang peuq. mq paag meib Bua txb yia Bua taaib yem naaiq teib puvb Waav pun yia Bua zwavj myenb vxg taig Revg a'q.”
16.32: mo-se kxvq, “zyruq hatg Bua ‘xij zu'g zx'q i mx'q maa-naa lyrub Jyenq pun Bua txig Jiaj txig Eei zeib fun mavg, weig pun ninb Bua pwatg txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, yem teib puvb Waav uaq zang, yia pun meib Bua Eang Eei ka'naaiq.’+”
16.21: Dxmb Dxm kx'g myenb syru kauj kx'g myenb Eang. Eutg Zwrtq taaib Jxm, yem Dau zevg Fiag Eei uaq teij, yu'g Revg mig a'q.
16.35: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eang feij zyepg Havj maa-naa Tauj ninb Bua tu'q pia'g Kaa-naa-an teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij, tovb maaib myenb yem Jyenq uaq nxm teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij.
16.14: Byuvb swiq Gaai mivb maaib Euvg ka'naaiq pia'g Eei, Beib Eei, yem Daub peib, yaag mwrng Eei Navq sxv nx.
16.23: mo-se Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx hatg meib Bua. ‘Fav Nxi se hitq Kwrnj Nxi, se fuvj pun zyruq Eei Zivb Revg tivb kov Nxi. ib Nxi xij zi'q Eei kunq zi'q a'q. xij zruq Eei kunq zruq a'q. zevg Fiag uaq teij, lyrub Fav Nxi Eang.’+”
16.6: mo-se Zauj aa-lon kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, “ib Nxi luvb maanb Mwavj meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q, txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub se zyruq.
16.34: aa-lon zyrug ei zyruq Buaj mo-se Eei waag zx'q uaq ovj maa-naa an Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen mcvj, weig lyrub Jyenq yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig.
16.2: yem uaq teib puvb Waav zwavj myenb vopq mo-se Zauj aa-lon.
16.36: (lob Nxi lovg Laau ka'naaiq Eei Daan se leib maiq ko Eig zyepg Eeig mx'q. yaag maaib zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq funj taaib leib maiq ko i mx'q levb ti'q tyen.)
16.20: mq paag maaib teij maiq mwavj mo-se Eei waag, lyrub teij Tauj luvb Dxm. ta'Eeig Dxm pwatg uaq teij ka'naaiq putq kcv Revg, tomb zweib huq. mo-se Qiaj Jiad haig ninb Bua.
16.24: ei mo-se hatg Eei waag, zevg Fiag uaq teij ninb Bua lyrub Tauj ta'Eeig Dxm mq paag maiq putq kcv, maiq zweij.
16.28: zyruq naaig mo-se, “meib Bua xij vcvg yia Eei leid Zauj yia Eei leib latg Dovg haaij laub?
16.7: Fav Dxm meib Bua tu'q pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg, weig zu'g meib Bua vopq ninb Eei waag, zyruq haid mig a'q. yia Bua penj haiq Euvg myenb meib Bua Zivj taaib vopq yia Bua?”
16.29: Javj Jyenq og. yia, zyruq, Zeij tivb kov Nxi pun meib Bua. weig naaiq ta'lua'g Nxi uaq Nxi ninb pun laavb zi'g kauj meib Bua i Nxi. ta'Zyetq Nxi uaq Nxi, kx'g myenb xij zu'g yem kx'g myenb Eei txvj, maiq tuvq mivb haiq Dau.
16.19: mo-se kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “haiq taub maiq tuvq lyrub zevg Fiag Eei Tauj ta'Eeig Dxm.”
16.17: i-saa-laa-en myenb ei Jyenq mo-se Eei waag syru. maaib teij syru Zamq, maaib teij syru zo'g.
16.31: uaq Euvg Eang Eei ka'naaiq i-saa-laa-en myenb heug maa-naa. maa-naa se Navq yenb si Eim nx, setq zeiq pc'g Eei. ninb Eei mweij Navq Fuab pia'g zxpg mweib txvb nx.
16.30: Navq naaig, Tauj ta'Zyetq Nxi i-saa-laa-en myenb hitq Kwrnj.”
16.27: siag Nxi uaq Nxi, maaib teij myenb Zwrtq mivb syru naaiq teij Eang Eei ka'naaiq, mq paag ninb Bua lxd maiq pwatg yetg teij.
16.5: Tauj ta'lua'g Nxi uaq Nxi, ninb Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj ninb Bua syru pia'g taaib Eei ka'naaiq yaag syru kaub Zamq Nxib Nxi syru Eei yetg pwrng.”
16.9: mo-se kxvq Buaj aa-lon, “Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb taaib kapq zunq yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen weig zu'g ninb haid meib Bua vopq ninb Eei waag.”
16.16: zyruq hatg meib Bua, ziuj meib Bua Qyemj zu'g Bu'ziaj syru Bua'g uaq. yem meib Bua Eei Dopg liub maaib Bu'ziaj taub xij zu'g funj yetg taub i mx'q.”
16.4: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “ib zang yia xij pun laavb zi'g yem uaq luvb Fiag Navq twib Byuvg nx. Nxib Nxi pc'g fivj xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb syru, yetg Nxi syru kauj yetg Nxi Eang Navq. yia zyrug Navq naaiq nx seij ninb Bua, mavg kaaj ninb Bua mwavj yia Paaiq Eei waag fai maiq mwavj.
16.10: aa-lon Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, ninb Bua Win mavg teib puvb Waav zyrug pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg hing Zwrtq yem txq Bwrnj.
16.22: Tauj ta'lua'g Nxi ninb Bua syru Zamq yetg pwrng, yetg laanb myenb syru pyei mx'q. i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei yetg zuvq pyeiq zeiq mivb Buaj mo-se.
16.12: “i-saa-laa-en myenb vopq Eei waag yia haid mig a'q. Buaj ninb Bua, ‘Tauj Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog meib Bua xij tu'q xq Eang. luvb Dxm meib Bua xij tu'q laavb zi'g Eang peuq. Navq naaig, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’+”
16.15: i-saa-laa-en myenb pwatg, ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q penj haiq Euvg ka'naaiq. laanb naaig laanb, “naaiq haiq Euvg x'b?” mo-se kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “naaiq se zyruq pun meib Bua Eang Eei ka'naaiq.
16.13: Tauj luvb maanb Mwavj Eei zyavb hog, maaib nx'g Bunb Daij taaib yem pwavq Revg Dopg liub Zyavq. luvb Dxm yaag maaib Byuvb swiq Fiag Wiv kxmj Zyavq.
16.1: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yem e-lim Zwrtq Jauq mivb Tauj sinj teib puvb Waav, yem e-lim teig Zauj si-naai Bov Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua Tauj sinj teib puvb Waav uaq Nxi se txij zu'g Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv ta'Eeig nxm Laaj zyepg Mmd uaq Nxi.
16.26: Ju'q Nxi xij zu'g Nxib Nxi syru naaiq teij Eang Eei ka'naaiq. mq paag siag Nxi uaq Nxi, se tivb kov Nxi, maiq maaib yetg teij naaiq Euvg ka'naaiq.”
16.25: mo-se kxvq, “ib Nxi Eang naaiq teij a'q, weig zu'g ib Nxi se fuvj pun zyruq Eei tivb kov Nxi. ib Nxi meib Bua lxd maiq pwatg naaiq Euvg ka'naaiq yem naaiq pua'q txvj.

37.18: tavb sin pun zruj Ju'q Zaaj Gwaab, yetg puv maaib pua Zaaj.
37.8: yetg puv maaib taub. ninb yaag pun i puv faavb taaub Eei Ke-lu-Bim zyavb Jyenq Zauj faavb Gaaij penj yetg Kwaaiq mig a'q.
37.3: ninb toj pyei nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pyei Jia'q faavb zauj Eei kub vwaaig, yetg puv maaib i nxm.
37.21: Ju'q Zaaj Gwaab, Zaab Zaaj Gwaab kxn ka'Diaq mcvj maaib nxm pyavb Eweid.
37.14: naaiq teij Kwiv tivj nitq Jyenq hxmb tiab uaq teij txvj weig Zunj kcv tiab Eei Dyavj.
37.23: ninb Bua cvj lovg Jyem zruj siag nxm tavb zaanq Zauj Japq tavb Zoq Eei Fiuq Zauj an Fiuq Eei pyenb.
37.6: ninb lovg Jyem zruj Zeij en Eei weig uaq nxm faavb Gaaij, Daauq i Dx'g pyenj, Javq Dx'g pyenj.
37.2: cvj lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq ka'Eiag Zauj ka'Euad. ninb cvj lovg Jyem zruj pin Wiv kxmj.
37.20: tavb sin maaib pyei nxm zaanq Navq an-man pyavb nx, nxmb nxm maaib pyavb Eweid Zauj pyavb ei.
37.24: tav Zauj tav Eei Jaab sig lovg Eig zyepg yetq Jxib Jyem taaq taaib.
37.28: ninb cvj lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj kcv tiab Dyavj yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem.
37.7: ninb cvj lovg Jyem taaq i taub Ke-lu-Bim an i puv faavb taaub.
37.29: ninb pun taub zruj uamb Daav Eei zavg myenb Peuj xn myenb Eei Zivb Revg yrub Zauj Zivb Revg huv.
37.19: naaiq teij Gwaab, yetg Zaaj maaib pua nxm zaanq Navq an-man pyavb nx. nxmb nxm maaib pyavb Eweid Zauj pyavb ei. ta'Eeig Zaaj maaib fib Navq Eei. yem tavb sin Zwrtq Eei Ju'q Zaaj fib Navq Revg.
37.17: ninb yaag lovg Jyem zruj nxm tav. tavb Jaaj Zauj tavb sin ninb taaq taaib. tav Eei zaanq Zauj pyavb Eweid pyavb ei yaag Jwavg naaiq Dunb Jyem taaq Zwrtq taaib.
37.27: ninb lovg Jyem cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq i puv ka'Len, pin ka'Diaq mcvj, weig Zunj kcv tiab Eei Dyavj.
37.11: cvj lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq tiab, yaag lovg Jyem zruj pin hxmb kxmj tiab Len.
37.5: zx'q taaib Zunj Jyenq faav ka'Len Eei Kwiv weig kcv faav.
37.9: naaiq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim Myen txij Myen, yav Daatq Ria Jyenq faav kub vwaaig. i taub zuvq mavg Jyenq faavb Gaaij.
37.16: ninb lovg Jyem zruj tiab Eei Jaab txvj. maaib pyenb, tomb pa'ken, Rxmg, Zauj Ziaq tiuq Eei vwaab pcvb.
37.4: ninb lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj i tiub kcv faav Eei Dyavj yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem,
37.10: ninb cvj lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm tiab, Daauq i Dx'g, Javq yetg Dx'g, Lav Dx'g pyenj,
37.22: pyavb Eweid Zauj Zaab Zaaj Gwaab, Zauj tavb Jaaj, tavb sin, Jwavg yetg Dunb Jyem taaq Zwrtq taaib penj yetg nxm.
37.12: ninb lovg Jyem hxmb tiab Len faauj yetg wcvb zaavq Lav, cvj lovg Jyem zruj pin Wiv kxmj.
37.15: kcv tiab Eei Dyavj ninb lovg ta'su'q Dyavj pwav Jyenq Jyem.
37.13: ninb cvj toj pyei nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pyei nxm tiab kx'q ka'Len, tovb zcvj zauj uaq nxm txvj.
37.1: Be-saa-len lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj lcvd vcvg waag faav, Daauq i Dx'g pyenj, Lav Dx'g pyenj, Javq Dx'g pyenj,
37.26: kub vwaaig mcvj tiab, pyei puv tiab Len Zauj Jxv, ninb lovg Jyem pwav Dipg Revg yaag lovg Jyem zruj pin Wiv kxmj tiab Len.
37.25: ninb cvj lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm puaq huv tiab, yetg Dx'g feib puv, Daauq yetg Dx'g, Javq yetg Dx'g, Lav i Dx'g. pyei puv kx'q Eei Jxv Zauj tiab Jwavg Dovb Dyavj zruj taaib.

39.18: limg tweib mweid pavg Ba'taub uaq teij i nxm la'pyeib lx'g Eatq Jyenq. Navq naaiq nx, pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq nctq Jyenq e-fotq Eei kxv Ra'Myen mcvj.
39.8: puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb zruj Kwaaiq pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj e-fotq fib Navq Eei zruj. ninb lovg Jyem Zauj pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng.
39.33: ninb Bua zyrug txb Dopg liub mivb mo-se uaq. se txb ka'Euad uaq yemg Dopg liub Zauj Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, ka'naaib Kauj, Dopg liub Eei Qxv, kuvb kavg Dyavj, tovg Zauj tovg Eei Taapq.
39.3: ninb Bua taaq Jyem penj yetg Kwaaiq yetg Kwaaiq pia'g Eei, cvj Japq taaib mwrng Eei Navq swij nx, zxpg Jyenq pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng pun puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb Datq taaib.
39.32: wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq kov zruj zyavj Revg. zyruq Navq haiq nx Paaiq mo-se, i-saa-laa-en myenb Navq uaq nx ei Jyenq zruj Euvb Euvg.
39.21: ninb Bua cvj lovg Laavb Buaq Zunj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq ka'Diaq Eei Kwiv, pavg e-fotq Eei Kwiv Eatq Jyenq, pun pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq yem tivg, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se nx.
39.35: ninb Bua cvj txb lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj kcv faav Eei Dyavj Zauj Zeij en Eei weig uaq nxm faavb Gaaij,
39.43: mo-se timq mavg ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq kov yaag pwatg se txij Revg zyruq Paaiq Eei waag, ninb zyrug pwav waag pun ninb Bua.
39.40: weib laatg Eei Dia, laatg tovg, tovg Eei Taapq, Bc'g laatg kcvb Dia, Zxv laatg Eei Laav, Bxv Dau Zxv laatg Eei tovg, wig pwavb Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq Jaab txvj,
39.14: yetg zuvq maaib zyepg Eeig nxm la'pyeiq. yetg nxm la'pyeiq tiu i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg taub txn Eei Buaj Navq yenj nx, piuj mevb zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb.
39.23: yaag lyrub nxm Kwrtq yem Dia Bu'Dovj zruj lwib Jaav, lovg Dia hxng Jyenq Wiv kxmj weig maiq pun lwib Jaav Baaij.
39.6: ninb Bua cvj zx'q uaq teij i Kwaaiq Jaaij Eei la'pyeib si'q, cvj lovg Jyemb finj Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq, cvj tiu Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei txn Eei Buaj Navq yenj nx.
39.34: komq Dopg liub uaq teij pa'ki yuvb Dopq Eomg taaib si'q Eei Zauj fua'q taaib lovj Eei uaq teij scvb Kuq Dopq Zauj Bc'g Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav uaq Kwaaiq Dia.
39.2: ninb Bua lovg Jyem Zauj pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng zruj e-fotq.
39.36: tiab Zauj tiab Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig Zauj kevj Tinb huvb Eei Fuaq,
39.20: yaag zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq e-fotq Ra'Myen mcvj, Paanj Ba'taub Eei kxv ka'Diaq, nitq sai Jyenq sai Jaaiq Dia Eei txvj kub vwaaig ti'q tyen, tivj Jyenq e-fotq Eei vutq.
39.24: ninb Bua lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng zruj zi'g lyrub pyruq tivj Wiv kxmj lwib Jua'q.
39.28: mGxvb peu, muag Zauj hrub navq ninb Bua lovg la'maab Diab mwrng zruj.
39.7: ninb Bua cvj zx'q naaiq teij la'pyeiq tivj Jyenq e-fotq Eei Ba'taub uaq nxm txvj, zruj Javb hog piuj mevb fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag.
39.29: ninb Bua cvj lovg la'maab swib mwrng zxpg Jyenq pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Datq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia, yaag maaib puab taub Zovj Zovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Zovj ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag.
39.19: ninb Bua cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq ka'Diaq, uaq teij i nxm kx'q ka'Euad mcvj.
39.17: zx'q uaq teij i tiub Jyemb limg Zunj pia'g pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq Eei i puv kx'q Eei Kwiv.
39.38: puaq huv Eei Jyemb tiab, xn myenb Eei yrub, huv, Zauj pia'g Dopg liub uaq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia,
39.31: cvj lovg Laavb Buaq tivj Jyenq naaiq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq Eatq Jyenq mGxvb peu ziuj zyruq Buaj mo-se Eei waag zruj.
39.30: ninb Bua cvj taaq Kwaaiq Jyem zruj Zivb Revg Javb hog, Divb Jyenq Ravg Navq yenj nx kxvq, “Zivb Revg weig zyruq. ”
39.27: ninb Bua yaag lovg la'maab Diab mwrng zruj ka'Euad uaq yemg lwib Daauq pun aa-lon Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua.
39.11: ta'Eeig lyrud maaib nxm Dyemb mcv Eei, Rav Eei. maaib nxm Banq Buaq Eei, Rav Eei. maaib nxm pc'g Eei, Feib Feiq uaq.
39.5: sai e-fotq uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia ninb Bua lovg ka'naaiq fib Navq Eei yaag fib Navq Eei zruj. ninb Bua lovg Jyem, lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Zauj la'maab swib mwrng ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se.
39.9: ninb Ripq Jyenq penj i yemg yetg naamj feib puv,
39.16: cvj zruj i nxm Jyemb lx'g Zauj i nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq kub vwaaig i puv kx'q.
39.41: Zauj yem sivj ting zu'q Jyenq fub suj Eei Favb laavg lwib hruj, se aa-lon sai myenb Eei Zivb Revg lwib hruj, Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua zu'q Jyenq zruj sai myenb fub suj zyruq Eei lwib hruj.
39.37: uaq nxm Jyemb tavb Jaaj, Zauj tavb Jaaj kub vwaaig Eei tavb zaanq Zauj tavb Jaaj Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig Zauj tav Eei yrub,
39.39: tovb si'q ziab txvb Zauj tovb si'q Pycv, kcv ziab txvb Eei Dyavj Zauj ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, punb Zauj punb Eei Taapq,
39.4: ninb Bua weig e-fotq zruj i tiub kxv pavg e-fotq Eei i puv kx'q tivj Jyenq Paanj Ba'taub.
39.10: cvj tivj Jyenq pyei lyrud la'pyeib Jaaij. ta'yetq lyrud maaib nxm si'q Eei, Rav Eei, maaib nxm yavb uvq Eei, maaib nxm mcvb Byaan.
39.22: ninb Bua cvj lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq Datq yemg lwib Daauq zu'q e-fotq ka'Euad mcvj,
39.12: ta'faam lyrud maaib nxm Buab mcv Eei, maaib nxm pc'g Jia'q pen Eei, maaib nxm lua'g, Rav Eei.
39.42: naaiq teij yetg zuvq kov i-saa-laa-en myenb ziuj zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj zyavj Revg.
39.15: weig pwav la'Kwrtq Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua lovg Jyem kitq Bind taaib zruj limg Navq Laav nx.
39.13: ta'feij lyrud maaib nxm yavb pc'g, maaib nxm setq zeiq pc'g Jia'q, cvj maaib nxm mcvb koj. naaiq teij la'pyeiq lovg Jyem Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq.
39.1: ninb Bua lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, Datq Dia zruj sai myenb zu'q Jyenq yem sivj ting fub suj Eei lwib hruj. ninb Bua ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag zruj Zivb Revg Eei lwib hruj pun aa-lon.
39.26: yetg nxm Jyemb livb Genj nxm zi'g lyrub pyruq tivj Wiv kxmj zu'q fub suj zyruq Eei lwib Jua'q, ziuj zyruq Paaiq mo-se Eei waag.
39.25: cvj lovg Jyem zruj livb tivj Jyenq,

4.18: mo-se Rwrnj mivb Buaj ninb Eei ovb taa, ye-To, “Toq pun yia Rwrnj i-yipq teib puv mavg kaaj, yia Eei muab txig Zxg yem Eei fai?” ye-To kxvq, “kunq pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj og.”
4.8: Tinb huvb cvj kxvq, “sij kxvq i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq syenj meib Eei waag fai maiq syenj taaub Rung Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog, Riaj ninb Bua syenj ta'Eeig Rung Eei Javb hog.
4.3: zyruq kxvq, “kwcvj Fiag Dau maa'b!” mo-se zyrug kwcvj pyaab Byaag Fiag Dau. pyaab Byaag zyrug penj tiub naav taaib, hc'q ninb pyauj Gxi mig a'q.
4.21: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib Rwrnj Tauj i-yipq teib puv Eei zyavb hog, xij zu'g txv Jyenq faa-lo huvb zruj tovb yia pun meib maaib Qa'q zruj uaq teij Euvb Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei sig. mq paag yia xij pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, ninb zyrug maiq Kavq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb.
4.14: zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig mo-se. ninb kxvq, “uaq Euvg, meib Eei kxj, le-wi myenb, aa-lon, ni? yia hiuq tu'q ninb kxvq waag Byaavg Eei. ninb zuvq Zwrtq Jauq taaib lxd meib a'q. ninb tu'q pwatg meib, ninb za'kevb a'Neiq haig.
4.23: yia Buaj meib pun yia Eei txnb Lo mivb zavg yia.” meib maiq Kavq pun ninb Bua mivb nx, yia xij taij meib Eei txnb Lo.’+”
4.6: zyruq cvj Buaj mo-se, “zx'q meib Eei puad lom pia'g meib Eei lwib kem maa'b!” mo-se zyrug lom pia'g lwib kem. Lwrtq puad Zwrtq taaib pwatg penj komb huq pcvg, Bopq pc'g Eei, Navq sxv nx.
4.2: zyruq naaig kaaj ninb, “ib zang meib Eei puad nanq haiq Euvg?” mo-se tau, “yia nanq pyaab Byaag.”
4.20: mo-se zyrug pun ninb Eei auq Zauj i taub txn keb Jyenq lxb Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj i-yipq teib puv. mo-se nanq Jyenq Tinb huvb Buaj ninb txb uaq tiub pyaab Byaag mivb.
4.24: yem Jauq zavg ninb Bua hitq Jiaj mwrnd Eei yetg nxm txvj, zyruq cvj taaib pwavb mo-se, xij taij ninb.
4.28: mo-se zyav zyruq Paaiq ninb kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag Buaj aa-lon, yaag Buaj ninb Tauj zyruq heug ninb zruj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog.
4.7: Tinb huvb kxvq, “cvj lom Rung lwib kem maa'b!” mo-se zyrug cvj lom pia'g lwib kem. Lwrtq puad Zwrtq taaib pwatg lovj mig a'q, Navq lod uaq nx, Zauj sin zavg Eei Dopq fib Navq Revg.
4.29: mo-se Zauj aa-lon zyrug heug i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj kapq zunq.
4.19: mo-se Zxg yem mi-Dyen teib puv uaq zang zyruq cvj Buaj ninb, “meib kunq Rwrnj i-yipq teib puv a'q. xij taij meib uaq teij myenb yetg zuvq taig Revg mig a'q.”
4.17: ninb yaag xij zu'g txb Jyenq meib Eei puad nanq Jyenq naaiq tiub pyaab Byaag mivb lovg zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.”
4.31: pc'g fivj zyrug syenj. ninb Bua haid kxvq zyruq taaib lxd ninb Bua i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag pwatg ninb Bua zu'g myenb hxig Eei Kruq naang, ninb Bua zyrug Do'q Fiag paaij zyruq
4.30: aa-lon zyrug zyav zyruq Buaj mo-se Eei yetg zuvq waag Buaj ninb Bua. ninb yaag txv Jyenq pc'g fivj zruj Revg uaq teij Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog.
4.27: zyruq kxvq Buaj aa-lon, “mivb uaq teib puvb Waav pwavb mo-se maa'b!” aa-lon zyrug mivb pwavb mo-se yem Tinb huvb Eei Bov uaq, zyrug zom mo-se.
4.11: zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “haiq taub zeij myenb Eei Rwib? haiq taub pun myenb mnxmb Duv, maiq haib kxvq waag? haiq taub pun myenb mavg tu'q pwatg fai pun myenb mziv mcvb? se yia, zyruq kanb Navq, maiq zeid?
4.5: zyruq kxvq, “Navq naaiq zruj weig pun i-saa-laa-en myenb hiuq tu'q zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, se apg-laa-ham Eei Tinb huvb, i-sakg Eei Tinb huvb Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb, hing Zwrtq pun meib pwatg.”
4.9: mq paag sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq syenj naaiq teij i Euvg Javb hog yaag maiq mwavj meib Eei waag nx, meib xij zu'g Damq teij nai-aa Daaib Eei uam toj Fiag Daub Gaai. meib Damq Eei uam zyrug yem uaq Daub Gaai penj Ryaamq mig a'q.”
4.16: aa-lon xij Tevj meib txij pc'g fivj kxvq waag tiq meib, Navq meib kanb Eei Rwib kxvq nx. meib yaag xij zruj Navq ninb Eei Tinb huvb.
4.4: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “suv puad nanq Jyenq naavb tweiq maa'b!” mo-se zyrug suv puad nanq Jyenq naavb tweiq. naav zyrug cvj penj pyaab Byaag mig a'q.
4.10: mo-se cvj kxvq Buaj zyruq “o zyruq aag, yia mtaaib maiq haib kxvq waag Byaavg Eei myenb. Jiaj taaib Eei zyavb hog maiq haib. meib Zauj yia, meib Eei pru, kxvq waag Tauj ib zang yia Zxg maiq haib kxvq waag Byaavg. yia kxvq waag tong, vamb vamb vutg vutq Eei.”
4.22: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj faa-lo, ‘naaiq se zyruq kanb kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb se yia Eei txnb Lo.
4.12: meib kunq mivb a'q. yia kanb xij Tevj meib kxvq. hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq yia yaag Faauj meib.”
4.15: meib Zauj ninb kxvq maa'b! xij zu'g Buaj ninb hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq. yia xij Tevj meib Bua i taub kxvq waag yaag Faauj meib Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj.
4.13: mq paag mo-se tau, “zyruq aa'b! Toq meib Paaiq kanb taub mivb maa'b!”
4.1: mo-se tau, “sij kxvq i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq syenj yia yaag maiq mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag, ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq maiq hing Zwrtq pun meib pwatg,’ uaq Euvg Navq haiq nx zruj?”
4.26: zyruq zyrug maiq zruj haiq Euvg pun mo-se. (sipg-po-laa kxvq, “meib se yia lovg Ryaamq tu'q taaib Eei syavb laavb,” uaq teij waag kxvq zu'g Jiaj kaatq Eei leid.)
4.25: sipg-po-laa zyrug zx'q Kwaaiq la'pyeiq laig Eei, kaatq ninb Eei txn Eei Jaib zweiq Dopq taaib kua'q mo-se Eei zauj yaag kxvq, “meib se yia lovg Ryaamq tu'q taaib Eei syavb laavb.”

10.18: mo-se zyrug yem faa-lo uaq Zwrtq. ninb mivb tauj kauj Toq zyruq Tevj.
10.8: myenb cvj mivb lxd mo-se Zauj aa-lon Rwrnj Tauj faa-lo huvb uaq. faa-lo kxvq, “meib Bua mivb zavg zyruq meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb tu'q Eei. mq paag haiq taub Zauj haiq taub mivb?”
10.3: mo-se Zauj aa-lon zyrug mivb kxvq Buaj faa-lo, “zyruq, hipq-lu myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib xij vcvg Jyenq, maiq Kavq yem yia Eei Ra'Myen Eyemg kanb zruj faij Dovg haaij laub? puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj weig pun ninb Bua mivb zavg yia maa'b!
10.21: zyruq cvj Buaj mo-se, “suv Jiad meib Eei puad zyavq luvb weig pun zyavb nxm i-yipq teib puv mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei, Navq Lua tu'q haid Eei nx.”
10.14: Jopg Eeig faatg faatq Eei Fiag i-yipq teib puv. haiq nxm txvj yaag Jopg Eeig pwavq Revg. zinb Daavg maiq kcvb maaib Jiaj Jopg Eeig Dovg naaiq Zamq. Ga'haaq hivq yetg liud yaag maiq maaib.
10.23: pua Nxi ka'Euad ninb Bua laanb mavg maiq pwatg laanb yaag maiq haib Zwrtq pyauq mivb haiq Dau. mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Eei txvj Fav Eei.
10.6: Jopg Eeig xij pia'g pwavq meib Eei ting Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj Eei pyauq. meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij, meib Bua Eei tia taaib yem Jyenq naaiq luvb Diaq Tauj ib zang maiq pwatg Jiaj Dovg naaiq Kruq.’+” kxvq liud, mo-se Bua mivb mig a'q.
10.2: weig pun meib Bua kxvq Buaj meib Bua Eei txnb Jweiq funb fa'q mwavj yia Navq haiq nx zruj pun i-yipq myenb, lyemb yia yem i-yipq myenb Bu'Dovj zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
10.20: mq paag zyruq pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq puvj i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb.
10.24: faa-lo pun myenb mivb heug mo-se taaib zyrug kxvq, “meib Bua kunq mivb zavg zyruq a'q. lyemb meib Bua Eei msia'q txn Zauj fu'Jweiq mivb yaag tu'q. mq paag meib Bua Eei vovb kwanb, yuvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb kwanb xij zu'g yem Jyenq naaiq.”
10.28: faa-lo kxvq Buaj mo-se, “pyauj Gxi yia maa'b! faij fim a'q. yavb naaiq Jiaj maiq tuvq pun yia pwatg meib. haiq Nxi meib cvj pwatg yia Eei Myen, meib zyrug zu'g taij a'q.”
10.7: faa-lo huvb Eei Jyen kxvq Buaj faa-lo, “naaiq taub myenb xij hxig Bua Tauj haiq zang? pun naaiq teij myenb mivb zavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb a'q maa'b! meib zia'q maiq tu'q fai? Bua Eei teib puv zuvq waaig Revg a'q.”
10.29: mo-se kxvq, “meib kxvq tu'q hxpg Eei. yia zuvq maiq cvj taaib pwatg meib Eei Myen a'q.”
10.19: zyruq zyrug Tiuq tov puv Ryaauj penj fai puv Eei tomb Ryaauj pwrng taaib Lxq Jopg Eeig mivb kwavg uaq Kxib si'q. i-yipq teib puv maiq zevg yetg nxm Jopg Eeig a'q.
10.17: ib zang Toq cvj kwavg Rung yia Eei zwid, weig yia tauj kauj Toq zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Tevj yia simq Dutq naaiq teij hxig mcvg Eei tomb sig.”
10.27: mq paag zyruq pun faa-lo Eei Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq puvj ninb Bua Zwrtq.
10.11: yia maiq pun mivb! yia Kuvj pun mJavg txn mivb zavg zyruq Navq, weig zu'g meib Bua Toq Eei se pun mJavg txn mivb.” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, mo-se Zauj aa-lon yem faa-lo Eei Ra'Myen zu'g zung Zwrtq mig a'q.
10.5: Jopg Eeig xij Fiag taaib yem pwavq Daub peib, zuvq mavg maiq pwatg Dau. tovb px'g Bx'q zevg uaq teij ka'naaiq, Jopg Eeig xij Eang Tauj Revg. lyemb zevg Fiag Eei Dyavj, Jopg Eeig yaag xij Eang Fav Revg.
10.9: mo-se tau, “yia Bua koj lunj Lo faij, yia Bua Eei txn, sia'q, vovb kwanb, yuvb kwanb Zauj pa'ki yuvb kwanb yetg zuvq xij zu'g mivb Revg weig zu'g Tauj uaq yia Bua xij zu'g zruj nxm yinb hrug zyruq. ”
10.16: faa-lo syepg syepq Eei heug mo-se Zauj aa-lon taaib. ninb kxvq, “yia paamd zwid txvg zyruq meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, yaag txvg meib Bua.
10.4: meib maiq Kavq puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb nx, Fav Nxi yia pun Jopg Eeig pia'g meib Eei kua'q.
10.10: faa-lo kxvq, “sij kxvq yia pun meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei msia'q txn Zauj fu'Jweiq mivb Revg, Toq zyruq Zauj meib Bua yem. mq paag yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua taaq kuq kwaij Eei za'eij.
10.22: mo-se zyrug suv puad zyavq Jyenq luvb. kxmj i-yipq teib puv zyrug Mwavj pua Nxi.
10.12: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se, “suv meib Eei puad Jiaj i-yipq teib puv kub vwaaig pun Jopg Eeig faanq pwavq teib puv Eang Revg px'g Bx'q zevg Fiag uaq teij ka'naaiq.”
10.15: Jopg Eeig Dwi Dipg Daub peib Mwavj Revg. px'g Bx'q liud zevg Fiag Eei Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq Jopg Eeig Eang Revg. yem Deig Eei kcvb zwavj ka'naaiq Zauj yem Dyavj Eei pyruq Eang Revg. i-yipq teib puv maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq Dyavb nxmb mcv fai yetg tiub miab mcv a'q.
10.13: mo-se zyrug suv pyaab Byaag Jiaj i-yipq teib puv kub vwaaig. zyruq pun tov puv mcvj Eei Ryaauj pwrng yetg Nxi yetg mwrnd. ta'Eeig Dxm Ryaauj zyrug pwrng Jyenq Jopg Eeig Funb Funb Eei pia'g teib puv a'q.
10.1: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj mo-se, “meib cvj mivb lxd faa-lo. yia pun ninb Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Hruq vcvg, weig pun yia yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zruj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog,
10.26: yia Bua Eei scvb Kuq yetg zuvq yaag xij zu'g txb mivb Revg. lyemb yetg nxm teib yaag maiq lyrub. yia Bua xij zu'g yem scvb Kuq kwanb kinq Zwrtq teij zavg zyruq yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, mq paag Tauj uaq zang Zivj taaib hiuq tu'q lovg haiq Euvg ziag ninb.”
10.25: mo-se kxvq, “meib zuvq xij zu'g pun yia Bua maaib puaq ziag Eei Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei scvb Kuq pun yia Bua ziag pun zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb.

22.18: “zruj faatq Eei msia'q txn, xij zu'g taij kwavg.
22.8: zx'q maiq tu'q Janb za'g nx, xij zu'g txb syru ka'naaiq uaq taub pyaub zyruq mivb tunj sig myenb uaq zaab mavg kaaj, zeid ninb kanb nimg fai maiq zeid.
22.3: mq paag sij kxvq Ba'Nxi Zwrtq taaib ninb Bx'q taig nx, ninb zyrug maaib taij myenb Eei zwid. “Janb za'g zuvq xij zu'g pwib ninb nimg Eei ka'naaiq. maiq maaib haiq Euvg pwib nx, xij zu'g maaig ninb kanb taaib pwib.
22.21: “maiq tuvq zruj to'g hxig Zauj meib Bua yem Eei kanb fivj myenb, weig zu'g zinb Daavg meib Bua yaag yem i-yipq teib puv penj kanb fivj myenb.
22.14: “kxvq Navq maaib myenb kaaq laavd zavg kxb yrud Eei scvb Kuq mivb lovg, scvb Kuq Eei zyruq maiq pwatg Eei zyavb hog uaq taub scvb Kuq zu'g mun fai taig nx, kaaq Eei myenb xij zu'g Tipq Junb.
22.23: sij kxvq zruj hxig ninb Bua, ninb Bua heug Jyenq Toq yia Tevj, yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij mwavj ninb Bua.
22.6: “haiq taub yem Deig puaq trud, trud yaag lanb Fimb Byx'g, cvj lanb zu'g myenb Eei Byaub Dwi fai maiq kcvb kaatq Eei Byaub fai puaq Revg zyavb Rov Deig, puaq trud uaq laanb myenb xij zu'g Tipq Junb Revg.
22.2: “sij kxvq myenb pwatg Janb za'g wetq Kwrtq pia'g pyauq zyrug Bx'q Janb za'g taig nx, Bx'q Janb za'g uaq taub maiq maaib taij myenb Eei zwid.
22.20: “haiq taub txb ka'naaiq ziag pun kanb taub zyenb, maiq zeid Kuvj ziag pun zyruq Navq, uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g myetg a'q.
22.24: yia zyrug Qiaj Jiad! haig, pun meib Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. meib Bua Eei auq zyrug penj aub kwaaq, meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq yaag penj kub hanb fu'Jweiq mig a'q.
22.28: “maiq tuvq Ki Tinb huvb. yaag maiq tuvq zyruj kruj pc'g fivj Eei Jyen.
22.7: “sij kxvq maaib myenb txb Eaanb fai Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq pun taub Jwavg laavd Eei kxb yrud Tevj syru, uaq teij ka'naaiq yaag zu'g Janb za'g nimg mig a'q, zx'q tu'q Janb za'g nx, Janb za'g kanb xij zu'g pwib. yetg kruq xij zu'g pwib i kruq.
22.29: “maiq tuvq vaib, Pyatq Nxi txb meib Bua Eei laavb zi'g, a'vung tiuq Zauj ka'lanq yrub fovg hxg pun yia. “xij zu'g txb taub taub txnb la'kauq taaib pun yia.
22.19: “haiq taub myenb Yenj scvb Kuq, uaq taub xij zu'g tivg zwid taij taig.
22.17: kxvq Navq sia'q Eei tia maiq Kavq pun uaq taub mJavg txn lovg, mJavg txn Zxg xij zu'g Zwrtq Bua'g tovb maiq pweij Jiaj txn Eei sia'q Eei leib kiv Eaanb.
22.31: “meib Bua zruj yia Eei Zivb Revg myenb. weig naaiq maiq tuvq Eang Yiab ka'naaiq vaatg Eei scvb Kuq xq. xij zu'g kwavg pun Juq Eang.
22.30: meib Bua Eei vovb, yuvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Eei taaub Txi txn yaag xij zu'g fuvj pun yia. pun txn Zauj maa yem pwavq siag Nxi. Yetg Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g fuvj pun yia.
22.27: weig zu'g ninb Kuvj maaib naaiq Du'g teij tomb lwib Daauq pwij sin Navq. ninb maiq maaib nx, ninb lovg haiq Euvg homg Jyenq pweij mFxmb? sij kxvq ninb heug Jyenq Toq yia Tevj, yia zyrug mwavj ninb Eei waag, weig zu'g yia Kxb lyenb myenb.
22.11: Tevj mavg Eei myenb xij zu'g txv Jyenq zyruq hruq waag kxvq, maiq zeid ninb nimg uaq taub Eei ka'naaiq. scvb Kuq Eei zyruq kanb xij zu'g lcvd Dxtq. Tevj kruj uaq taub maiq zu'g pwib a'q.
22.5: “haiq taub puvj scvb Kuq yem ninb kanb Eei Deig fai a'vung Wivj Eang miaq, scvb Kuq yaag saau mivb pia'g kanb taub Eei Deig Eang ka'naaiq, scvb Kuq zyruq xij zu'g zx'q kanb Eei Deig kaub lovj Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq fai a'vung Wivj kaub lovj Jiaj Eei pyruq taaib Tipq.
22.9: haiq zang maaib koj Eei sig, maiq kunq se laaij vovb, fai lxb, pa'ki yuvb, lwib hruj fai haiq Euvg ka'naaiq tivj laaib, sij kxvq maaib taub kxvq, ‘naaiq se yia Eei,’ xij zu'g txb ninb Bua i taub mivb Tauj tunj sig myenb uaq tunj. tivg haiq taub txvg, txvg uaq taub xij zu'g pwib i kruq.
22.16: “sij kxvq maaib taub sia'q maiq Ryaaug Jiaj txn yaag maiq kcvb maaib haiq taub kxvq zyavb ninb mq paag maaib taub mJavg txn Duaq ninb Zauj pweij nx, uaq taub mJavg txn zuvq xij zu'g Zwrtq leib kiv Eaanb yaag xij zu'g lovg uaq taub sia'q zruj ninb Eei auq a'q.
22.4: “sij kxvq ninb nimg taaib Eei scvb Kuq, maiq kunq vovb fai lxb fai pa'ki yuvb, Zxg yem ninb Eei puab Diaq, maiq kcvb maaig maiq kcvb taij, yetg taub xij zu'g pwib i taub.
22.10: “haiq taub txb lxb fai vovb fai pa'ki yuvb fai haiq Euvg scvb Kuq yaag tu'q, pun taub Jwavg laavd Eei kxb yrud Tevj ninb kruj, sij kxvq scvb Kuq taig fai zu'g mun, fai zu'g myenb Zaavq mivb yaag maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg nx,
22.22: “maiq tuvq zruj to'g aub kwaaq Zauj kub hanb fu'Jweiq.
22.12: mq paag sij kxvq Tevj kruj Eei myenb kruj Jyenq Eei zyavb hog zu'g Janb za'g nimg uaq taub scvb Kuq nx, kruj Eei myenb xij zu'g Tipq Junb.
22.15: sij kxvq scvb Kuq Eei zyruq Zauj Jyenq yem nx, kaaq lovg Eei myenb maiq zu'g Tipq. sij kxvq penj kruq taaib Eei scvb Kuq, scvb Kuq zyruq tu'q kruq Eei Eaanb tiq scvb Kuq Eei mGxvq Navq.
22.13: sij kxvq Yiab ka'naaiq taaib vaatg scvb Kuq taig, xij zu'g txb Yiab ka'naaiq Eang zevg Eei xq taaib pun scvb Kuq zyruq mavg. kruj Eei myenb zyrug maiq zu'g Tipq a'q.
22.1: “sij kxvq maaib myenb zruj za'g nimg vovb fai pa'ki yuvb txb mivb taij fai maaig, yetg taub vovb xij zu'g pwib pyaa taub, yetg taub pa'ki yuvb pwib pyei taub.
22.26: sij kxvq meib lovg haiq taub Eei tomb lwi zruj txvb taaub nx, Ba'Nxi maiq kcvb mwrtq xij zu'g Twij Rwrnj pun ninb,
22.25: “sij kxvq yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj maaib taub yia Eei pc'g fivj Jomg haig, Tevj meib Bua kaaq Eaanb, maiq tuvq zruj Navq puvj zc'q Eei myenb heug ninb Zwrtq leig zinb.

12.18: zib Laaj zyepg feij uaq Nxi luvb maanb Mwavj, Tauj Eig zyepg yetq luvb maanb Mwavj, xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq.
12.45: “Zauj yem meib Bua Eei pyauq Zaamj paaq Eei Kc'q myenb fai Zivq taaib Eei kovb myenb Eang maiq tu'q.
12.3: xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, naaiq nxm Laaj Tauj scvb zyepg uaq Nxi, taub taub mJavg txn xij zu'g Tevj kanb Eei Mwavq txig kinq taub yuvb txn fai pa'ki yuvb txn, yetg pwrng myenb lovg yetg taub.
12.43: zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon, “naaiq se siaj mcvg zipq Eei leib Eeig. “maiq tuvq pun kanb fivj myenb Eang.
12.50: zyruq Navq haiq nx Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Navq uaq nx zruj.
12.14: “naaiq nxm Nxi meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq. yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig xij zu'g lovg naaiq nxm Nxi Jiaj zipq hrug zyruq, se yetg liud xij zu'g kan Eei leib Eeig.
12.48: “sij kxvq maaib kanb fivj myenb taaib yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, ninb yaag xij Jiaj zyruq Eei siaj mcvg zipq, uaq laanb myenb Eei pyauq zov mJavg txn yetg zuvq xij zu'g Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Revg. ninb zyrug Navq pwrnb teig myenb nx, Eang tu'q Eei. mq paag haiq taub mJavg txn maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid, maiq tu'q Zauj Jyenq Eang.
12.34: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug zx'q Zaij zyavj maiq kcvb an pivq Eei Fuaq tapq Jyenq ninb Bua Zaij Fuaq Eei punb, lovg lwi peu Jyenq, cvj pwij Jyenq mivb a'q.
12.2: “naaiq nxm Laaj xij zu'g penj meib Bua Eei zib Laaj, se syavb Havj Eei taaub nxm Laaj.
12.36: zyruq pun i-yipq myenb Gxi fim Gxi eij ninb Bua. ninb Bua Toq haiq Euvg, i-yipq myenb zyrug pun uaq Euvg. ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx Duaq tu'q i-yipq myenb Eei ka'naaiq txb Jyenq mivb Revg.
12.35: ninb Bua ei Jyenq mo-se Paaiq Eei waag zruj, Tevj i-yipq myenb Toq Jyem Eaanb Eei syrub setq Zauj lwib hruj.
12.24: “meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei zeib fun xij zu'g yetg liud kan naaiq tiub leid.
12.7: yem haiq nxm pyauq Eang, xij zu'g zx'q uaq taub yuvb txn Eei Ryaamq Raatq Jyenq kcvb kub vwaaig Zauj i puv kcvb zrug.
