12.17: “xij zu'g Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq weig zu'g tovb naaiq nxm Nxi yia txb meib Bua kwanb kwanb yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq. weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq, penj meib Bua yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig Eei leib Eeig.
12.49: pwrnb teig i-saa-laa-en myenb fai yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb xij zu'g Jwavg naaiq tiub leid lovg.”
12.11: Eang Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx Eang. xij zu'g sai Jyenq hrub Laav, taapg Jyenq heb, nanq Jyenq pyaab Byaag kaanq Jyenq Eang. naaiq se zyruq Eei siaj mcvg zipq.
12.33: i-yipq myenb pe'q i-saa-laa-en myenb kaanq Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei teib puv. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Bua maiq pyauj nx c'q, yia Bua yetg zuvq taig Revg a'q.”
12.16: ta'yetq Nxi xij zu'g kapq zunq zruj leib paaij. ta'Zyetq Nxi fib Navq Eei. naaiq teij Nxi ka'Euad, Zwrtq liud Beng Eang Beng hopq pun zwavj myenb Eang, maiq tuvq zruj kanb Euvg kov.
12.40: i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv feij pc'q faab zyepg Havj.
12.37: i-saa-laa-en myenb yem laa-maa-setg Zwrtq Jauq mivb Tauj sukg-Kotq. mJavg txn maaib leib maiq ko Ju'q sinj taub, Zib Zwrtq msia'q txn Zauj fu'Jweiq.
12.4: haiq pwrng myenb Mwavq zo'g, Eang maiq Revg yetg taub pa'ki yuvb txn nx, xij zu'g Zauj yem nitq fatq uaq pwrng Jwavg Eang. yaag xij zu'g funj pa'ki yuvb txn ziuj myenb laanb Eang tu'q Bu'ziaj.
12.51: tovb uaq Nxi, zyruq txb kwanb kwanb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
12.12: “tovb naaiq mwrnd yia xij mivb kxmj i-yipq teib puv taij Revg taub taub txnb la'kauq Zauj scvb Kuq Fiag Eei taaub Txi txn. yia yaag xij syemq tivg i-yipq teib puv yetg zuvq zyenb Eei zwid. yia se zyruq.
12.46: “Eang Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g yem pyauq ka'Euad Eang. maiq tuvq txb Zwrtq kcvb Ka'Dau. Eang uaq taub yuvb txn maiq tuvq pun Buvq nauq yetg tiub.
12.13: Raatq kcvb zrug, kcvb kub vwaaig uaq teij Ryaamq zruj Javb hog pun Ziv meib Bua yem Eei txvj. yia pwatg naaiq teij Ryaamq, yia zyrug pcv za'g Jiaj, Genj Zwrtq meib Bua a'q. yia taij i-yipq myenb uaq zang, yia maiq pun meib Bua zu'g naaiq teij tovb yia hxig i-yipq myenb mcvg Eei ze'g naang.
12.26: meib Bua Eei naamb Erud naaig kaaj meib Bua, ‘kan naaiq Euvg leib Eeig maaib haiq Euvg eij leid?’
12.28: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb ei Jyenq zyruq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon Eei waag zruj.
12.8: tovb uaq mwrnd ninb Bua xij zu'g Eang zi'q taaib Eei yuvb xq Zauj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Zauj Jyenq laib im.
12.9: uaq teij xq maiq tuvq Eang Eyemd yaag maiq tuvq zruq. xij zu'g zyavb taub zi'q, lyemb mGxvq, lyemb puab zauj, lyemb Jaavb, Lan lo haaij.
12.32: txb Jyenq meib Bua Eei vovb kwanb, yuvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb kwanb, Navq meib Bua kxvq uaq nx mivb a'q. yaag Toq fu'q pun yia.”
12.21: mo-se heug i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib Rxib, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g mivb ziuj meib Bua Eei pyauq zov Mwavq txig kinq taub pa'ki yuvb txn fai yuvb txn taij taaib zruj siaj mcvg zipq Eei pa'ki yuvb txn.
12.23: zyruq xij mivb kxmj i-yipq teib puv taij i-yipq myenb. ninb pwatg kcvb kub vwaaig Zauj i puv kcvb zrug Eei Ryaamq nx, ninb zyrug Jiaj kcvb Daavg, maiq pun myetg mcvg uaq taub pia'g meib Bua Eei pyauq taij meib Bua.
12.6: kinq Zwrtq taaib wij Jyenq Tauj naaiq nxm Laaj zyepg feij uaq Nxi. luvb maanb Mwavj, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb xij zu'g zx'q ninb Bua Eei yuvb txn taij.
12.44: mq paag lovg Eaanb maaid taaib Eei nrub kauq xij zu'g Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Daavg Zivj pun ninb Eang tu'q.
12.20: maiq tuvq Eang haiq Euvg an pivq Eei ka'naaiq. maiq kunq yem haaij, xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq.”
12.5: lovg pa'ki yuvb txn yaag tu'q, yuvb txn yaag tu'q, mq paag xij zu'g lovg txij Havj, maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei yuvb fai pa'ki yuvb kruq txn.
12.19: naaiq teij siag Nxi maiq tuvq pun haiq taub Eei pyauq maaib pivq. haiq taub Eang ta'faanb an pivq Eei ka'naaiq, maiq kunq kanb fivj myenb fai pwrnb fivj myenb, uaq taub xij zu'g yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj Pai kwavg mivb.
12.38: cvj maaib kanb fivj myenb Zamq Eei Zauj Jyenq vovb kwanb, yuvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb kwanb Zamq Eei, kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb.
12.31: tovb uaq mwrnd faa-lo heug mo-se Zauj aa-lon taaib. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua kunq mivb a'q. lyemb meib Bua Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kaanq Zwrtq yia Eei teib puv a'q. Navq meib Bua Toq uaq nx, kunq mivb zavg meib Bua Eei zyruq maa'b!
12.27: meib Bua xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘naaiq se fovg hxg ziag pun zyruq, weig Jiaj zyruq siaj mcvg zipq. se yia Bua yem i-yipq teib puv, zyruq taij i-yipq myenb uaq zang, ninb Jiaj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei pyauq, lyrub yia Bua Eei mcvg.’+” pc'g fivj zyrug kweig Fiag Dau paaij zyruq.
12.41: pwavq feij pc'q faab zyepg Havj uaq Nxi, zyruq Eei kwanb kwanb myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
12.1: yem i-yipq teib puv zyruq kxvq Buaj mo-se Zauj aa-lon,
12.39: ninb Bua zi'q yem i-yipq teib puv txb taaib Eei Fuab Eyemd. ninb Bua maiq tu'q an pivq weig zu'g ninb Bua zu'g zung, pe'q Jyenq Zwrtq i-yipq zyrug maiq maaib Qavj Beng ninb Bua Eei Eang hopq.
12.47: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb xij zu'g Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq.
12.10: maiq tuvq lyrub yetg teij Tauj luvb Dxm. sij kxvq maaib zevg Tauj luvb Dxm xij zu'g puaq kwavg.
12.25: meib Bua mivb Tauj zyruq lcvd pun meib Bua uaq nxm teib puv, meib Bua xij zu'g kan naaiq Euvg leib Eeig.
12.22: xij zu'g zx'q yetg zeiq hu-sopg miaq zyemj punb ka'Euad Eei Ryaamq, txb mivb Raatq kcvb kub vwaaig Zauj i puv kcvb zrug. maiq tuvq pun haiq taub Zwrtq kcvb Ka'Dau Tauj luvb Dxm.
12.42: i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq mwrnd, zyruq zuaq Jyenq, kruj Jyenq ninb Bua. Navq naaig, i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig xij zu'g yetg liud Javj Jyenq uaq mwrnd.
12.15: “siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq. taaub Nxi xij zu'g zx'q yem pyauq Eei pivq Zwrtq Revg weig zu'g yem taaub Nxi Tauj ta'Zyetq Nxi ka'Euad, haiq taub Eang an pivq Eei ka'naaiq nx, xij zu'g yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj zu'g Pai kwavg mivb.
12.29: Tauj Daamq mwrnd, zyruq taij i-yipq teib puv myenb Eei taub taub txnb la'kauq. yem zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub faa-lo Eei txnb la'kauq taij Tauj yem lob Mwavj uaq taub zwib myenb Eei txnb la'kauq. lyemb scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn yetg zuvq taij Revg.
12.30: uaq mwrnd faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj Jiad sin taaib. i-yipq myenb yetg zuvq Byrub Byrub Eei Eyemq, weig zu'g maiq maaib yetg nxm pyauq maiq taig yetg laanb myenb.

15.18: zyruq yetg liud tu'q zruj huvb Tauj maang kruq maang txig.”
15.8: meib lovg Ba'zxv Eei Qiaj pyomq Kxiq, Kxiq Eei uam zyrug Dwi Jyenq uaq, lyepg za'g Navq laatg nx. Kxib Do'q Do Jiaj Eei txvj vcvg mig a'q.
15.3: zyruq zruj Bx'q Jaaj Eei pcv, ninb Eei Buaj heug zyruq.
15.21: mi-lyem zyrug paauj Ruv kxvq, “meib Bua xij zu'g paauj Ruv Zev zyruq weig zu'g ninb Bx'q tomb Jaaj hivb mig a'q. ninb zx'q maad Zauj keb maad myenb zxi Fiag Kxiq ka'Euad.”
15.14: maang fivj myenb haid zyrug sin zinj Revg. fi-li-saa-tia myenb kevb! kamb Riaj haig.
15.23: ninb Bua mivb Tauj nxm txvj, Buaj heug maa-laa, mq paag uam im haig, hopq maiq tu'q. laaij uam im myenb Zivj heug uaq nxm txvj maa-laa.
15.6: “o zyruq aag, meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad maaib Bua'g hxvb haig Eei tomb Qa'q. o zyruq aag, meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad zx'q winb wavq Bx'q paaig Revg.
15.2: zyruq zruj yia Eei Qa'q Zauj yia Eei Ruv, ninb se Fruj yia uaq taub. ninb zruj yia Eei Tinb huvb, yia xij Zev ninb. se yia Eei tia Eei Tinb huvb, yia xij Taaib ninb zruj Lo.
15.20: aa-lon Eei txg, zyruq Eei trug waag myenb, mi-lyem, nanq Jyenq ninb Eei lxb Rod Bx'q Jyenq Ruv mivb. yetg zwavj msia'q txn yaag nanq Jyenq lxb Rod, yetg ping Bx'q Jyenq Ruv, yetg ping Zavj heij, kan Jyenq mi-lyem mivb.
15.24: pc'g fivj zyrug vopq mo-se cvj naaig ninb, “yia Bua xij zu'g hopq haiq Euvg lcb?”
15.7: meib lovg meib Lo haig Eei tomb Qa'q paaig Revg meib Eei winb wavq. meib Qiaj Jiad Navq Fopg trud, puaq Qwi ninb Bua Navq puaq Byaub Gaauq kxn nx.
15.19: faa-lo huvb Eei maad Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj keb maad myenb Fiag Kxiq uaq zang, zyruq pun Kxiq Eei uam cvj lyrug Rwrnj yemj Revg ninb Bua. mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb yavb Kxiq Bu'Dovj Eei Daub Gaai Jiaj.
15.17: meib txb ninb Bua pia'g taaib lyepg vwaab kxn yem meib kanb Eei Bov. o zyruq aag, se meib kinq taaib zruj meib kanb yem Eei txvj. o zyruq aag, se meib kanb Eei puad Zeij taaib Eei sivj ting.
15.27: ninb Bua cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj e-lim teig. maaib zyepg Eeig zivq uam Zauj Zyetq zyepg zuvb taau. ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq uamb Len lyepg Zyavq.
15.11: “o zyruq aag, yetg zuvq zyenb maaib haiq taub Navq meib? maaib haiq taub Navq meib Ziv Revg Jiaj? haiq taub haib Navq meib zruj Bua'g hxvb haig, henq haig Eei tomb sig?
15.5: Do haig Eei uam yemj ninb Bua, ninb Bua Navq la'pyeiq zemb Fiag Kxib Do'q.
15.9: “winb wavq kxvq, ‘yia xij zung Jyenq mivb. yia xij zung zaaig, zx'q Jyenq ninb Bua. yia xij luq Revg ka'naaiq pun Gxi. yia xij sweib yia kanb lovg Tauj pwavq Hruq. yia xij pcv yia Eei Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq. yia kanb Eei puad xij myetg Revg ninb Bua.’
15.16: ninb Bua za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig, Hruq waaig Revg. o zyruq aag, laaij meib Eei tomb Qa'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj kau, zuvq maiq haib tovd Navq la'pyeiq nx, zuaq meib Eei pc'g fivj Jiaj mivb, se zuaq meib zua'g Eei myenb Jiaj Revg.
15.4: ninb zx'q faa-lo huvb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj pcvb kwanb zxi Fiag Kxiq. faa-lo huvb kaub lovj Jiaj Eei pcvb pyeiq zu'g Kxib si'q yemj taig Revg.
15.10: meib Eei Ryaauj pwrng taaib, Kxiq zyrug yemj Revg ninb Bua. ninb Bua Dxtq Fiag tomb uamb seij, zemb Fiag Navq Juvd nx.
15.22: Ga'haaq mo-se cvj txb i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Kxib si'q Len Zwrtq mivb pia'g su-waa teib puvb Waav. yem teib puvb Waav yavb pua Nxi yaag lxd maiq tu'q uam hopq.
15.12: meib suv Zwrtq meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad, Daub peib zyrug na'q Revg yia Bua Eei winb wavq.
15.15: zruj Lo Eei e-Dom myenb kamb Riaj Revg, mo-apg Eei pyeiq zeiq sin zinj Jyenq yem. Kaa-naa-an myenb kamb Riaj kau, Ba'Riu yu'g Revg.
15.13: “meib yetg liud Namq myenb, xij yend meib zua'g Rwrnj uaq teij myenb Eei Jauq. meib lovg tomb Qa'q txb ninb Bua mivb Tauj meib yem Eei Zivb Revg txvj.
15.1: uaq zang mo-se Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb paauj naaiq tiub Ruv Zev zyruq. “yia xij paauj Ruv Zev zyruq weig zu'g ninb Bx'q tomb Jaaj hivb mig a'q. ninb zx'q maad Zauj keb maad Eei myenb fevj Fiag Kxiq ka'Euad.
15.26: ninb kxvq, “sij kxvq meib Bua lovb lovj mwavj yia, zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei waag, zruj Euvb Euvg ei yia pwatg hxpg Eei Jauq, meib Bua yaag mwavj lovj yia Eei leib latg, kan Revg yia Eei yetg zuvq leid, yia zyrug maiq pun meib Bua putq tovb yia pun i-yipq myenb putq Eei pcvg, weig zu'g yia se zyruq, zxg meib Bua Eei pcvg uaq taub.”
15.25: mo-se Qa'q Toq zyruq,  zyruq pun ninb pwatg Ganj Dyavj. ninb zx'q uaq Ganj Dyavj kwcvj Fiag uam, uam zyrug Kuq taaib a'q. yem uaq nxm txvj zyruq lyepg tiub leid Zauj leib latg seij ninb Bua.

13.18: Tinb huvb zyrug txb ninb Bua wivg yavb teib puvb Waav, mivb Kxib si'q uaq tiub Jauq. Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq zang, i-saa-laa-en myenb txb Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king mivb.
13.8: “tovb uaq Nxi xij zu'g kxvq Buaj meib Bua Eei txn, ‘naaiq se aa tia Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq zang, zyruq weig aa tia zruj Eei sig.’
13.3: mo-se kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “xij zu'g Javj Jyenq naaiq nxm Nxi, tovb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq, zu'g zruj nrub Eei teib puv, uaq nxm Nxi, zyruq lovg ninb Eei tomb Qa'q txb meib Bua Zwrtq taaib. maiq tuvq Eang haiq Euvg an pivq Eei ka'naaiq.
13.21: luvb Nxi zang zyruq yem ninb Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj, Bwrnb Dyrub ka'Euad, txb ninb Bua Eei Jauq. luvb mwrnd zang ninb yem trub Dyrub ziuj Fav ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua luvb Nxi fai luvb mwrnd haib yavb Jauq mivb.
13.14: “Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua Eei txn naaig kaaj, ‘weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx zruj?’ xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq lovg ninb Eei tomb Qa'q txb yia Bua yem i-yipq teib puv zu'g zruj nrub Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib.
13.6: siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq. ta'Zyetq Nxi uaq Nxi xij zu'g Jiaj zipq hrug zyruq.
13.2: “i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei mrud taub txnb la'kauq xij zu'g fuvj pun yia. maiq kunq myenb Eei fai scvb Kuq Eei, ta'faanb kruq uaq teij taaub Txi txn, xij zu'g fuvj pun yia.”
13.20: i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq sukg-Kotq mivb Zxv Dopg liub yem teib puvb Waav ka'Len, e-Taam uaq.
13.7: naaiq teij siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq. yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj yaag maiq tuvq maaib haiq Euvg an pivq Eei ka'naaiq. lyemb maiq tuvq maaib pivq yem meib Bua Eei teib Jaaij ka'Euad.
13.19: mo-se yaag txb Jyenq yo-sepq Eei Buvq mivb, weig zu'g zinb Daavg yo-sepq heug i-saa-laa-en myenb hruq Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag. ninb kxvq, “Tinb huvb Dovg haaij zuvq xij taaib Tevj meib Bua. Tauj uaq zang meib Bua xij zu'g txb Jyenq yia Eei Buvq Zwrtq naaiq nxm txvj.”
13.17: faa-lo huvb puvj i-saa-laa-en pc'g fivj mivb uaq zang, Tinb huvb maiq txb ninb Bua yavb fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei teib puv uaq tiub Jauq Jiaj, maiq kunq uaq tiub Jauq kaub za'g. Tinb huvb kxvq, “Riaj pc'g fivj pwavb zu'g Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig zyrug Tiuq Hruq cvj taauj sin Rwrnj i-yipq teib puv.”
13.11: “zyruq ziuj ninb Zauj meib Bua yaag Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij hruq Jyenq lcvd txb meib Bua pia'g Kaa-naa-an myenb Eei teib puv, zx'q uaq nxm teib puv Jiu pun meib Bua uaq zang,
13.5: zyruq txb meib Bua pia'g Kaa-naa-an myenb, hitq-Tai myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, hi-wai myenb, ye-Butg myenb yem Eei teib puv, se tovb zyruq Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij hruq Jyenq lcvd Jiu pun meib Bua uaq nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv, Havb Havj Tauj naaiq nxm Laaj meib Bua xij zu'g Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq.
13.9: naaiq nxm zipq se Navq nxm Javb hog nctq Jyenq meib Bua Eei puad, Eatq Jyenq meib Bua Eei pyxvb, weig pun meib Bua kxvq zyruq Eei leib latg. weig zu'g zyruq lovg ninb henq haig Eei puad txb meib Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
13.16: kan naaiq Euvg leid se Navq zruj Javb hog nctq Jyenq meib Bua Eei puad fai Eatq Jyenq meib Bua Eei pyxvb, Tevj yia Bua Javj zyruq lovg ninb henq haig Eei puad txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.”
13.4: aa-Bipg Laaj, naaiq nxm Nxi, meib Bua Zwrtq a'q.
13.10: meib Bua xij zu'g Havb Havj Tauj tivg zyavj Eei zyavb hog Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq.
13.22: luvb Nxi zang Bwrnb Dyrub, luvb mwrnd zang trub Dyrub zuvq maiq leib naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei uaq Daavg mcvj.
13.12: meib Bua xij zu'g zx'q mrud taub txnb la'kauq Zauj scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn, kruq uaq teij, fuvj pun zyruq.
13.15: faa-lo huvb Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq puvj yia Bua Zwrtq uaq zang, zyruq taij i-yipq myenb Eei yetg zuvq taaub taub txn. lyemb myenb Eei, lyemb scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn, kruq uaq teij, ninb taij. Navq naaig yia Bua zx'q yetg zuvq scvb Kuq Eei taaub Txi txn, kruq uaq teij, ziag pun zyruq. mq paag yia Bua Eei yetg zuvq taaub taub txn yia Bua zua'g Rwrnj.’
13.13: xij zu'g lovg taub pa'ki yuvb txn zua'g taaub taub lxb kruq txn. sij kxvq maiq zua'g Rwrnj nx, xij zu'g Bx'q ninb Eei Jaav nauq. ta'faanb yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei yetg zuvq taaub taub txn yaag xij zu'g zua'g.

1.18: i-yipq huvb zyrug heug Tevj yuvd kub vwaad uaq teij msia'q txn taaib, naaig ninb Bua, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx zruj? weig haiq tiug lyrub Zwrtq kub vwaab txn Eei mcvg?”
1.8: Ga'haaq kanb maaib taub syavb huvb kunq i-yipq teib puv. ninb maiq hiuq yetg teij Tauj yo-sepq.
1.21: weig zu'g Tevj yuvd kub vwaad uaq teij msia'q txn kamb Riaj Tinb huvb, Taaib Tinb huvb, Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua kanb yaag haib maaib Jaab Junj.
1.14: i-yipq myenb hxig i-saa-laa-en myenb zruj kov Kruq, pun ninb Bua maiq penj haiq Euvg mcvg a'q. aapq ninb Bua zruj niab zun, nctq niab zun, yaag hxig ninb Bua zruj Euvb Euvg lyavb Deig kov. ninb Bua zu'g hxig zruj kov Kruq Tauj Do'q.
1.6: hod taaib, yo-sepq Zauj ninb Eei muab txig, lyemb uaq txig myenb yetg zuvq, kwei seij Revg mig a'q.
1.2: ninb Eei txn Eei Buaj heug lu-Ben, si-me-on, le-wi, yu-Daa,
1.20: Tinb huvb zyrug zruj lovj pun Tevj yuvd kub vwaad uaq teij msia'q txn. i-saa-laa-en myenb cvj Jaa Yaavj Jyenq faauj yaag henq Jyenq faauj.
1.7: mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib funb fa'q Zamq, yrug Yaavj yrug henq, zyrug yem pwavq uaq nxm teib puv.
1.19: uaq teij msia'q txn tau, “hipq-lu myenb msia'q txn maiq Navq i-yipq myenb msia'q txn. ninb Bua yuvd kub vwaad syepq haig. yia Bua mivb maiq kcvb Tauj, ninb Bua zuvq yuvd Daavg mig a'q.”
1.17: mq paag Tevj yuvd kub vwaad Eei msia'q txn kamb Riaj Tinb huvb, Taaib Tinb huvb, zyrug maiq ei i-yipq huvb Eei waag. ninb Bua lyrub kub vwaab txn Eei mcvg.
1.11: i-yipq myenb zyrug Paaiq kovb prub pyeiq kunq Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb, aapq ninb Bua zruj kov Kruq. ninb Bua Zeij pi-Tom Zauj laa-maa-setg zruj faa-lo huvb syru ka'naaiq Eei zivb.
1.5: yaa-Kopq Eei txnb Jweiq funb fa'q yetg zuvq maaib Zyetq zyepg taub. maaib yo-sepq uaq taub zuvq yem i-yipq teib puv mig a'q.
1.9: uaq taub huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, “naaiq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb kaub Zamq Bua yaag kaub henq Bua.
1.16: “meib Bua Tevj hipq-lu myenb yuvd kub vwaad, pwatg yuvd tu'q kub vwaab txn nx, taij kwavg a'q. kub vwaab sia'q nx, lyrub ninb Eei mcvg.”
1.10: taaib maa'b! Bua xij zu'g lovg kuq kwaij Eei za'eij pun ninb Bua maiq haib Yaavj. maiq zeid nx, ninb Bua haib Yaavj Zamq Jyenq faauj. Ga'haaq sij kxvq Zwrtq Bx'q tomb Jaaj Eei sig, ninb Bua haib Zauj Bua Eei winb wavq tovb Hruq taaib Bx'q Bua yaag haib pyauj Zwrtq Bua Eei teib puv.”
1.22: zruj kau, faa-lo huvb hatg ninb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj, “xij zu'g zx'q hipq-lu myenb yuvd Eei yetg zuvq syavb kub vwaab txn kwavg nai-aa Daaib Revg. sia'q nx, lyrub Jyenq.”
1.12: i-yipq myenb yetg zei zruj hxig, i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg zei Zamq Jyenq faauj, Yaavj Jyenq Zwrtq. i-yipq myenb zyrug kamb Riaj haig i-saa-laa-en myenb,
1.15: i-yipq teib puv Eei huvb kxvq Buaj Tevj hipq-lu myenb yuvd kub vwaad uaq teij msia'q txn, maaib taub Eei Buaj heug sipq-faa, maaib taub heug Pu-aa,
1.13: Qa'q hxig ninb Bua zruj kov Kruq.
1.1: naaiq se yaa-Kopq Eei txn Eei Buaj, tovb Zauj yaa-Kopq pia'g i-yipq teib puv, kx'g myenb txb kx'g myenb Eei Mwavq txig kan Jyenq mivb.

26.18: Dopg liub Eei naamb puv xij zu'g zruj Eig zyepg nxm Qxv.
26.8: zruj Kwaaib Kwaaiq fib Fyetq fib Daau, Daauq faab zyepg Dx'g, Javq pyei Dx'g.
26.33: xij zu'g zx'q Bc'g kcvb Dia Kwavj Jyenq vau, cvj zx'q lcvd vcvg waag faav ton Jyenq Bc'g kcvb Dia ka'Euad mcvj. naaiq Kwaaiq Dia Genj Jyenq kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj Zauj Zivb Revg uaq Qovj.
26.3: zx'q pyaa Kwaaiq kapq Jyenq lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq. cvj maaib uaq teij pyaa Kwaaiq fib Navq Eei lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq.
26.32: naaiq Kwaaiq Dia xij zu'g lovg Jyemb vau Kwavj Jyenq pyei nxm tovg. tovg xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem cvj Topq Jyenq pyei nxm Eaanb Taapq.
26.21: cvj zruj feij zyepg nxm Eaanb Taapq weig Topq Qxv Eei zauj. yetg nxm Qxv lovg i nxm Taapq.
26.35: zx'q tiab ton Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq Dia ka'Eiag mcvj, Dopg liub Eei pa'q puv. cvj zx'q tav ton naamb puv mcvj txij zyavj uaq nxm tiab.
26.14: cvj lovg yuvb Dopq Eomg taaib si'q Eei komq yemg, Zauj fua'q taaib lovj Eei scvb Kuq Dopq komq yemg.
26.23: cvj kanb zruj i nxm Qxv weig Dopg liub Ga'haaq mcvj Eei kx'q.
26.6: cvj lovg Jyem zruj Mmd zyepg nxm ka'naaib Kauj zx'q naaiq Kwaaiq Eei nekq pavg uaq Kwaaiq Eei nekq Kauj Jyenq penj yetg nxm Dopg liub mig a'q.
26.34: xij zu'g zx'q Zeij en Eei weig komq Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav kub vwaaig, an Jyenq kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj ka'Euad.
26.2: Kwaaib Kwaaiq xij zu'g fib Fyetq fib Daau, Daauq Eig zyepg petq Dx'g, Javq pyei Dx'g.
26.36: “Bc'g Dopg liub Eei kcvb Daavg uaq Kwaaiq Dia xij zu'g lovg la'maab swib mwrng zxpg Jyenq pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, Zauj si'g hovg Datq taaib yaag maaib puab taub Zovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Rweig Eei.
26.20: weig Dopg liub Eei pa'q puv yaag xij zu'g zruj Eig zyepg nxm Qxv.
26.24: kx'q Eei i nxm Qxv xij zu'g yem ka'Diaq hxpg Tauj kub vwaaig yaag Jwavg nxm Kru Kru Jyenq. i puv kx'q xij zu'g zruj fib Navq Eei.
26.28: Bu'Dovj uaq wrng xij zu'g zruj penj yetg tiub Dyavj yem naaiq puv Zunj txv uaq puv.
26.7: “cvj lovg yuvb pyei Datq zyepg yetq Kwaaiq Dia taaib komq Dopg liub ka'Eiag uaq yemg.
26.29: naaiq teij Qxv yetg zuvq xij zu'g pwav Jyenq Jyem cvj lovg Jyem zruj Kwiv tivj Jyenq Zunj kuvb kavg uaq teij Fovb laan. kuvb kavg Fovb laan yetg zuvq yaag xij zu'g pwav Jyenq Jyem.
26.19: cvj lovg Eaanb zruj feij zyepg nxm Taapq Topq Qxv Eei zauj. yetg nxm Qxv lovg i nxm Taapq.
26.17: nxmb nxm Qxv i puv Qxvb zauj Pai ka'Eiag mcvj pun ninb Zitq teij. yetg nxm Qxv Eei zauj zyrug Zauj ta'Eeig nxm Qxv Eei zauj kapq Jyenq. Dopg liub Eei yetg zuvq Qxv xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj.
26.31: “xij zu'g lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg zxpg Jyenq la'maab swib mwrng Datq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia, cvj lxd puab taub lovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj.
26.30: “xij zu'g ziuj yem Bov Buaj meib Eei Euvg zeiq Zxv naaiq nxm Dopg liub.
26.27: uaq puv yaag xij zu'g maaib pyaa tiub. Ga'haaq mcvj, fai puv uaq puv, cvj maaib pyaa tiub.
26.11: cvj lovg tovb si'q zruj Mmd zyepg nxm ka'naaib Kauj, Kauj Jyenq uaq teij nekq pun ninb penj yetg nxm Dopg liub.
26.5: yetg Kwaaiq tivj Mmd zyepg nxm nekq. naaiq Kwaaiq Eei nekq Zauj uaq Kwaaiq Eei nekq xij zu'g txij zyavj.
26.9: zx'q pyaa Kwaaiq kapq Jyenq lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq. cvj zx'q Ju'q Kwaaiq fib Navq Eei lunb penj yetg Kwaaiq. naaiq Kwaaiq Eei ka'Len xij zu'g Ripq Rwrnj zruj i yemg yem Dopg liub Eei Ra'Myen mcvj.
26.16: nxmb nxm Qxv xij zu'g zruj Lav zyepg Dx'g, Javq Dx'g pyenj.
26.37: xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj pyaa nxm tovg, yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem, cvj tivj Jyenq Jyemb vau Kwavj Jyenq Bc'g kcvb Dia. cvj lovg tovb si'q zruj pyaa nxm Taapq weig Topq tovg.
26.4: xij zu'g lovg Diab Buaq zruj nekq tivj Jyenq naaiq teij i Kwaaiq tomb Dia Eei Diab Len.
26.10: yem naaiq teij i Kwaaiq tomb Dia Eei Diab Len, yetg Kwaaiq xij zu'g tivj Mmd zyepg nxm nekq.
26.22: Dopg liub Gaav, fai puv uaq puv, xij zu'g zruj Ju'q nxm Qxv.
26.12: zevg Fiag uaq teij i Dx'g Dia xij zu'g puvj suab Fiag Dopg liub Ga'haaq mcvj.
26.15: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj Dopg liub Eei Qxv lyepg za'g.
26.13: komq Dopg liub Eei Dia i puv ka'Len, yetg puv Daauq yetg Dx'g weig Ria Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub ka'Len pwav Jyenq.
26.1: “xij zu'g lovg zyepg Kwaaiq Dia zruj nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub. naaiq teij Dia lovg la'maab swib mwrng zxpg Jyenq pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg Datq taaib. lxd puab taub lovj Eei myenb Zovj Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj.
26.26: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj kuvb kavg Dyavj. yetg puv Dopg liub Eei Qxv xij zu'g maaib pyaa tiub.
26.25: Navq naaiq yetg zuvq maaib Yetg nxm Qxv yaag maaib zyepg lua'g nxm Eaanb Taapq. yetg nxm Qxv Topq i nxm Taapq.

25.18: lovg Jyem taaq i taub Ke-lu-Bim taaib an i puv faavb taaub.
25.8: “zwavj myenb xij zu'g weig yia zruj nxm sivj ting, yia zyrug yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.
25.33: naaiq teij Gwaab, yetg Zaaj xij zu'g maaib pua nxm zaanq Navq an-man pyavb nx, nxmb nxm maaib pyavb Eweid Zauj pyavb ei. ta'Eeig Zaaj fib Navq Eei. yem tavb sin Zwrtq Eei Ju'q Zaaj fib Navq Revg.
25.3: meib xij zu'g zipq ninb Bua fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq se Jyem, Eaanb, tovb si'q,
25.32: tavb sin xij zu'g pun zruj Ju'q Zaaj Gwaab, yetg puv maaib pua Zaaj.
25.21: zx'q yia xij Jiu pun meib uaq teij i Kwaaiq lcvd vcvg waag Eei la'pyeib penq tapq Jyenq faav ka'Euad cvj zx'q Gaaij komq Jyenq.
25.35: Ju'q Zaaj Gwaab, Zaab Zaaj Gwaab kxn ka'Diaq mcvj maaib nxm pyavb Eweid.
25.40: zruj naaiq teij ka'naaiq xij zu'g faij fim, ei Jyenq yem Bov Buaj meib Eei Euvg zeiq zruj.
25.14: zx'q taaib Zunj Jyenq faav ka'Len Eei Kwiv weig kcv faav.
25.23: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm tiab, Daauq i Dx'g, Javq yetg Dx'g, Lav Dx'g pyenj.
25.6: Zauj puaq tav Eei ka'lanq yrub, Daav Eei laapg liug weig zxpg xn myenb Eei yrub Zauj huv,
25.34: tavb sin maaib pyei nxm zaanq Navq an-man pyavb, nxmb nxm maaib pyavb Eweid Zauj pyavb ei.
25.2: “xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb txb ka'naaiq taaib fovg hxg pun yia. haiq taub Gxi fim Gxi eij fovg hxg, meib xij zu'g zipq taaib weig yia.
25.36: pyavb Eweid Zauj Zaab Zaaj Gwaab, Zauj tavb Jaaj tavb sin, xij zu'g Jwavg yetg Dunb Jyem taaq Zwrtq taaib penj yetg nxm.
25.20: naaiq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim xij zu'g Myen txij Myen, yav Daatq Ria Jyenq faav kub vwaaig. i taub zuvq mavg Jyenq faavb Gaaij.
25.24: cvj lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq tiab, yaag lovg Jyem zruj pin hxmb kxmj tiab Len.
25.28: kcv tiab Eei Dyavj xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj taaib yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem.
25.7: Zauj yetg Euvg Jaaij haig Eei la'pyeib si'q Rweig Eei, Zauj ziaj Euvg la'pyeiq weig tivj Jyenq tomb sai myenb Eei e-fotq Zauj pwav la'Kwrtq uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq.
25.29: xij zu'g lovg Jyem zruj tiab Eei Jaab txvj, se pyenb, tomb pa'ken, Rxmg Zauj Ziaq a'vung tiuq Eei vwaab pcvb.
25.19: yetg puv maaib taub. pun i puv faavb taaub Eei Ke-lu-Bim zyavb Jyenq Zauj faavb Gaaij penj yetg Kwaaiq mig a'q.
25.17: “xij zu'g lovg Jyem zruj Zeij en Eei weig uaq nxm faavb Gaaij, Daauq i Dx'g pyenj, Javq Dx'g pyenj.
25.38: lovg Jyem taaq Fiuq Japq tavb Zoq Zauj an Fiuq Eei pyenb.
25.31: “xij zu'g lovg Jyem zruj nxm tav. tavb Jaaj tavb sin xij zu'g taaq taaib. tav Eei zaanq Zauj pyavb Eweid pyavb ei yaag xij zu'g Jwavg naaiq Dunb Jyem taaq Zwrtq taaib.
25.30: xij zu'g zx'q kevj Tinb huvb Eei Fuaq an Jyenq tiab kub vwaaig, yia Eei Ra'Myen, zanb zang kevj yia.
25.27: naaiq teij Kwiv xij zu'g tivj nitq Jyenq tiab pin weig Zunj kcv tiab Eei Dyavj.
25.11: lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq ka'Eiag Zauj ka'Euad. cvj lovg Jyem zruj pin hxmb kxmj.
25.5: Eomg taaib si'q Eei yuvb kruq Dopq Zauj fua'q taaib lovj Eei scvb Kuq Dopq,  ta'su'q Dyavj,
25.9: naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub Zauj Dopg liub ka'Euad Eei Jaab txvj xij zu'g Navq yia Buaj meib uaq nx zruj.
25.16: cvj zx'q yia xij Jiu pun meib uaq teij i Kwaaiq lcvd vcvg waag Eei la'pyeib penq tapq Jyenq faav ka'Euad.
25.37: “xij zu'g zruj siag nxm tavb zaanq ton Jyenq siag Zaaj Gwaab tweib mweid pun tav ziuj Fav tavb Jaaj Eei Ra'Myen mcvj.
25.39: tav Zauj tav Eei Jaab sig xij zu'g lovg Eig zyepg yetq Jxib  Jyem taaq taaib.
25.4: pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'g hovg, la'maab Diab mwrng, yuvb pyei,
25.10: “xij zu'g lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj nxm faav, Daauq i Dx'g pyenj, Javq Dx'g pyenj, Lav Dx'g pyenj.
25.22: yia xij yem lcvd vcvg waag faav, Zeij en Eei weig kub vwaaig uaq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj, pwavb meib, yaag zx'q yia xij hatg i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei yetg zuvq leid Jiu pun meib.
25.12: xij zu'g toj pyei nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pyei Jia'q faavb zauj Eei kub vwaaig, yetg puv faav maaib i nxm.
25.15: naaiq teij kcv faav Eei Dyavj xij zu'g zanb zang Zunj Jyenq, maiq tuvq pcv Zwrtq.
25.13: lovg ta'su'q Dyavj zruj i tiub kcv faav Eei Dyavj yaag pwav Jyenq Jyem.
25.26: toj pyei nxm Jyemb Kwiv tivj Jyenq pyei puv tiab kx'q zcvj tiab zauj uaq nxm txvj.
25.25: yaag lovg Jyem hxmb tiab Len faauj yetg wcvb zaavq Lav, cvj lovg Jyem zruj pin hxmb kxmj.
